CounterACleaverTip: Counter a Cleaver by Summoning many small minions.
StunLancerStunsBigUnitTip: Using Stun Lancers to stun powerful enemy minions is a great counter.
FlyingMinionsBasicTip: Flying minions can NOT be hit by ground melee minions.
AoeUnitsVsLowHpUnitsTip: Using Minions that do Area damage will counter hordes of small minions.
BasicTankComboTip: Summoning a tough minion to protect your low-health ranged minions is a great combo.
FlankUnitsHittingYourMasterTip: Flank enemy minions attacking your master. They will not change targets, allowing for easy kills.
BasicBuildingsInfoTip: Unlike minions, buildings lose health over time.
UseSpellsToCounterBuildingsTip: You can use spells to attack buildings and minions on your opponent's side of the map.
BridgesGiveXpTip: If you capture a bridge it will slowly give you XP.
PerksTip: Remember you can hover over perks to read about them.
SpawnMinionsSafelyTip: Summoning minions right in front of enemy minions is usually a bad idea. Minions will get attacked while they are being summoned.
RareSpinTip: After using 4 Tokens, the next Token used will give a reward guaranteed to be Rare or better.
DeckSlotsTip: You can have multiple decks prepared.
UsedCardsOnBottomTip: Played cards are placed on the bottom of your deck and will come back in the same order you played them.
SendTeamPingWithAltTip: Use [r:[v:InputTextsService.PingKey]] to send team pings to your allied player in Team matches.
BigSpenderTip: If your opponent hasn't spent mana in a while - get ready for a strong push!
SpellAdvantageTip: Using a well placed Spell that destroys enemy minions of higher mana cost, is a great way to gain mana advantage.
ManaAdvantageTip: Aim to counter your opponents cards with lower cost cards to gain a mana advantage.

CleaverDescription: Very high damage but very slow attack speed.
WarriorDescription: An all-round fighter with average health and damage.
PlasmaMarinesDescription: Ranged Minions with average damage, speed and health.
LightningBoltDescription: [actorskillinfo:DestroyBuff,[mec:[r:DestroyBuff]]] a random enemy Minion or Building.
DragonWhelpDescription: "Can fly, which is good against melee ground Minions.\n\n[actorskillinfo:VoidborneWound,[mec:[r:VoidborneWound]]]: Gain [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]]
ScratPackDescription: Good for taking bridges and as cheap targets.
GhostTurretDescription: Defensive Building with good damage and attack speed.\n\nOn death, give a random friendly Minion [actorskillinfo:SpiritBuff,[mec:[r:SpiritBuff]]].
FireballDescription: Deals damage to enemies in the area.
BoomerDescription: Hatches from an [actorskillinfo:BoomerEgg,[r:Egg]] after a short delay. The Boomer explodes on contact or death.\n\n[actorskillinfo:VoidborneWound,[mec:[r:VoidborneWound]]]: Reduce Mana cost by 1.
SwarmersDescription: Swarmers are fast and have decent damage but low health.
SuccubusDescription: [actorskillinfo:SuccubusTeleport,[mec:[r:Phase]]] backwards when damaged by melee attackers.
DemonWarriorDescription: From the [v:DemonWarriorGrowOnCardPlay.MAX_LEVEL]th time this card is played, [r:DemonWarrior] has double health and damage.
GhostDescription: Possesses an enemy, turning it to your side. It gains [actorskillinfo:SpiritBuff,[mec:[r:SpiritBuff]]] and [actorskillinfo:CursedBuff,[mec:[r:CursedBuff]]].\n\nMasters and [actorskillinfo:MythicBuff,[mec:[r:MythicBuff]]] units get stunned for [math:[v:DealDamagePossession.STUN_DURATION]/1000] seconds instead.
LastStandDescription: Summons [v:SpellSummonBridgeGuards.AmountToSummon] [actorskillinfo:Legionair,[r:Legionnaires]].\nIf your opponent controls both bridges, summon [v:SpellSummonBridgeGuards.AmountToSummonIfBridgeControl] instead.
AllInDescription: Plays all other cards in your hand for free. All in, baby!
SniperScratDescription: Uses a gun with very long range and good damage, but it takes him a while to aim it.
BridgeShrineDescription: Generates an additional point of XP whenever you earn XP from the bridge in the same lane as this building.
ScratHordeDescription: Summons a horde of small Scrats.
ManaPuffDescription: [actorskillinfo:BridgeHugger,[r:BridgeHugger]].\nWhile on a bridge, generate [v:GenerateManaWhenInMiddle.MANA_GEN_AMOUNT] mana after [math:[v:GenerateManaWhenInMiddle.FIRST_MANA_INTERVAL]/1000] seconds. After the first it will generate another mana every [math:[v:GenerateManaWhenInMiddle.MANA_INTERVAL]/1000] seconds.
DefensoChopperDescription: [actorskillinfo:PilotedBuff,[mec:[r:PilotedBuff]]].\nWhen hit by melee attackers, it deals [v:DamageAttackers.DAMAGE] counter damage and [actorskillinfo:StunBuff,[mec:[r:StunBuff]]] them.
BannerManDescription: Spawns with [actorskillinfo:SingleShieldBuff,[mec:[r:SingleShieldBuff]]].\n\nGrants a [actorskillinfo:SingleShieldBuff,[mec:[r:SingleShieldBuff]]] to [v:BuffNearbyUnitsShields.MAX_AMOUNT] nearby friendly Ground Minions.
HealingFireballDescription: [actorskillinfo:HealsKeyword,[mec:[r:HealsKeyword]]] Friendly Minions in the area. Healing is split evenly between all friendly minions in the area.
ShockRockDescription: [actorskillinfo:StunBuff,[mec:[r:StunBuff]]] and damages enemies in the area.
StunBlastDescription: [actorskillinfo:StunBuff,[mec:[r:StunBuff]]] and give [actorskillinfo:TargetedBuff,[mec:[r:TargetedBuff]]] to enemies in the area.
WizardPuffDescription: When this puff dies, [actorskillinfo:TransformBuff,[mec:[r:TransformBuff]]] a random enemy Minion or Building into a friendly [actorskillinfo:ManaPuff,[r:ManaPuff]].
PriestessDescription: If there are damaged friendly Minions nearby she will constantly [actorskillinfo:HealKeyword,[mec:[r:HealKeyword]]] instead of attacking
Re-boomerDescription: Hatches from an [actorskillinfo:ReBoomerEgg,[r:Egg]] after a short delay. As a Boomer it explodes on contact or death, but turns back into an egg.
ColossusDescription: Swipes enemies in a huge arc in front of it.
BeamOfDOOMDescription: Deals massive damage in a small area.
LaserTurretDescription: When staying on the same target, it fires faster and faster, eventually reaching [math:[v:DealIncreasingDamageOnSameTarget.MIN_ATTACK_COOLDOWN]/1000] second attack cooldown.
WhirlyScratDescription: Deals damage in an area around himself.
DragonPackDescription: [cv:DragonPack.MainSummonAmount] Dragon Whelps. Highly effective against melee ground Minions.\n\n [actorskillinfo:VoidborneWound,[mec:[r:VoidborneWound]]]: Reduce Mana cost by [v:VoidbornWoundCostReduction.REDUCTION].
ScratLauncherDescription: Massive range, always shoots at the nearest enemy building.
DroneWalkerDescription: Solid ranged attacker with no fear.\n\nEscorted by a [actorskillinfo:BattleDrone,[r:BattleDrone]].
LegionnairesDescription:
A tough group of melee fighters.

[actorskillinfo:LegionBuff,[mec:[r:LegionBuff] (1)]]
[actorskillinfo:EmpyreanArmy,[mec:[r:EmpyreanArmy]]]: Increase cost by 1 mana and summon an additional [r:Legionair].
DroneForceOneDescription: Has a long range and causes knock-back.
AnnihilatorDescription: Deals damage in a large area.
StunLancersDescription: First attack to each enemy [actorskillinfo:StunBuff,[mec:[r:StunBuff]s]] for [math:[v:StunDamage.STUN_DURATION]/1000] seconds.
DisruptorPuffsDescription:
[actorskillinfo:BridgeHugger,[r:BridgeHugger]].
While on a bridge it teleports to the other bridge every [math:[v:TeleportBetweenBridges.TELEPORT_COOLDOWN]/1000+[v:TeleportBetweenBridges.TELEPORT_DELAY]/1000] seconds and [actorskillinfo:StunBuff,[mec:[r:StunBuff]]] enemies for [math:[v:TeleportBetweenBridges.STUN_DURATION]/1000] seconds.

[mec:Stuns] attackers for [math:[v:StunAttackers.STUN_DURATION]/1000] seconds.
PuffDescription: [r:PuffPlural] can only be summoned near your Master Tower.
BridgeHuggerDescription: This unit will remain on the bridges.
DragonNestDescription: Hatch 2 [actorskillinfo:FlightlessDragon,[r:FlightlessDragon]] with the next 3 spells you play.\n If the Spell cost 5 or more mana, they gain [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[r:RageBuff]].
FuturePastDescription: Add a random [v:SpellFuturePast.MANA_COST]-cost or higher card to your deck and reduce its mana cost by [v:SpellFuturePast.MANA_COST]. It becomes a new card with each play.
CallToArmsDescription: Heal a friendly non-Master Building for 15% of its max health and summon 1 [actorskillinfo:Warrior,[r:Warrior]] and 2 [actorskillinfo:CrossbowDude,[r:CrossbowDudes]] to protect it.
TrickSwapDescription:
Swaps the location of ALL minions on both bridges and [mec:[r:StunBuff]] enemies.

[mec:[r:StunBuff]]

CrossbowDudesDescription: Cheap ranged support with low health and damage.
BlackHoleDescription: Sucks up ALL minions in an area, removing them from the board for the rest of the spell's duration.
BurnTheBridgesDescription:
The closest bridge get covered in flames, dealing damage to ground Minions.

Damage: [math:[v:SpellBurnTheBridges.DAMAGE]*[v:SpellBurnTheBridges.DAMAGE_TICKS]]
Duration: [math:[v:SpellBurnTheBridges.DELAY]/1000*[v:SpellBurnTheBridges.DAMAGE_TICKS]] seconds. While only one unit is affected, the damage increases by [math:[v:SpellBurnTheBridges.SINGLE_TARGET_MULTIPLIER]/10]%
TombstoneDescription:
Place a Tombstone that consumes its own health to ressurrect the minions belonging to you that dies.
Consumes half the max health of the minion for the ressurrection. Can ressurrect multiple minions so long as it has health remaining, with a recharge period required between each resurrection.

Activation delay: [math:[v:RessurectNextDeadUnitAfterTime.DEPLOY_TIME]/1000]
Health: [av:Tombstone.MaxHealth]
Duration: [av:Tombstone.LifeTime] seconds
DaggerfallDescription: Deals low damage in a large area.
BountySniperDescription: Gives you 2 XP whenever it kills a Minion or damages the enemy Master.\n\nGain [actorskillinfo:SingleShieldBuff,[mec:[r:SingleShieldBuff]]] if you have less XP than your opponent.
BlastmancerDescription: When attacking an enemy that dies, perform [actorskillinfo:SoulDetonateBuff,[mec:[r:SoulDetonateBuff]]].
StyxiDescription: [actorskillinfo:StealthBuff,[mec:[r:StealthBuff]]].\n\nIf [r:Styxi] attacks a target but doesn't kill it, he'll stop attacking for [math:[v:ReduceAttackSpeedIfNoKill.DECREASED_ATTACK_SPEED]/1000] seconds.
GaxTheWorldBombDescription: Hatches from an [actorskillinfo:GaxEgg,[r:Egg]] after a short delay. On contact or death, he blows up to deal damage to EVERYTHING.
RammerDescription: Moves fast and only attacks Buildings.
ZeppelinBomberDescription:
[actorskillinfo:PilotedBuff,[mec:[r:PilotedBuff]]], [actorskillinfo:BarrelShield,[mec:[r:BarrelShield]]].
Flies over the battlefield towards enemy buildings and drops bombs along the way.

[actorskillinfo:ScratSwarm,[mec:[r:ScratSwarm]]]: Lose [actorskillinfo:BarrelShield,[mec:[r:BarrelShield]]] and gain [actorskillinfo:FrenzyBuff,[mec:[r:FrenzyBuff]]] and [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]].
BlueGolemDescription: Has high health and high damage.
HealPuffDescription: [actorskillinfo:BridgeHugger,[r:BridgeHugger]].\nWhile on a bridge, [actorskillinfo:HealsKeyword,[mec:[r:HealsKeyword]]] your Master for [v:HealMasterWhenInMiddle.HEAL_AMOUNT] health per second.
RedGolemDescription: A tougher and more powerful version of the common [mec[r:BlueGolem]].
ProximityRatDescription: Has a shield that only deactivates when attacking
RagingReinforcementsDescription:
Summon either of the following with [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]]:
 - [v:SpellSummonRandomRagingReinforcements.AMOUNT_OF_BROTHERS]x [actorinfo:BrothersOfLight,[r:BrotherOfLight]],
 - [v:SpellSummonRandomRagingReinforcements.AMOUNT_OF_WARRIORS]x [actorinfo:Warrior,[r:Warrior]], 
 - [v:SpellSummonRandomRagingReinforcements.AMOUNT_OF_SPEARTHROWERS]x [actorinfo:SpearThrowers,[r:SpearThrowers]]
WallDescription: When hit by melee attackers, it deals [v:ReturnPercentageMeleeDamage.PERCENTAGE_RETURN]% counter damage.
ButchersShopDescription: Summons [v:SpellButchersShop.AMOUNTTOSUMMON] Temporary Cleavers. They can not cross the bridges
SpiritmancerDescription: When attacking an enemy that dies, perform [actorskillinfo:SoulRipBuff,[mec:[r:SoulRipBuff]]].
UndyingSkeletonDescription: Leaves an [actorskillinfo:UndyingCorpse,[mec:[r:UndyingCorpse]]] the first time it dies.
WalkingBlindDateDescription: [actorskillinfo:TauntBuff,[mec:[r:TauntBuff]]], [actorskillinfo:RushBuff,[mec:[r:RushBuff]]].\n\nWhen killed, it summons a random [v:SpawnRandomCreatureOnDeath.MANA_COST_MIN]-[v:SpawnRandomCreatureOnDeath.MANA_COST_MAX] mana [actorskillinfo:WalkingBlindDateMinion,[r:Minion]] card.
PropellerScratsDescription: Quick and weak flying melee Minions.
TranquilShihouDescription: [actorskillinfo:HealsKeyword,[mec:[r:HealsKeyword]]] himself when no enemies are near.
BattleShihouDescription: Attacks faster for each enemy within range (Max 350% bonus for 5 enemies).
MissileSiloDescription: Big ass nuke, hella long delay though
ChainLightningDescription: Damages and [actorskillinfo:StunBuff,[mec:[r:StunBuff]]], then jumps to a nearby enemy. Maximum [v:SpellChainLightning.MAX_BOUNCES] targets.
SpearThrowersDescription: Their first attack is a ranged spear with double damage.
YellowGolemDescription: Solid as a Rock, hard to destroy and it hurts when it hits you. When yellow golem dies the enemy receives [v:GiveManaToOpponentOnDeath.GIVE_MANA] mana
RegimentLeaderDescription: A natural born leader, reduces the cost of minion cards in your hand by [v:DecreaseCostOfMeleeMinionCards.COST_DECREASE], while alive.
GuardianDescription: Absorbs [math:[v:GuardAllies.PROTECTIONRATE]/10]% damage dealt to nearby [r:CrystalElf] Minions.
ShieldTotemDescription: Summon a Shield Totem that absorbs damage that would have otherwise been dealt to the Master Tower.
BlastEntryDescription:
Settsu enters the arena and deals damage where she lands.

Health: [av:SettsuMinion.MaxHealth]
Damage: [av:Settsu.Damage] ([dps:Settsu] DPS)
Cooldown: [av:Settsu.AttackCooldown] seconds

SpiritVesselDescription: [actorskillinfo:SpiritBuff,[mec:[r:SpiritBuff]]]\n\nGives a random friendly Minion [actorskillinfo:SpiritBuff,[mec:[r:SpiritBuff]]] when killed.
XiaoLongDescription: When opponent plays a spell, Xiao Long pops out of existence for [math:[v:DodgeWhenCastSpell.BLINK_DURATION]/1000] seconds. He also gains [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]] and [actorskillinfo:FrenzyBuff,[mec:[r:FrenzyBuff]]].
BridgeImmunityDescription: Deflect all damage dealt to friendly minions on the bridge for the next [v:SpellBridgeImmunity.DURATION] seconds
BazookaScratDescription: Only attacks buildings.\n\nDeals half damage to Master towers.
SacrificialBlastDescription: Sacrifice a unit, dealing damage to nearby enemies proportional to the units remaining health
HypnotizeDescription: For the duration Enemy Minions attack random friendly units within range, if able.
FairyBottleDescription: A healing area that shrinks over time
DemolishRunDescription: All friendly minions caught in the AOE will zone in and only focus their attacks towards buildings
MagmaStormDescription: Calls down [v:SpellMultipleExplosion.NUMBER_OF_EXPLOSIONS] magma rocks in a large area. Also deals damage to friendly Units.
EmergencySpiritsDescription: Gives [v:SpellGiveSpiritsSimple.SPIRIT_AMOUNT] random friendly Minions [actorskillinfo:SpiritBuff,[mec:[r:SpiritBuff]]] over [math:[v:SpellGiveSpiritsSimple.SPIRIT_AMOUNT] *[v:SpellGiveSpiritsSimple.SPIRIT_DELAY]/1000] seconds.\n\n[actorskillinfo:AccursedAffinity,[mec:[r:AccursedAffinity]]]: Gives [v:SpellGiveSpiritsSimple.ASCENSION_SPIRIT_AMOUNT] extra Minions [actorskillinfo:SpiritBuff,[mec:[r:SpiritBuff]]].
CloneDescription: Duplicate all friendly Minions in a fireball sized area sec and reduce their health to [v:SpellCloneMinion.HEALTH_REDUCTION_AMOUNT_DISPLAY]%. Clones are vulnerable for [math:[v:SpellCloneMinion.SUMMONING_SICKNESS_DURATION]/1000] sec before they activate.
ArcaneMissilesDescription: Fires a volley of arcane missiles in the selected direction.\n\nDamage: [math:[sv:ArcaneMissiles.Damage]*[v:SpellProjectilesInDirectionFromHero.PROJECTILES]]
ArcaneGolemDescription: On play, consume all Arcane Sparks and gain +[v:PassiveSkillAddHealthAndDamageOnSpellCast.HEALTH_BOOST] health and +[v:PassiveSkillAddHealthAndDamageOnSpellCast.DAMAGE_BOOST] damage for each Arcane Spark consumed
FireImpDescription: Leaves a fiery [actorskillinfo:FireImpFireKeyword,[mec:[r:DOTKeyword]]] on the ground that deals heavy damage to ground Units in the area.[f:\n\nA pyromaniac who loves to incinerate his enemies.]
FuturePresentDescription: Add a random [v:SpellFuturePastBig.MANA_COST]-cost or higher card to your deck and reduce its mana cost by [v:SpellFuturePastBig.MANA_COST]. It becomes a new card with each play.
ManaBurnBoltDescription: Fires a slow moving projectile against the opponent master. It deals [sv:Damage] damage for each mana the opponent has when it hits.
ShieldedCrossbowDudesDescription: [actorskillinfo:SingleShieldBuff,[mec:[r:SingleShieldBuff]]], [mec:[r:MarksmanshipBuff]].\n\nIf your opponent controls both bridges, summon [cv:ShieldedCrossbowDudes.ExtraSummonAmount] extra.
CursedFireballDescription: All enemy Minions in the impact area are [actorskillinfo:CursedBuff,[mec:[r:CursedBuff]]].
MassRecallDescription: Move all your friendly minions back to your Master and heal them.
EliteSwarmerDescription: A fast and somewhat durable monster.
GatlingBikeDescription: [actorskillinfo:ScrapTech,[mec:[r:ScrapTech]]]: Spend [cv:GatlingBike.Variable] [r:Scraps] to claim the furthest bridge on spawn.

Attacks the nearest enemy with lightning arrows.

Damage: [av:Stormbringer.Damage] ([dps:Stormbringer] DPS)
Cooldown: [av:Stormbringer.AttackCooldown] seconds

[mec:[r:MarksmanshipBuff]]

Throws his mighty volcanic hammer at Minions on the ground.

Damage: [av:Volco.Damage] ([dps:Volco] DPS)
Cooldown: [av:Volco.AttackCooldown] seconds
Range: [av:Volco.Range]

[mec:Deals damage to all enemy Minions in an area.]
[mec:Cannot attack flying Minions.]

Mark a bridge. When you hold the marked bridge and play a card, hurl a [mec:Firebolt] at the enemy Master.

[mec:Firebolt]
Damage: [v:PassiveSkillFireboltOnCardPlay.DAMAGE]
MordarBasicAttackDescription:
Mordar slams his staff into the ground, emitting a wave of rot unto all Minions in his Arena.

Damage: [v:MordarsDecayAttack.DAMAGE]
Cooldown: [av:Mordar.AttackCooldown] seconds
Start DPS: [math:[v:MordarsDecayAttack.DAMAGE]/[v:MordarsDecayAttack.START_ATTACK_SPEED]]

Summons a [mec:[r:MeleeScrat]] every time a friendly Minion card is played. Give it [mec:[r:BarrelShield]] if it cost 5+ mana.

[mec:[r:MeleeScrat]]

ShowoffDescription: [Master] has global attack range when there are [v:PassiveSkillGlobalRangeFriendlyOnUnitCount.UNIT_COUNT_CUTOFF] or more friendly minions alive.
ScratsScratsDescription: Now summons 2 [mec:[r:MeleeScrat]] every time a friendly Minion card is played. Give them [mec:[r:BarrelShield]] if it cost 5+ mana.
InspirationDescription: [r:KingPuff] [mec:[r:InspireBuff]s] all friendly minions on the bridges \n\n[mec:[r:InspireBuffDescription]]
BridgeShieldDescription: [r:KingPuff] marks the bottom bridge and is immune to damage when controlling the marked bridge. \n\n[mec:[r:TrickSwap]] moves the mark.

Spits acid at up to two enemies.

[r:Settsu] fires a high-powered Pulse Rifle.

CombatReloadDescription: When [r:Settsu] casts a Spell, she instantly reloads her rifle and her next shot deals +[v:PassiveSkillSettsuMinionInstantReload.DAMAGE] damage.
HighPoweredLaserDescription:
Every 5th shot [r:Settsu] fires with her rifle pierces enemies and [mec:[r:StunBuff]s] them.

[mec:[r:StunBuff]]
[r:StunBuffDescription]
ArcaneMageBasicAttackDescription:
Fires [v:ArcaneSparksBasicAttack.BASE_SPARK_COUNT] Arcane Sparks at nearby enemies.

Each time your team casts a Spell, gain another Arcane Spark (Max 5).

Add a one-use [mec:[r:ArcaneMissiles]] card to Milloween's deck every [math:[v:ArcaneMissilesOnTimer.COOLDOWN]/1000] seconds.

[mec:[r:ArcaneMissiles]]
[r:ArcaneMissilesDescription]
TomeOfLoreDescription: As long as [r:ArcaneMage] controls the top bridge, her Spells cost 1 less mana

Add a one-use [mec:[r:ArcaneGolem]] to the top of [r:ArcaneMage]'s deck every 30 seconds.

[mec:[r:ArcaneGolem]]

StormbringerDescription: Stormbringer is a crack shot that buffs your ranged Minions, and uses his Stormbow to take out weak enemies from across the arena.
StormbringerHint: Hint: Bring plenty of ranged Minions, but remember high-health Minions to protect them!
VolcoDescription: The hot-headed [r:Volco] inspires the rage within his allies, buffing your Minions.
VolcoHint: Hint: Hard hitting melee Minions can cause havoc when they consume the Embers of Flame.\nRemember to bring anti-air support.
MordarDescription: Mordar, the Mad Summoner, uses his tombstones to raise the dead and his staff to slowly kill all attacking minions in your arena.
MordarHint: Hint: Bring big Minions to get the most out of your Tombstones.
RavagerDescription: Ravager is a fierce Master that summons giant beasts to its side and buffs friendly injured Minions.
RavagerHint: Hint: Time your attacks to match with BRUTUS appearing for a strong push.
RatboDescription: Ratbo, the infamous Scrat leader, summons Scrats to his side to overwhelm his enemies.
RatboHint: Hint: Fill your deck with Cards that summon multiple Minions and use More Dakka! to take out big enemies.
KingPuffDescription: King Puff is a trickster that buffs your Minions and confuses your opponent.
KingPuffHint: Hint: Fill your deck with Minion Cards of mana cost 4 and 5.
ApepDescription: Apep, the mighty Slither God gifts your deck with random cards and can put down a Shield Totem that makes him immune to damage.
ApepHint: Hint: Add some 5-Mana Cards to your deck to increase Apep's attack, but otherwise pick cheap Cards to get the most out of Apep's Gift Cards.
SettsuDescription: Settsu is a bad-ass ex-soldier that never plays by the rules. She can enter the Arena herself to annihilate enemies with superior firepower.
SettsuHint: Hint: Settsu is an aggressive Master that can put pressure on the enemy Master. Bring cheap Spells to reload her rifle instantly.
WorkInProgressDescription: Our next Master will be awesome! Trust us, we have the best Masters.
StartingArenaDescription: Your glorious starting arena! This arena heralds the beginning of your great career!\n\n[sub:Sponsored by C-SAR]
Area52Description: It is said that a great fireball appeared in the sky and crashed into the ground. From it the Outsiders came. - Running low on resources and cut off from their people, they are trying to survive in the wilderness..
ScratWorldDescription: It may not look like much... And it really isn't.
MagmaCourtDescription: Using evil demonic magic, this arena was created by simply ripping a chunk of a demonic world right out of the ground .. evil-y.
SunkenTempleDescription: Old. Wet. Slippery. A real fixer upper!
DwarfWorldDescription: Hi-ho, Hi-ho, it's off to war we go - *Furious Whistling*
SnowWallDescription: *fake scottish accent* Aaaaarh, just in time for the Haggis! Let's get warm by the hearth. Pull up a stone, tell me a story!
AncientRuinsDescription: These ancient ruins are all that is left of a not so great empire.
AbandonedScratArenaDescription: You can still see the dead spectators, who waited too long for a match that never came. Maybe you can rekindle the glory days of this old arena?
WinterHolidayDescription: Tis' the season to be jolly, Fa la la la la subscribe la la!
WithWildCardsYouCanIncludeUpToThreeOfThe: You can add up to 2 extra copies of a card to your deck (if you have Promoted it enough).
ShardsAreUsedToCraftSpecificCardsAndPurc: Shards are used to craft and promote specific Cards and purchase Masters. \n\nYou get Shards when you use Power Tokens, and can also earn them as rewards.
SelectACardToStartCraftingOrSalvaging: Select a card to start crafting..
YouCanAlsoAcquireNewMastersWithShards: You can also acquire new Masters with Shards.
ColorsinceYouCantIncludeMoreThan3CopiesO: [mec:Since you can't include more than 3 copies of any card in your deck, you can use this to salvage the extra copies for shards.]\n\n[large:You will destroy]
NewHeroesAreMadeAvailableEachWeekForYouT: New masters are made available each week for you to try out. \n\nYou can also permanently unlock them.
ThisIsLoreTextHasASmallDescriptionOfTheC: This is lore Text. Has a small description of the court or commander.
YouCanCheckOutWhatCardsYourOpponentWasUs: You can check out what cards your opponent was using here

Name: Name

YouNowHaveEnoughGoldToPurchaseAPowerToke: You now have enough gold to purchase a Power Token from the shop AND it just opened. \nWhat a coincidence!
YouCanSwitchOutYourMasterByClickingHimTr: You can switch out your Master by interacting with him using [r:[v:InputTextsService.Interact]], try it out.
YourDeckIsMissingACardClickUpHereToAddIt: It's time to face other Masters! But your deck is missing a card, [r:[v:InputTextsService.Interact]] up here to add it

YouCanHoneYourSkillsInTheSoloChallengesA: You can hone your skills with the challenges and earn great rewards!

DynamicallyGeneratedSnowSandOrWetnessSom: Dynamically generated snow, sand or wetness. Some arenas have snow or other ground covering built in, this will not remove that.
DoYouReallyWantToQuit: Do you really want to quit?
StreamViaTwitchAndPlayToGainBonuses: Stream and play to gain bonuses:
ThisGameIsCurrentlyInDevelopmentAndYouCa: This game is currently in development, and you can provide us (BetaDwarf) with feedback to optimize and improve it.\n\nOnce you are done playing, we have a couple of questions we would love for you to answer (external link):
SinceTheGameIsStillBeingDevelopedSomePar: Since the game is still being developed, some parts may not be fully functional, and certain things may not be available or finished. Additionally, there is a low risk we may have to reset profiles or do other things that cause you to lose progress and items. If this happens you will of course be compensated.\n\nYou might encounter bugs, crashes or other technical errors. If this happens, please help us out by providing feedback and report issues here (external link):
ServerScheduleAndStatusIsAvailableHereSo: Server schedule and status is available here,\nso you know when you can play (external link):
ThankYouSoMuchForTakingPartAndEnjoyTheGa: Thank you so much for taking part, and enjoy the game!
RubiesAreUsedToBuyMastersArenasAndPowerT: Rubies are used to buy Masters, Skins, Arenas and Power Tokens.\n\nThey can be bought in the Shop and earned as special rewards.
ShardsAreUsedToCraftSpecificCardsAndPurc: Shards are used to craft and promote Cards and purchase Masters. \n\nYou get Shards when you use Power Tokens, and can also earn them as rewards.
GoldIsUsedToPurchasePowerTokensInTheShop: Gold is used to purchase Power Tokens, Shop Offers, Draft Tickets and Mayhem runs.\n\nYou get gold by playing Battles and completing quests.
NoneOfYourSteamFriendsAreOnline: None of your [r:Steam] friends are online.
YouCanCollectOrCraftMoreCopiesOfThisCard: You can collect more or promote this card so you can include more copies of it in your deck.
YouCanRemoveAdditionalCopiesOfTheSameCar: You can remove additional copies of the same card from your deck, so your [r:WildCards] become available again enabling you to choose extra copies of this card.

DemonCommanderDescription: When you take a bridge, Azali grants [actorskillinfo:SingleShieldBuff,[mec:[r:SingleShieldBuff]]] to the [v:GiveShieldWhenTakingBridge.MAX_SHIELDS] nearest friendly ground Minions.

ComeBackTomorrowForANewDailyQuest: Come back tomorrow for a new daily quest
ArcaneMageDescription: Milloween is a master of the arcane who can summon an Arcane Golem that is empowered by your spells.
ArcaneMageHint: Hint: Add cheap Spells to your deck to power Milloween's attack and Arcane Golems.
MinionMastersIsInBetaAndYouCanHelpUsClic: Minion Masters is in Early Access, and you can help us! [c:[r:[v:InputTextsService.Interact]]] here for more info
SuccessfulTwitchEventsShowAKeyOnStream: Successful Twitch events will show a key on Stream. Write the key in the field below to claim a reward. Collect all keys to open the portal!
NeutralWorldArenaDescription: *Only available for people who played early access before October 2018* \nThis classy looking arena is a minimalist's dream. It has everything you need: A tower for your master, operational bridge support, functional (sort of) plumbing and a view. \nYou will be left wanting absolutely nothing (except maybe comforts) with this magnificently antique arena.
YouCannotDoThatWhileSearching: You cannot do that while searching

Ratbo fires a minigun salvo at the nearest enemy. It deals more damage for each friendly Minion in the arena.

TriTeamTourneyFullDescription:
The Tri-Team Tourney is a time-honored tradition, dating back to the very beginning of Minion Masters - a couple of months ago.

Since its ancient beginnings, it has been a shining beacon of 'friendly' competition between three teams of Masters!

Each team must fight to gather Keys, which in turn can be used to unlock the Grand Chest in the name of their Team. Whichever team unlocks more chests will be crowned the official champions of the Tri-Team Tourney, and all around cool cats.

[c:[r:[v:InputTextsService.Interact]]] the event icon to redeem keys and check your progress.
TriTeamUnlockBarDescription: How many chests each team has opened presented as shares of total chests opened. Masters use this ultimately silly statistic to compete with each other and smack talk the losers.

TimeBombDescription: After a delay, targeted friendly minion combusts, dealing [actorskillinfo:TrueDamage,[mec:[r:TrueDamage]]] to itself, and normal damage to nearby Enemies.\n\nIf you kill a Minion with [r:TimeBomb], [actorskillinfo:ResummonBuff,[mec:[r:ResummonBuff]]].

TriTeamFinalsDescription: When you win online matches you may get a key for your Master - streamers get shareable keys! Collect all 15 keys for one Master. You can only open the chest once, and your choice of Master will help determine what Legendary Card is added to the game. All players who opened a chest will get the new card on release!

TeamBattleBetaFullDescription:
[bold:It's time to try Team Battle!]
In Team Battle you can play with friends or with strangers. You have two new individual league rankings for team battles, and both can give rank rewards!

- The team rank, when you queue up alone and play with strangers
- The pre-made team rank, when you form teams with friends

Have fun and as always, if you encounter issues or have feedback, feel free to post it on the forums.

InfestedSettsuDescription: She knew something was wrong the second she landed on Corvaxx VII-2. All her life support systems started blaring as soon as she opened the port hatch, and in less than 5 seconds her air-seals were gone. It wasn't an unpleasant feeling, but it certainly was alien to her. She felt her awareness of the world expand, and she felt that it was good, oh so good, to be one with the Mother. When the spikes started growing, her mind was already in rapture, and she didn't care. All she wanted was to please the Mother.

PirateMordarDescription: 'Arrrrr ye looking fer me, ye scurvy dogs!?' [r:Mordar] the Mad asked, as he turned on what remained of the Sea Monkey's crew. 'Ye came to the right waters, then. Didn't bring enough cannons though, AAAARHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!'

TheEternalWoodsDescription:
Generations of human settlers have lived in The Eternal Woods, living off the land in relative harmony - then the Scrats came!

Ever hungry for fuel, the Scrats set up their logging camps, and The Eternal Woods are now in danger of winning the 'Ironic Name of the Year' award!

Where there's conflict, there are spoils, and both factions are too busy fighting each other to notice if you snatch some treasure or a minion for yourself.
DivineSalvationDescription: Give the Master and all Minions a Divine Shield.

SuppliesDescription:
Use Supplies to move in Expeditions.
Supplies can be gained by playing matches and as rewards.

You can hold 20000. Excess Supplies are sold cheaply for gold.
LocalSuppliesDescription: Use Local Supplies to move. Local Supplies will be refilled over time and lost if you leave this Expedition.

ExpeditionsEventDescription:
The First Step event is a try-out of our new 'Expeditions' feature.

You'll receive special quests that grant Supplies, which are used to explore in the Expeditions.
For the event, we've given everyone enough Relics to start their first Expedition!

You can also acquire supplies through playing or by trading for gold and rubies.

As always, your feedback is welcome on the forums!

Good luck!
-BetaDwarf
FirstStepEventButtonDescription: It's time to try Expeditions!\nUse your new Supplies to explore the world and get some fat loot!

ExpeditionBetaInfoRewards:
Explore vast lands!

Fight mighty foes!

Find juicy loot!

Get [bold:Supplies] for exploring from Campfires, Supply Crates and [bold:all] matches.
ExpeditionBetaInfoSupplies: Exploring costs [bold:Supplies] which are gained through daily quests, match wins, and also found during an expedition.\n\nThere are also [bold:Campfires] that will passively generate Supplies for you if you can find and claim them.
ExpeditionBetaInfoChallenges: During your travels, you'll meet [bold:challengers] blocking your path to juicy loot.\n\nEvery challenger has [bold:Might], and you'd be wise to try and increase your own [bold:Might] before facing the tougher ones.
ExpeditionBetaInfoRelics: If you feel the map is starting to run dry, you can start a new expedition using [bold:Relics] that you'd have found along your way.
ExpeditionBetaInfoBacktrack: Walking along a path you have already travelled does [bold:not] cost any Supplies. So plan your travels carefully, but don't worry about backtracking.
ExpeditionResourcesDescription: The Expedition contains treasure and resources. Keep track of your progress here, and go on another Expedition when you have looted it all.
SensitiveEvent: The Search for the Sensitive Savage
SensitiveEventDescription:
Rumors abound that a unique Minion is travelling through the Eternal Woods!

        A fierce brawler, Masters must explore the lands to acquire his strength with naught but a mysterious clue; “Only those with a good shoulder will convince the savage to join them”.


        Gather supplies through daily quests or watching streams for special Watch & Win rewards and play the new Expeditions feature! 


        P.S. If you already have an Expedition, you'll need to start a new one to find him. You've received 10 relics for that.

CursedValleyDescription:
Tales are told of a totally spooky spell that forever cursed the inhabitants of Happy Valley many centuries ago.

Their flesh festered and fell from their very bones, but they were kept alive to terrorize their former companions. Thus emerged a new race in these lands - The [b:Accursed].

The forest on the edge of the cursed lands is in a constant state of fright, as ghouls and ghosts prowl the land at night. Especially on the Wicked Witching Night!

This card has two sides. Switch sides on play.

VisualRescaleAnnouncementDescription:
With Update 60 we've made everything look better! We also solved some gameplay issues in our sights:
        -Bigger Minions for better readability. You get closer to the action which feels more intense and interesting to watch.
        A slight radius increase separates minions more, but also helps control strategies maintain bridges.
        -We reduced visual noise and cleaned up environments to make Minions stand out. Things like lighting, fog, depth of field and other vfx changes bring together the environments.
        - Many assets were redone. Most notably “Area 52”, but many arenas have been updated.
        -Minion speed increased. This makes for quicker engagements and better focus during gameplay and on streams. Players can also produce viable counterpushes with regular Minions.
        You can read the details in the patch notes.

XboxPrereleaseText:
This game is in a pre-release stage of development. This means that some parts of the game, including Xbox Live features (like multiplayer), might not function as expected (or might not function at all).

You might encounter bugs, crashes or other technical errors.

Because this is a pre-release game, Microsoft and Betadwarf do not commit to providing customer support for the game.

NetherBatDescription: When not attacking [r:NetherBats] will sometimes [actorskillinfo:SuccubusTeleport,[mec:[r:Phase]]] towards a random enemy [r:Minion]. Also [r:Nethersteps] on summon.
WolfAmongSheepDescription: Summon [cv:WolfAmongSheep.MainSummonAmount] [actorskillinfo:Legionair,[r:Legionnaires]]. One of them gains [actorskillinfo:LycanthropyBuff,[mec:[r:LycanthropyBuff]]] with [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]] at random.
OnceBittenDescription: Give a friendly non-Mythic ground Minion [actorskillinfo:LycanthropyBuff,[mec:[r:LycanthropyBuff]]]. The [r:Werewolf] gains [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]].
LycanthropyBuffDescription: Transform into a [mec:[r:Werewolf]] when health is 50% or below.\n\n[mec:[r:Werewolf]]
BatSwarmDescription: For the next [sv:SpellBatSwarm.Duration] seconds summon [v:SpellSummonBatsOnManaSpend.BATS_PER_MANA] [actorinfo:BlinkBat,[r:NetherBat]] for each mana you spend, that instantly [actorskillinfo:SuccubusTeleport,[mec:[r:Phase]]] in the direction of the played card. Playing it again prolongs the duration.[f:\n\nMuch like mosquitoes, [r:NetherBats] are annoying alone, but terrifying in a swarm!]
GraspingThornsDescription: Slows enemies to [v:SlowAndDealDamageOverTime.REDUCE_SPEED_TO] speed and deals damage in an area.\n\nSummon a [actorskillinfo:Skeleton,[r:Skeleton]] for each enemy that died in [r:GraspingThorns] when it expires. (max 3).
LoneWolfDescription: [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]].\nSummon a [actorskillinfo:Warrior,[r:Warrior]].\nIf there are no other Minions under your command Summon a [actorskillinfo:Werewolf,[r:Werewolf]] instead.

WitchwolfDescription: When summoned, Bahra immobilizes all enemy ground Minions for [math:[v:RootEnemiesOnSummon.ROOT_DURATION]/1000] seconds.\nHe uses his powerful moonbeam [actorskillinfo:WitchWolfBeamKeyword,[mec:[r:DOTKeyword]]] to damage groups of enemies.

It'll make your chat appear as cutesy puff spectators and give them access to commands to cheer you on and create a unique spectacle!\n\nCheck our website and share the list of commands with your viewers.

If enemy is already stunned, he instead unleashes a powerful blast.\n\n[actorskillinfo:ZenChiFlow,[mec:[r:ZenChiFlow]]]: [mec:[r:StunBuff]] all nearby enemies when played for [math:[v:StunAllMinionsInRangeOnAffinity.STUN_DURATION]/1000] seconds.

NyrvirDescription: [actorskillinfo:ImpactfulEntry,[mec:[r:ImpactfulEntry]]], [actorskillinfo:MythicBuff,[mec:[r:MythicBuff]]].\n[r:Nyrvir] breathes [actorskillinfo:Spiritfire,[mec:[r:Spiritfire]]] in a large area. Swap This Card For [r:NyrvirSlumbers] when played.

SkeletonHordeDescription: Skeletons are scrawny fighters, but together they are formidable.
HauntingHuggerDescription: Inflicts [actorskillinfo:CursedBuff,[mec:[r:CursedBuff]]].\nWhen the [r:CursedBuff] enemy dies, the Hugger reappears to find a new victim.\nWill [actorskillinfo:StunBuff,[mec:[r:StunBuff]]] Masters for 5 seconds.
TollOfTheDeadDescription:
Summon an [actorskillinfo:UndyingSkeleton,[r:UndyingSkeleton]].
After the second death, its remains linger on the field until...

[actorskillinfo:AccursedAffinity,[mec:[r:AccursedAffinity]]]: Convert all remains left by this card into [actorskillinfo:UndyingCorpse,[mec:[r:UndyingCorpses]]].

For each target that dies progress [v:SwapToWokeDragonIfAffinity.SOULS_PER_TARGET] towards [r:AccursedAffinity].\n\n[actorskillinfo:AccursedAffinity,[mec:[r:AccursedAffinity]]]: Swap this card for [r:NyrvirTheDragon] ([r:AccursedAffinityDescription])
MythicBuffDescription:
Cannot be displaced.
Only takes damage equal to 50% of Max Health from Destroy effects.
Leaves the battlefield instead of dying.

Your team can only have one copy of this unit summoned at a time.
SoulBuffDescription: Collect 1 [r:AccursedSoul] on death.\n\nCollect [v:AccursedAffinityBuff.ACCURSED_SOUL_AMOUNT] [r:AccursedSoul] to activate all cards in your deck with [mec:[r:AccursedAffinity]].
SpiritBuffDescription: Grant [v:BaseActorImpl.SPIRIT_PERCENTAGE_MAXHEALTH]% Max Health to a Minion (Min [v:BaseActorImpl.SPIRIT_FLAT_MINHEALTH] - Max [v:BaseActorImpl.SPIRIT_FLAT_MAXHEALTH]). Minions cannot receive more than one Spirit at a time.

WitchQueenDescription: [r:WitchQueen] the Lich Queen, Ruler of the Cursed lands, is a versatile Master that can choose spells from her Book of the Dead to deal with any situation as well as summon a powerful dragon to her side.

Channels a beam of necrotic energy at enemies.

[mec:[r:WitchQueenBookEffect1]]
[r:WitchQueenBookEffect1DescriptionPerk1]

[mec:[r:WitchQueenBookEffect3]]
[r:WitchQueenBookEffect3DescriptionPerk1]

[mec:[r:WitchQueenBookEffect2]]

[mec:[r:WitchQueenBookEffect4]]

CohortDescription:
Add a [mec:[r:Slave]] Minion to a [r:Slither] Card in your hand. Summon all [r:Slave] when you play that Card.

[mec:[r:Slave]]
Health: [av:SlitherLancerSlave.MaxHealth]
Damage per sec: [dps:SlitherLancerSlave]
Inflicts Poison on attack.
CohortTwoDescription: Add 2 [r:Slave] Minions to a [r:Slither] Card in your hand.\n\nSummon all [r:Slave] when you play that Card (Max 3).
SlitherSlavesDescription: Summon 1 [actorskillinfo:SlitherLancerSlave,[r:SlitherLancerSlave]] and 1 [actorskillinfo:SlitherDarterSlave,[r:SlitherDarterSlave]] that inflict [actorskillinfo:PoisonBuff,[mec:[r:PoisonBuff]]] for [math:[v:PoisonOnBasicAttack.DARTER_POISON_DURATION]/1000] seconds on attack.
SlitherLancerSlaveDescription: Vessel - Playing a card or ability with Sacrifice will kill this Minion and increase the effect of the card.\n\nInflicts [mec:[r:PoisonBuff]] for [math:[v:PoisonOnBasicAttack.LANCER_POISON_DURATION]/1000] seconds on attack.
SlitherDarterSlaveDescription: Vessel - Playing a card or ability with Sacrifice will kill this Minion and increase the effect of the card.\n\nInflicts [mec:[r:PoisonBuff]] for [math:[v:PoisonOnBasicAttack.DARTER_POISON_DURATION]/1000] seconds on attack.
PoisonBuffDescription: Deals damage over time to a Minion.
PoisonballDescription: Inflicts [actorskillinfo:PoisonBuff,[mec:[r:PoisonBuff]]] to all enemies in the area. [actorskillinfo:SacrificeBuff,[mec:[r:SacrificeBuff]]([cv:Poisonball.Variable])]: Double the [r:PoisonBuff] duration.
CagedProwlerDescription: After 22 seconds the cage releases the [actorskillinfo:Prowler,[r:Lynx]] and falls apart.
AhmunDescription:
[actorskillinfo:Cohort,[mec:[r:Cohort]] ([cv:Ahmun.Variable])].
Attacks enemies with his [actorskillinfo:WhipAttackKeyword,[mec:[r:WhipAttackKeyword]]].

The first time Ah'Mun dies; [actorskillinfo:SacrificeBuff,[mec:[r:SacrificeBuff]]]: to Resurrect with health equal to [v:KillAllSlavesAndGainHealth.MAX_HEALTH_PER_SLAVE] health for each [r:Slave] sacrificed.
TheStrongShallInheritDescription: Summon a random 6-mana cost Minion card.\n\nIf this is the cheapest card in your starting deck, summon a random 8-mana cost Minion card instead.(No other cards of 6 mana or less may be in your deck at match start).
AhmunsChosenDescription: Summon a [actorinfo:LivingStatue,[r:LivingStatue]], [actorinfo:Prowler,[r:Lynx]] or [actorinfo:SoulStealer,[r:SoulStealer]].\n\n[actorskillinfo:SacrificeBuff,[mec:[r:SacrificeBuff](3)]]: Summoned Minion gain [actorskillinfo:SpiritBuff,[mec:[r:SpiritBuff]]] and [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]].
SewerScratDescription: [actorskillinfo:BarrelShield,[mec:[r:BarrelShield]]]. Attacks inflict [math:[v:PoisonOnBasicAttack.SEWER_SCRAT_POISON_DURATION]/1000] seconds of [actorskillinfo:PoisonBuff,[mec:[r:PoisonBuff]]].\n\nAdditionally, when [r:SewerScrat] is hit by melee attackers, it inflicts [mec:[r:PoisonBuff]] for [math:[v:GivePoisonToAttackers.POISON_DURATION]/1000] seconds.
ScratStormDescription: Fires [v:SpellMultipleRockets.NUMBER_OF_EXPLOSIONS] furry rockets that each summon a [actorskillinfo:MeleeScrat,[r:Scrat]] on impact.\n\n[actorskillinfo:ScratSwarm,[mec:[r:ScratSwarm]]]: Summoned Scrats gain [actorskillinfo:FrenzyBuff,[mec:[r:FrenzyBuff]]].
ScratSwarmDescription: If you have at least 5 [r:Scrat] Minions in your opponent's arena.
MissileTankDescription:
[actorskillinfo:PilotedBuff,[mec:[r:PilotedBuff]]].
Rains a barrage of 6 missiles at random targets within range.

[actorskillinfo:ScratSwarm,[mec:[r:ScratSwarm]]]: Gain [actorskillinfo:MarksmanshipBuff,[mec:[r:MarksmanshipBuff]]].
ScratShredderDescription: [actorskillinfo:PilotedBuff,[mec:[r:PilotedBuff]]].\nThis metal monster will first [actorskillinfo:WreckinatorSaw,[mec:[r:WreckinatorSaw]]], then [actorskillinfo:WreckinatorHammer,[mec:[r:WreckinatorHammer]]]. At least until it [actorskillinfo:MalfunctionBuff,[mec:[r:MalfunctionBuff]]]s.
MalfunctionBuffDescription: Stops attacking at [v:SelfDestructionMalfunction.HEALTH_THRESHOLD] health and gains Taunt then explodes after a short duration.
MythicDebuffDescription: You can only ever have one copy of the same Mythic Unit summoned at a time.
JoinTwitch: Connect to Twitch and get a FREE Power Token!
DestroyBuffDescription: Kill a Unit. If it is Mythic, deal damage equal to [v:ActorConstants.MYTHIC_DESTROY_DAMAGE_PERCENT]% of Max Health instead.
PyramidArenaDescription: This monument to [r:Apep]'s greatness is a shining jewel in [r:Apep]'s Empire. The main courtyard of the temple is built for blood sport, and many [r:Slave] have met their end here for the amusement of the Slither Lord and his court. The temple is known far and wide for its great spectacles.
YouWillBeReimbursed: You already own the [r:Battlepass], if you purchase this offer, you will be reimbursed [0] rubies.
WreckinatorSawDescription: Deals strong Area of Effect damage with its sawblade arm.
WreckinatorHammerDescription: Slams the ground and knocks enemies back.

GiftSentSuccessfullynThePlayerWillReceiv: Gift sent successfully\nThe player will receive the item next time they log into the game

StormboltAbilityDescription:
With every [v:GainCardSkillStormbolt.NUMBER_OF_ATTACKS] shots [r:Stormbringer] charges his bow, adding the card [r:Stormbolt] to his deck.

[mec:[r:Stormbolt]]
[r:StormboltCardDescription]
StormboltCardDescription: [r:Stormbringer] fires a [r:Stormbolt] at his target, dealing [sv:SpellStormbolt.Damage] damage to it and stunning it for [sv:SpellStormbolt.Duration] seconds.\nOnce played Stormbolt is removed from your deck.
SuccubusTeleportDescription: Instantly jump through the nether to a different location.
HighlandLoggerDescription: This powerful [r:Highlander] tosses his [actorskillinfo:HighlandCaber,[mec:[r:HighlandCaber]]] at the first nearby enemy.\n\n[actorskillinfo:HiglandRevelry,[mec:[r:HiglandRevelry]]]: gain [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]] and give nearby enemy Minions [actorskillinfo:AntiFrenzy,[mec:[r:AntiFrenzy]]].
LegendaryBrewDescription: Give a friendly Minion [actorskillinfo:FrozenBuff,[mec:[r:FrozenBuff]]]. [actorskillinfo:HealKeyword,[mec:[r:HealKeyword]]] it for [v:SpellFreezeAndHeal.HEAL_AMOUNT] over the duration. \n\nIf it's a [r:Highlander], it gains [actorskillinfo:HiglandRevelry,[mec:[r:HiglandRevelry]]].
ArcaneRingDescription: [actorskillinfo:Overload,[mec:[r:Overload] ([cv:ArcaneRing.Variable])]].\n[v:SpellCirclingProjectiles.PROJECTILES] arcane projectiles circle the nearest friendly Minion in the area. They deal damage to the first enemy they touch.\nCan only be cast in your own arena.
OverloadDescription: Lock a Mana Crystal. The next time you would gain mana, instead unlock a mana crystal.
OverloadMultiDescription: Lock 2 Mana Crystals. The next time you would gain mana, instead unlock a mana crystal.
CrystalVortexDescription: [actorskillinfo:Overload,[mec:[r:Overload] (1)]].\nPulls all Enemy Minions towards its center, dealing damage to them. Damage is reduced the farther from the center they are.
CrystalMageNobleDescription: [actorskillinfo:Overload,[mec:[r:Overload] (2)]], [actorskillinfo:ManaSurgeBuff,[mec:[r:ManaSurgeBuff]]].\n\nWhile Mana Surge is active, Leiliel absorbs [v:ReturnFireOnRangedAttackers.REDUCTION_PERCENT]% of ranged attack damage and sends it back at attackers.
HighlandWoodsmanDescription: [actorskillinfo:HiglandRevelry,[mec:[r:HiglandRevelry]]]: gain [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]] and give nearby enemy Minions [actorskillinfo:AntiFrenzy,[mec:[r:AntiFrenzy]]].
HiglandRevelryDescription: If summoned close to another [r:Highlander] Minion - or if another [r:Highlander] Minion is summoned nearby.
HighlandSpinnerDescription: Wielding his famous bladed mugs, Fergus does a wild [actorskillinfo:FergusSpin,[mec:[r:SpinAttack]]]. After the attack, Fergus gets dizzy and cannot attack or move for [math:[v:SpinAttackAndDisarmSelf.DAZE_DURATION]/1000] seconds.
OwlStrikeDescription: [v:SpellOwlsAttack.NUMBER_OF_OWLS] [actorskillinfo:Frostfeather,[r:Owls]] swoops down to perform one attack on a random enemy minion within the area before flying off.\nThe Frostfeathers move at higher speed and inflict [actorskillinfo:AntiFrenzy,[mec:[r:AntiFrenzy]]].
MountainshaperDescription: Strikes all enemies in a large area with an earthshattering [actorskillinfo:GroundRupture,[mec:Ground Rupture]] for each charge on Mountainshaper.\n\nMountainshaper gains a charge for every [math:[v:SpellDealDamageInVerticalLine.TIME_PER_CHARGE]/1000] seconds it is in your hand. (Max [v:SpellDealDamageInVerticalLine.MAX_CHARGES] charges).
MountainshaperBuffDescription: Gains a charge for every [math:[v:SpellDealDamageInVerticalLine.TIME_PER_CHARGE]/1000] seconds it is in your hand. (Max [v:SpellDealDamageInVerticalLine.MAX_CHARGES] charges).
MailPrivacyPolicy: We take your privacy very seriously and promise not to spam you. For more info see our [bold:Privacy Policy].

PoisonMasterDescription: All his scrats deals 2 seconds of poison on attack.

MountainshaperVolcoBasicAttackDescriptio: Deals [av:Volco.Damage] area GROUND damage with his hammer every [av:Volco.AttackCooldown] sec. Has a range of [av:Volco.Range]. Volco deals Friendly Fire, but Friendly minions hit gains [textinfo:[r:RageBuffDescription],[mec:[r:RageBuff]]].

MountainshaperVolcoDescription: He shapes the mountains from molten rock.

OwlPerk1Description: Add one [r:OwlStrike] to your deck. It costs 0 mana.
OwlPerk3Description: Add one [r:OwlStrike] to [r:OwlBoss]'s deck. It costs 0 mana.
HighlandLoggerPerk2Description: [r:Highlander] cards in this Master's deck cost 1 less mana until played.
HighlandLoggerBasicAttackDescription: Throws his trusted Caber. It takes 40 secs to whittle a new Caber.
LogTosserBossDescription: 'My logs will crush you!' - Be careful, he throws logs!
ScratTankPerk1Description: Spawn a [r:Scrat] gun to defend a random bridge every 10 sec.
WitchwolfPerk1Description: ALL ground Minions gain [r:Lycanthropy] when summoned.
UndyingSkeletonPerk1Description: ALL Minions who die in [r:UndyingSkeleton]'s arena leave an [r:UndyingCorpse] owned by this Master.
CursedFireballPerkDescription: Add 2 [r:CursedFireball] to [r:HauntingHuggerBoss]'s deck. They cost 0 mana.
UndyingSkeletonPerk3Description: ALL Minions leave an [r:UndyingCorpse] on death owned by this Master, regardless of location.
GhostPerk3Description: Gain control of ALL Minions in play.
NyrvirPerk1Description: Whenever opponent plays a Minion card, [r:NyrvirTheDragon] summons a [r:SpiritVessel].
NyrvirPerk3Description: [r:Nyrvir] enters the field and gains [r:RageBuff] and [r:FrenzyBuff]. You win if you either defeat [r:Nyrvir] or [r:Nyrvir]'s tower. [r:Nyrvir] keeps her current health.
SpectralMorelliaPerk1Description: Add [abilityVariable:172] [r:WitchQueenPerk1] to Shade of the Lich Queen's Deck.
MountainRobbersPerk1Description: Summon [abilityVariable:135] [r:Legionnaires] whenever the opponent captures a bridge.
AncientWatcherPerkDescription: Summon a random minion card from both master's decks.
ForgottenWarriorPerk2Description: Whenever a Minion gains [r:Spirit], this Master heals for 100 Health and gains 5 XP.
VoidPortalPerk1Description: Summon a Swarmer each time the Void Portal takes damage.
VoidPortalPerk2Description: All of the opponent’s minions have Turncoat
VoidPortalPerk3Description: Add 1 [r:CrakgulDoomcleaver] to [r:GorrakkGateBoss]'s deck. It costs 0 Mana.
TheMagnificentPerkDescription: Randomize mana cost of all cards in both decks.
BonusCrystalArcherRelicDescription: Whenever you play a [r:CrystalElf] Minion, also summon a Crystal Archer.
CrystalElfFreeRelicDescription: Each time you level up, all cards in your hand cost 3 mana until played.
CrystalElfThreeForFreeRelicDescription: Every other Spell you play has its mana cost reduced by half (rounded down).
BonusBrothersRelicDescription:
Add a [mec:[r:BrothersOfLight]] card to your deck. It costs 3 less mana.
Reset the cooldown on [r:ArmorOfLight] when you play a spell.

[mec:[r:BrothersOfLight]]
Health: [av:BrotherOfLight.MaxHealth]
Damage per sec: [dps:BrotherOfLight]
EmpyreanShieldOnDeathRelicDescription:
Whenever a friendly minion dies, another random friendly minion gains [mec:[r:SingleShieldBuff]].

[mec:[r:Shield]]
[r:SingleShieldBuffDescription]
FreeBoomerRelicDescription: Whenever you play a [r:Voidborne] card, summon a [r:Boomer].
NetherstepComboRelicDescription:
Whenever you cast 3 Minions in a row, teleport all your Minions closer to the enemy Master and give them [mec:[r:RageBuff]].

[mec:[r:RageBuff]]
[r:RageBuffDescription]
FreeSpawnOfFuryRelicDescription: Cast [r:SpawnOfFury] each time you play a minion card, reducing max health by 50% and makes a copy of it.
HealingFireballFlowRelicDescription: Whenever you play a [r:ZenChi] card, cast a [r:HealingFireball] at a random friendly Minion or [r:ChainLightning] at a random enemy Minion.
EmpyreanHealingRelicDescription: Whenever you play a 5 mana card, heal all friendly Minions by 300 health.
FrenzyOnBridgeCaptureRelicDescription:
Whenever a friendly Minion captures a bridge, give it [mec:[r:FrenzyBuff]] and [mec:[r:RageBuff]].

[mec:[r:FrenzyBuff]]
[r:FrenzyBuffDescription]

[mec:[r:RageBuff]]
[r:RageBuffDescription]
FireballComboRelicDescription: If you play 3 cards in a row with the same cost, cast 3 [r:Fireball] Spells on 3 random enemy Minions or the enemy Master.
OpponentDamageRelicDescription: Your Opponent takes 10 damage per second while you have 6 or more Mana.
TwoManaDoubleCastRelicDescription: Your 2 mana cards are cast an additional time with random target or location within your own arena.
BridgeDamageReductionRelicDescription: If you have both bridges, your Master is immune to damage.
FreeWalkingBlindDatesRelicDescription: Summon 2 [r:WalkingBlindDate] each time you level up.
SummonWarriorOnDamageTakenRelicDescripti: Summon a [r:Warrior] whenever your Master takes 200 damage within 5 sec.
SpellStealRelicDescription: Whenever enemy casts a Spell, add a one-use copy of it to your deck. It costs 2 less Mana.
StormySwarmRelicDescription: If your opponent holds both bridges for 15 seconds, Summon a [r:Stormy] minion.
ChanceToGetManaOnSpellPlayRelicDescripti: 33% chance to gain 4 mana when casting a Spell.
GainXpOnEnemyMasterHitRelicDescription: Gain 2 XP whenever you play a Flying Minion Card.
CapCardCostsAt5ManaRelicDescription: Cards that cost 6 or more mana now cost 6 mana.
BuffedUpDescription: Both players start all fights with a free [mec:[r:HealingFireball]], [mec:[r:EmergencySpirits]] or [mec:[r:SunBurn]] in their decks.
ImpatienceDescription: For every 10th second a card is in player's hand, reduce its mana cost by 1 until played.
OwlBossDescription: How can such a small thing be so furious?
MilloweenAdventureDescription: A dark and cryptic vision sets Milloween on a journey to stop the ancient weapon Mountainshaper from falling into the wrong hands.\n        Mocked by her peers, her only allies on the dangerous journey are High-mage Leiliel and her personal guard.
Adventure1Description: Journey with Milloween on a daring adventure to find the powerful artifact Mountainshaper.\n        She is however not alone, the strands of fate are all gathering on this moment. Beings from across the world find themselves caught up in these crazy events.\n        While it is unknown who set all this in motion, one thing is for sure, you must get Mountainshaper before evil does.
Adventure1Chapter1Description: You have arrived at the Stoutheart village, where rumours of the Mountainshaper first spread. Search the surrounding area for clues and see if someone in the village, can help you find out where to go next.
ScratBossDescription: You have encountered a pack of Scrawny Treasure Hunters.\n        ----\n        ""Eats it! And takes its stuff!""
GrenadierBossDescription: 'Get em you useless dolts!! \n No-no let them reach new boss-scrat, or no one's getting cheese-paid!'
SniperBossDescription: "Was look-sneaking for a nice bear pelt, but your hide will do!"
ScratTankBossDescription: "Bow-bow before supreme [r:Scrat] mechanical powerness! No one can squeak-stand before [r:Scrat] weaponry!"
DefensoChopperBossDescription: 'You not pass! Fast bring out the Electro Rod 2000, kill it Quick-Quick my minions!'
LegionnaireBossDescription: You have encountered a gang of deserters! \n --- \n “Nobody move, it's a robbery! Just hand over your goodies and no one will get hurt!”
BlueGolemBossDescription: Suddenly the stone beneath your feet starts to shift.  \n You have disturbed something ancient and angry!
StormyBossDescription: Day turns to night, lightning strikes all around you, hail bombard the area and gale force winds tear away everything not tied down.
AssassinBossDescription: “I have come for the fallen one! Its head will make the master pleased!\n        His plans are all coming to fruition, you are all his pawns!”
GorrakkGateBossDescription:
A voiceless sound carries from the void. It scratches at the walls of your mind, drilling deep. 

“We have come for the fallen one.” 

The sentence repeats again and again.
GhostBoss: Ghosts, why did it have to be Ghosts?
GhostBossDescription: As you make your getaway, glowing spectral horrors materialize in front of you. The spirits of the dead come clawing for your soul!
SpiritVesselBossDescription: All you hear as they attack is the rattling of bone and the icy winds tearing at lose decayed flesh.
WizardPuffBossDescription: A sense of warm happiness fills you as you approach the strange creature. \n\n However, the mischievous look in its eyes tells you it wants to play, hopefully not too rough.
WoodsmanBossDescription: This Stoutheart seems possessed? \n\n“You don't understand, there is no denying her, she is in my head! She must be obeyed! I must fight you!”
BahraBossDescription: A dark crystal is bound to this beast's flesh. It seems to control it - Perhaps destroying the crystal would set it free and let you pass?
UndyingSkeletonBossDescription: A horde of skeletons pull themselves out of the snow, they stand between you and escape!
DizzyDuncanBossDescription: You are here for my maps, aren't you? Over my dead corpse!
AdulaBossDescription: This dark creature seems different to other demons, what could it be doing here?
AdulaDescription: [r:AdulaBoss] is a singularly rare creature. Once a demonically possessed human, [r:AdulaBoss] had her soul restored. She now wanders the world shunned by all factions and beholden to none. Driven by intense hatred towards her old demonic masters, she has dedicated her life to rooting out evil and its deceptions, wherever it may be.
VernonBossDescription: Something seems off about this human.
JoloBossDescription: You have caught up to the strange creature and it has the Mountainshaper in its possession! \n\n“You not take hammer! Hammer make Jolo famous and heroic! Smack kill all before me!”
SpookyMorelliaBossDescription: The Lich Queen has caught up to you, there is no choice but to fight!
HealingSpiritsRelicDescription:
Whenever you play a 5+ mana minion, give 3 friendly Minions [mec:[r:SpiritBuff]].

[mec:[r:SpiritBuff]]
Increase Max health by 200, or 100 if it has flying.
EssenceTransferDescription: Both players' Minions gain 25% of their target's max health when they kill it.
Adventure1PrimerDescription:
- Pick a custom Master with a unique deck.
        - Defeat a series of encounters to complete the chapter.
        - Upgrade your deck with new cards and powerful Relics between each encounter.
        - Be careful! If you lose an encounter you have to start over.
Adventure1Chapter2Description: As you push deeper into the Highlands, you realise foul scrats have overrun the area. They are said to have a mysteriously lucky leader looking for the artifact.\n        Hurry you must get to it before he does!
Adventure1Chapter3Description: The Lich Queen's horde is all around you, undead things and foul beasts approach, even the surrounding wildlife seems to be under her spell. You must make your escape with the hammer, letting it fall into Morellia's dark grasp can only lead to untold horrors!
Adventure1Chapter1Victory: Although you have found a way forwards, a long and dangerous journey still lies ahead and foul creatures await at every turn! Prepare yourself for some of the most dangerous areas in the frozen Highlands.
Adventure1Chapter2Victory: 'This prize is mine! Leave now, and I will let you keep your pathetic life.' says The Lich Queen, her ethereal arm outstretched towards the Mountainshaper. She seems to shimmer in and out of existence, but the undead creatures appearing all around her look very real.
Adventure1Chapter3Victory: As you sit in a Tavern on your way home, drinking a well deserved mug of Frostberry brew, you hear troubling stories of an Empyrean incursion into the West. But that is an adventure for another time.
CanBeObtainedByParticipatingInTournament: Can be obtained by participating in tournaments.
CampfireRestDescription: Heal for 1500 Health, and increase your health by 500 permanently.
CampfireCullTheRanksDescription: Remove two cards from your deck.
CampfireTrainDescription: Reduce the mana cost of a card in your deck by 2.
CampfireTreasureDescription: Add a Treasure to your deck.
LongerRangeDescription: [r:BahraBoss] can attack [abilityVariable:181] farther than their usual range.
AdventurerDescription: Complete a chapter of an adventure
ScratBossJoloDescription: "Eats it! And takes its stuff! New boss promised more loot!"
GrenadierBossJoloDescription: “Oh my cheese! It's pretending to be the boss-scrat, real boss scrat said this might happen!! Kill it Quick-Quick.”
ScratTankBossJoloDescription: “Oh It's boss Scrat Jolo! Hmmm... Kill it! I will be the new treasure Boss. Attack bois! All loot will be mine!”
DefensoChopperBossArcaneMageDescription: “You not pass elf thing! Fast bring out the electro rod 2000, kill her Quick-Quick my minions!”
DefensoChopperBossJoloDescription: "Electrocute him! New Boss pays more cheese-coin!"
BahraBossArcaneMageDescription: You can clearly feel the flows of magic binding and controlling the beast. It emanates from a dark gemstone, set in the beasts flesh. Perhaps destroying the gem will break the spell.
BahraBossWolfDescription: 'Your sire, you have finally found him!\n        Something is wrong though, he doesn't seem to recognize you. There is a dark magical crystal bound to his flesh, it seems to be controlling him. Perhaps smashing it will set him free?'
OwlBossArcaneMageDescription: The village guard smiled and boasted. ""You look like you couldn't even defeat my pet Frostfeather, why should we let in a puny elf like yourself?""
LogTosserBossArcaneMageDescription: Bran is the strongest resident of Frostberry village.\n\nDefeat him in honorable battle and maybe someone will consider your request for a guide.
LogTosserBossDemonDescription: "Filthy demon, I will crush you! You will regret entering our village!"
LogTosserBossJoloDescription: "A rat! I will squish you! You will regret sneaking into our village!"
SpookyMorelliaBossArcaneMageDescription: Your sister has caught up to you, there is no choice but to fight!\n----\n“You will not take this prize from me sister! I have become more powerful than you could ever dream of!”
SpookyMorelliaBossDemonDescription:
The Lich Queen has caught up to you, there is no choice but to fight! 

        ----

        ""You are different...
        I sense, life... within you.
        Impossible, your kind is not meant to possess such things. But no matter, you will die just the same.""
SpookyMorelliaBossWolfDescription:
The Lich Queen has caught up to you, there is no choice but to fight!

        ----

        ""What is this, another Dog? I will bind you like I did your weak master!""
SpookyMorelliaBossJoloDescription:
The Lich Queen has caught up to you, there is no choice but to fight!

        ----

        ""So you dug up the hammer, just like planned... I promise you there will be no ""lucky"" escape this time rat!""
SpookyMorelliaBossFergusDescription:
The Lich Queen has caught up to you, there is no choice but to fight! 

        ----

        ""You are hardly better than a drunken beast, what hope do you think you have of defeating me?""
UndyingSkeletonBossArcaneMageDescription: You hear your sisters dark laughter as a horde of skeletons pull themselves out of the snow, they stand between you and escape!
UndyingSkeletonBossDemonDescription: “You are different... I sense, life... within you. Impossible, your kind is not meant to possess such things. But no matter, you will die just the same.”
UndyingSkeletonBossWolfDescription: “What is this, another Dog? I will bind you like I did your weak master!”
DizzyDuncanBossArcaneMageDescription: “Defeat me in honorable battle, and I shall take you to what you seek myself Elfling!  \n\n        If you fail we can always have a drink or five instead.”
DizzyDuncanBossFergusDescription: Better drink some more Frostberry Brew - I'm seeing double!
JoloBossJoloDescription: You have caught up to the imposter who has secretly taken your place! \n\n“Jolo boss! How did you get here? I Sneak-pay everyone to secret quick-kill!? Useless dolts! But you won't stop me, I'm still new Jolo! No one shall squeak-know the truth!”
NyrvirBossArcaneMageDescription: 'How could you, Morellia! What have you done to this proud creature?' yells Milloween. Her sister's cruel laughter is the only answer she receives.
FergusSpinDescription: Deals damage to all nearby minions for [math:[v:SpinAttackAndDisarmSelf.SPIN_DURATION]/1000] seconds. Fergus moves at half speed.
ScratTurretDescription: Continuously shoots infront of itself, knocking back minions it hits.
MeleeGainLycanthropyBuffDescription: Summoned melee minions will receive Lycanthropy
RangedGainMarksmanShipAndFrenzyBuffDescr: Summoned ranged minions will receive [r:MarksmanshipBuff] and [r:FrenzyBuff].
JoloDescription: Jolo, the luckiest scrat alive, travels across the realm with his gang of treasure hunting Scrats looking for epic relics!\n        Unfortunately many of his followers have recently turned against him - Utterly without reason of course, Jolo knows he is the best Scrat leader of all time.
FergusDescription: The generally tipsy Fergus, fondly known as Fergus Flagon Fighter by his village. Has long been searching for an epic quest to prove his worth to everyone. Maybe this is it?
VernonDescription: Sired by Bahra the Witchwolf, Godric has been searching for his master ever since he was lost years ago. Rumours of a dark and powerful beings lead him all across the realm
CampfireTitle: Campfire\n        Choose How to Spend the Night
Adventure1Chapter1VictoryCelebration: Congratulations, you have found a way to navigate the mountains and the adventure can begin in earnest!
Adventure1Chapter2VictoryCelebration: As you pick up the Mountainshaper, a powerful shockwave blasts you back! A roar shakes the mountains and a massive dragon lands before you. In front of it stands a shimmering projection of the Lich Queen herself. She has come for the Mountainshaper…
Adventure1Chapter3VictoryCelebration: You have stopped the Lich Queen from obtaining Mountainshaper and won the day!
HardModeDescription: Hard mode is extremely difficult. The bosses have learned some new tricks...
StartFightsWithFreeBuffBuffDescription: Free card added to your deck for this match.
TheMagnificentBuffDescription: [r:TheMagnificent] has jumbled the mana cost of your cards.
HardModeUnlockDescription: Complete Chapter 1 on Normal to unlock
HighlandCaberDescription: A giant tree log that deals massive damage in a large area, causing knockback.
GroundRuptureDescription: Deal damage and knock back enemy ground minions in a vertical area across the arena.
HeroDescriptionRewardsDescription: Complete ALL chapters with ALL Masters on hard mode to unlock.

GetAccessToAllMastersInAdventure: Get Access to all Masters in Adventure
Defeat01BossesWithThisMasterToUnlockWins: Defeat [0]/[1] Bosses with this master to unlock. Wins in Hard mode counts double.
YouWereAlreadyRegisteredOnOurNewsletterY: You were already registered on our newsletter. Your information was updated.
SignUpNowToEnsureYouDontMiss: Sign up now to ensure you don't miss out on monthly rewards.

WarfortheGroveDescription: The war is raging! Reinforcements are arriving for both you and your opponent.
Adventure2Chapter1Description: Ardera and her Order of the Burning Fist are assaulting and burning their way through the jungle, leaving innocent dead in their wake.\n        Do what you can to harass the army and keep them from the Hou villages, but be wary, as the forest itself is a dangerous place!
Adventure2Chapter2Description: The local Shi-Hou speak in fearful tones of an ancient shrine, hidden deeper in the jungle. It is protected by ancient elementals and contains an unspeakable evil hidden from the world… and Ardera is headed there.
Adventure2Chapter3Description: A dark laughter rings out across the jungle, and Ardera floats up from the wreckage, her body glowing with purple light. She raises her hands to the sky, laughing madly as a tear is ripped in the very fabric of reality above her. Through it, the Void spills forth.
SunderDescription: Pull a rock from the ground and slam it back down. Deals [math:[av:Jahun.Damage]/2] damage in an area twice.\nCan only be played once.
JungleArenaDescription: Home of the Shi-hou. Few outsiders have ever set foot in this ancient grove.
CaelethSunBurnPerkBuffDescription: Cast [r:SunBurn] on the friendly Minion that is farthest away.
ShenStormStaffBuffDescription: Cast [r:ShockRock]s equal to the number of charges (max 4).
DragonNestMysteriousEggAttackDescription: Spawn a Dragon Whelp for every 300 damage taken within 5 seconds.
GraspingThornsBasicAttackDescription: Cast Grasping Thorns underneath attackers every 10 seconds.
ChargeBuffDescription: Charges nearby enemies and slams them with his shield.
SerenaBossOpenPortalPerkDescription: [r:ZealotLeaderFirst] opens a portal and starts summoning [r:Voidborne] Minions into her arena every 20 seconds.\n[r:ZealotLeaderFirst] is infused with demonic power, making her unstoppable. Defend yourself until her ritual is complete!
SerenaBossBiggerPortalPerkDescription: The portal grows. Stronger [r:Voidborne] are being summoned!
SerenaBossEndMatchPerkDescription: [r:ZealotLeaderFirst] finishes the Ritual. Hold your ground!
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription10: Ting, Teng & Tung are three young mischievous Mu-Hou siblings. Renowned acrobats, they are known far and wide in the jungle villages for their great acrobatic performances and trickster ways.\n        Normally they travel the jungle, going from village to village to show off, but now they have turned their skills against the new threat towards their beloved jungle.

Nylora is a singularly rare creature. Once a Voidborne possessed human, Nylora had her soul restored by the Aspect of Life. She now wanders the world, shunned by all factions and beholden to none.\n        She has come to the Southern Jungles, where she was first freed from the voidborne possession, following rumours that her old master is hatching some dark scheme here.\n        Having sworn to oppose him and all his Voidborne kind, she has come to the jungle in the hopes of destroying him or dying an honorable death. In her search she is caught up in the Burning Fist invasion of the jungle, and they do not exactly take kindly to demons. But perhaps they are searching for the same thing?

Having long suspected something amiss with Ardera and her order of the Burning Fist, Caeleth Dawnhammer has been sent on a secret mission to keep an eye on her on behest of Valorian, leader of the Chapter of Light.
        His orders are to intervene and bring judgement to Ardera, if she is found to have strayed from the light and the holy rule of Empress Katyana the 3rd, praised be her name.
        Like all the Brothers and Sisters in the Chapter of Light, Caeleth was accepted when he was still only a child.
        Having given up his old life and family when joining, his entire existence has been grueling training and preparation for the Ascension ritual. A ritual that binds an aspirant to one of the rare Armors of Light and enfuses him or her with light magic, enhancing them beyond mortal reckoning should they survive.

In the Southern Jungles, near the border to the Slither Lands, lives a small band of free slaves.\n        Having escaped their Slither Lord captors, they live in small villages at the edge of the jungle, hiding from Slither Patrols and striking daring raids on their former masters.\n        Their leader is Akáal the Unbroken, and recognizing the danger of Ardera and her rampage through the forest, he helps his Hou allies defend against her invasion.

There has been no rest for Milloween following the harrowing events of Quest for the Mountainshaper. The young elf has been searching for clues as to what darkness will set in motion the events leading to that sordid affair.\n        Knowing her sister [r:WitchQueen] would never consort with demons, Milloween has focused her efforts on the voidborne who were skulking in the shadows as the battle for the Mountainshaper took place. Her search has led her to the most unlikely of places - Halfway across the world, deep within the southern jungles, protected by the very elements of nature.\n        It can hardly be a coincidence that the Burning Fist invasion is happening at the same time.

Being grateful to Milloween, for helping him save his sire Bahra, Godric has vowed to come with her to Jadespark jungle. He is here to help her uncover who was really behind the events that led to the unearthing of the Mountainshaper.
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription40: You come upon a forward regiment of Zealot Legionnaires about to assault a small Hou village - They must be stopped!\n        No honorable Empyreans would plan to commit such devastation. What has become of Ardera's followers?
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription60: You have been discovered by a party of Burning Fist scouts. You can't let them report your location!\n        ----\n        “You will never stop us! We are true followers of the light, Ardera has shown us the one path!”
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription61: Your recent exploits have not gone unnoticed, Ardera herself has sent one of her Heralds to stop you.\n        ---\n        “We will convert or destroy the wretched heathens of this jungle. You cannot stop us! Bow before the glorious Light or die!”
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription62: “The mistress needs the souls of these prisoners - You will free them over my rotting corpse!”
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription63: “By the Light, I will destroy you! The saving of our world is worth any cost - Do not stand in my way!”
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription64: Ardera is performing a dark ritual - Stop her at all costs!\n        -----\n        “You have already lost. The true powers behind the veil can not be denied.”
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription65: “I will deliver your soul to my master. Death by a thousand cuts will be your fate.”
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription67: “The void fills me with power! You know not what you have done. Kill me and it will only ensure my ascension.\n        My master will wreathe this world in darkness and the void will rule for all eternity!
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription45: “Destroy them, in the name of the light!”
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription41: Suddenly the stone beneath your feet starts to shift.\n        You have disturbed something ancient and angry!
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription42: Lightning flashes across a darkening sky, rain and gale force winds tear at your clothes. The storm came out of nowhere!
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription35: 'Was look-sneaking for a nice lizard to make a belt, but your hide will do!'
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription47: A dark sentience observes you through the dead eyes of the warriors as they attack.
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription43: “Finally, the master's plans are coming to fruition, and this time I will get the fallen one. I cannot fail!”
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription31: “Kills it while it's not looking, bois!\n        Oh and takes its stuff too!”
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription68: Roots and branches crawl towards you. It's as if you have angered the jungle itself!
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription71: You have stumbled on a dragon's nest. Luckily, it's only the smaller dragonkin and not the full grown ones.
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription46: You have come upon an ancient burial site, and angered the restless spirits with your trespassing.
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription72: What the creature lacks in intelligence it makes up for in brute strength.
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription70: 'Leave, shoo! This our part of jungle!'
ScratMineDescription: Drops 2 Scrat Mines that explodes when an enemy is near for 100 damage.
OverrideAdventure1ChallengeDescription69: A bunch of naughty Mu-huo have appeared! They are angry that you trampled their favourite flower, you better watch out!
Adventure2Chapter1VictoryCelebration: You have defeated the Burning Fist's Herald!\n        ---\n        As the Herald is dying, a shadow leaves his body and sanity seems to return to him. He manages to utter a few words before passing: “She is not what she appears to be… The ritual, it will destroy us all...”
Adventure2Chapter2VictoryCelebration: You have defeated Ardera, but you are too late. The ritual is complete.\n        ---\n        You watch in horror as the ritual reaches its conclusion. In a cataclysmic blast, it sucks the life from hundreds of her loyal Burning Fist soldiers, funneling their souls towards the body of Ardera. You and all else are sent flying away in the blast.
Adventure2Chapter3VictoryCelebration:
You have struck down Ardera once again, but her mad laughter as she dies leaves you certain the worst is yet to come.
        ---
        As Ardera dies, the magic contained in her releases and is pulled into the Void Portal above, expanding as it consumes her power.
        On the other side of the portal, a massive shadow looms, growing ever larger. The Lord of Shadows is coming.
        THE END
LegendaryInHandBuffDescription: Grant a friendly minion [mec:[r:GiantGrowth]] when played.
GainsRageAndGiantGrowthWhenPlayed: Gains Rage and Giant Growth when played
LegionnaireBossMonkeyGroupDescription: Humans in strange metal armor are assaulting a village! Stop them!
SpearThrowerBossMonkeyGroupDescription: Human scouts! They will report back your location if you don't stop them.
