BannerManBossAdulaDescription: Your recent exploits have not gone unnoticed, as Ardera herself has sent one of her Heralds to stop you. You sense a dark aura around him.\n        ---\n        “You will die for your betrayal, fallen one. Our master has not forgotten what you did.”
BannerManBossArcaneMageDescription: Your recent exploits have not gone unnoticed, as Ardera herself has sent one of her Heralds to stop you.\n        ---\n        “Time to die, Elfling. You will not stop our conversion of these heathens!”
JailerNaomiMonkeyGroupDescription: “Filthy monkeys! Get away from my prisoners!”
JailerNaomiAkaalDescription: “Another slave… I will have you join the others momentarily. Come and let me shackle you once more.”
JailerNaomiAdulaDescription: “The fallen one... Betrayer, she told me of you. You will free the souls of these prisoners over my rotting corpse!”
BrotherAugustusAdulaDescription: “A Voidborne, here...! If any proof of Ardera's words were needed this is surely it. Darkness has taken this jungle, and I will cleanse it.”
BrotherAugustusCaelethDescription: “You have no idea what I have seen, what she has shown us! There is no other way to save the Empyreum. Join us, Brother Caeleth, or I will be forced to end you.”
SerenaBossMonkeyGroupDescription: The evil chief woman is performing some ritual - You better stop it before she finishes it!\n        ----\n        “I will not be stopped by a few animals. Time for you pests to die.”
SerenaBossAdulaDescription: Ardera is performing her ritual - Stop her at all costs!\n        ----\n        “The master's plan is falling into place. All is happening as was foretold! You are but a mere pawn in a web of deceit you can't comprehend.”
SerenaBossCaelethDescription: Ardera is performing a dark ritual. Stop her at all costs!\n        ----\n        “So, Valorian's lapdog finally shows his face. You are right on time, puppet.”
SerenaBossArcaneMageDescription: Ardera is performing her ritual. You sense massive amounts of dark magic behind her facade.\n        ----\n        “The chosen… You were not meant to be here. Your part was not foretold. You will not stop us now!”
GaxBossAdulaDescription: “Brother, what have they done to you? What have I done... They made you suffer for my betrayal.”
VoidSerenaMonkeyGroupDescription: “Damned monkeys! I will rip you from existence. You can't possibly comprehend my power!\n        My master will wreathe this world in darkness and the void will rule for all eternity!”
VoidSerenaAdulaDescription: Filth! How dare you turn from the Void! An eternity of suffering awaits you and all who know you!”\n        My master will wreathe this world in darkness and the void will rule for all eternity!”
VoidSerenaCaelethDescription: Even the brightest light fades in my master's shadow. It will be my pleasure to bring him your soul, Caeleth.”\n        My master will wreathe this world in darkness and there is nothing your brotherhood can do to stop it!”
VoidSerenaArcaneMageDescription: The void fills me with power! You are no match for me now, Chosen... Killing me will only ensure my ascension.“\n        My master will wreathe this world in darkness and the void will rule for all eternity!”
AssassinBossAdulaDescription: “The Fallen one! Finally we meet again! You soul shall be mine!”
SpellfuryCardBuffDescription: Grants [r:RageBuff] and [r:GiantGrowth] to a random minion card in your hand.
CsarVoBattleIntroTutorial1: Ladies and Gentle-beings, welcome to Minion Masters! As always, I'm your host C-SAR, and have I got a doozy for you! Stand up, slither out, or phase into this plane of existence for tonight's match in the first round of the Minion Masters Pan-Galactic Qualifiers! On the Blue Tower, He's The Greased Lightning, The Bold Bow-guy, it's Stormbringer! And over here on the Red Tower, It's not a log, it's wood! It's better than bad, it's good! - it's Tommy the Dummy! Who will emerge victorious!? Masters, prepare to DUEL!!!
CsarVoBattleIntroTutorial2: Welcome to the second round of the qualifiers! It's arrows versus bolts!
CsarVoPlayThatMinionWhenYouHaveTheMana: Play that new minion! Uhm.. when you have the mana, of course...
CsarVoBattleIntroTutorial3: It's the third round of the MMPG Qualifiers, and it's shaping up to be a real shootout!
CsarVoActivatedTheBridges: I've activated the bridges! Capture one to earn XP faster!
CsarVoReadAboutYourPerks: Read a little about your perks - they're important. Earn enough XP, and they'll unlock!
CsarVoYesUnlockedFirstPerk: YES! You've unlocked your first perk! This one gives the Stormbringer global range. Perks are super important to win.
CsarVoBattleIntroTutorial4: Tonight, it's Stormbringer against the MIGHTY RATBO!
CsarVoUpAgainstARealMinionMaster: Let's see how you do against a REAL Minion Master! He's also got perks. Make sure you check them out!
RatboIntro: Ratbo prefers the learn by dying method, so - let's see you fight!
CsarVoFirstRoundOverview: With the first round of the Minion Masters Qualifiers over, let's see who made it through! ...I did not expect a tree to advance, I must say.
CsarVoSecondRoundOverview: Leading up to the third round, contestants fight to reach the gatekeeper! Who will advance, Stormbringer or Eeeek the Sneak?
CsarVoThirdRoundOverview: To join the Minion Masters roster, Stormbringer must defeat the gatekeeper Ratbo, a long time member of this distinguished league. Time to bring the thunder!
CsarYouGotTheCleaver: Yeah, you got the Cleaver! Uugh, he looks so angry.
SpawnofFuryBuffDescription: Has half health and summons a copy of the building.
SpawnUndyingCorpseCardPersistentDataBuff: Summon an Undying Corpse when you play this.
NyloraPerk1CardBuffDescription: Casts Burn the Bridges when played.
CealethPerk2CardBuffDescription: Casts [r:SunBurn] on the friendly minion that is farthest away.
SoulStealBuffDescription: Steals his enemies' souls when he kills them. Decreasing his [r:AttackSpeed] with each soul he collects (Min [math:[math:[math:[av:SoulStealer.AttackCooldown]*1000]/[v:IncreaseAttackSpeedOnKill.ATTACK_COOLDOWN_REDUCTION_MAX]]#1] [r:AttackSpeed]).
ProtectorateCardBuffDescription: Discounted by 1 mana for each encounter you have defeated.
JumpBuffDescription: Jump toward the enemy Master Tower in a straight line.
RecastSpellsCardBuffDescription: This spell will be cast twice.
DisconnectedFromProfileServerPopUp:
You were disconnected from the server, but the match result and your rewards are saved.

We apologize for the inconvenience.

Choose Ok to restart the game.
BurningFistZealotsDescription: If there is only one friendly Zealot in play, she gains [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]], [actorskillinfo:FrenzyBuff,[mec:[r:FrenzyBuff]]], and heals for [v:SelfBurnAndBuffOtherZealots.HEAL_AMMOUNT].
SoulRipBuffDescription:
Rip the soul from the Minion's body and grant a nearby friendly Minion [mec:[r:SpiritBuff]]

[mec:[r:SpiritBuff]]
[r:SpiritBuffDescription]
SoulDetonateBuffDescription: Detonate the Minion's soul and deal damage to nearby enemies.
BarrelShieldDescription: This Scrat wears a barrel which protects it but slows it down. When the barrel is destroyed, the Scrat emerge unscathed.
WardancersDescription: [actorskillinfo:ManaSurgeBuff,[mec:[r:ManaSurgeBuff]]].\n\nTwo fast hitting short ranged fighters. Far better at dealing damage than at receiving it.
WardancerAssassinDescription: [actorskillinfo:ManaSurgeBuff,[mec:[r:ManaSurgeBuff]]]. [actorskillinfo:StealthBuff,[mec:[r:StealthBuff]]].\nWhile [actorskillinfo:Invisible,[mec:[r:Invisible]]]: reduce Speed to [v:StealthAssassinationAttack.STEALTH_SPEED], and if an enemy is in range teleport behind it and do a [actorskillinfo:CrystallineSweep,[mec:[r:CrystallineSweep]]].
MountedElfLordDescription: [actorskillinfo:TrueDamage,[mec:[r:TrueDamage]]]\n\nWhen no enemies are near, Fanriel begins to [actorskillinfo:StormChargeBuff,[mec:[r:StormChargeBuff]]].
InactiveConstructsDescription: Summon 2 dormant [actorskillinfo:CrystalConstruct,[r:CrystalConstruct]] as buildings that can't attack.\n\nThe next time you have 6 Mana, they wake up, turn into Minions, and gains 2 [actorskillinfo:ArcaneSpheres,[mec:[r:ArcaneSpheres]]].
ShieldFromOutsideAttacksDescription: Minions within the barrier cannot take ranged damage from outside of the barrier.
GiveSpiritAndAbsorbDamageDescription: Give a friendly Minion a [actorskillinfo:SpiritBuff,[mec:[r:SpiritBuff]]], damage dealt to your master is instead dealt to that minion.
GroundMinionsAndSummonSkeletonsDescripti: Flying enemies in the area lose flying and are immobilized. While there are enemies in the area summon [v:GroundMinionsAndSummonSkeletons.SKELETON_AMOUNT] [actorinfo:Skeleton,[r:SkeletonUnits]] over the duration.\n\n[actorskillinfo:AccursedAffinity,[mec:[r:AccursedAffinity]]]: Increase [r:GroundMinionsAndSummonSkeletons]'s duration by [cv:GroundMinionsAndSummonSkeletons.Variable] seconds and summon [v:GroundMinionsAndSummonSkeletons.SKELETON_AMOUNT_ASCENSION] more [r:SkeletonUnits].
ExplodeUndyingCorpsesDescription:
Summon an [actorskillinfo:UndyingCorpse,[mec:[r:UndyingCorpse]]].

All friendly Undying Corpses under your command explode and deal damage to nearby enemies.
Can only be cast in your own arena.
ExplodeUndyingCorpsesTriggerDescription: Explode all friendly Undying Corpses for 100 damage in a 3 range radius. If you have no Undying Corpses, remove this card from your hand.
DealDamageConnectedDescription: [actorskillinfo:Overload,[mec:[r:Overload]([cv:DealDamageConnected.Variable])]].\n\nDeal damage in an area and drop a [actorskillinfo:BlastCrystalBuff,[mec:[r:BlastCrystalBuff]]]
Adventure3Description: While Milloween is traveling to Jadespark Jungle in an attempt to stop the Void invasion she saw in her vision, Leiliel is on a desperate quest to find her the help she desperately needs. Her only hope is finding her old friend, Lord Fanriel, then pray he'll believe the astonishing story of Milloween's premonitions and commit his army to the deadly jungle… before it's too late.
Adventure3Chapter1Description: Rumors that Mordar has returned have spread throughout the Empyreum. Are you up for challenging the Mad Summoner himself, along with his host of undead lieutenants?.
Adventure3Chapter1VictoryCelebration: As Mordar is struck down, a burst of ethereal fire envelops him and he explodes, sending a shockwave in all directions. All around you, the undead start to collapse, as the power that sustained them withers.
HighMageLeilielAdventuresDescription: [r:HighMageLeilielAdventures] studied under [r:ArcaneMage] and have mastered the arts of explosive Crystal Magic.\n\n[f:Hint: Fill your deck with spells, and use [r:DealDamageConnected] strategically for maximum destruction!]
CrystalBlastAdventuresPerkDescription: Once every 20 seconds, cast Resonating Blast at an enemy's location when they die.
SpellArcanistsOnSpellAdventuresPerkDescr: Summon a [r:CrystalMage] whenever you play a spell with mana cost 4+ (by your Master Tower).
HealingPotionsRelicDescription: The first time a friendly Minion reaches 50% health, heal them for 100 Health.
RestlessDeadPerkDescription: Add 2 copies of [r:UndyingSkeleton] to your deck. They cost 2 Mana.
SummonGhostsAndHauntingHuggersPerkDescri: Summon 5 [r:Ghost] minions and 10 [r:HauntingHugger] minions by your Master Tower.
SummonSpiritmancersAndBlastmancersPerkDe: Summon 2 [r:Spiritmancer] minions and 2 [r:Blastmancer] minions by your Master Tower.
SummonMassUndyingSkeletonsPerkDescriptio: Summon 10 [r:UndyingSkeleton] minions by your Master Tower.
SummonMountedElfLordsPerkDescription: Summon [0] [r:MountedElfLord] minions by your Master Tower.
BlastmancerBossDescription: An explosion is heard to the left of you. As the smoke clears a shambling silhouette comes your way. Its eyes glow a deep purple and are filled with sinister intent.\n----\n“Yesss, your souls will give me the boom I've been looking for.“
MordarBossDescription: The Mad Summoner himself stands before you, seeking to add you to his endless ranks of undead soldiers.
CursedEnemiesSummonSkeletonOnDeathPerkDe: Enemies that die with Curse summon a [r:Skeleton] on death.
DealDamageWhenFriendlyMinionDiesPerkDesc: Whenever a friendly minion dies, it deals damage to all enemy minions in 10 range.
FriendlyUndyingSkeletonsHaveRageAndHaste: All friendly Undying Skeletons have [r:Rage] and [r:FrenzyBuff].
NecroticPowersDescription: Accursed Card that costs 4 less added to your deck for this match.
PaupersMightRelicDescription:
Whenever you play a [r:Common] card, a random friendly minion gains [mec:[r:FrenzyBuff]].

[mec:[r:FrenzyBuff]]
[r:FrenzyBuffDescription]
WarForWhisperingWoodsDescription: Minions spawn for both sides every 45 seconds. The amount of units spawned depends on Master's level.
DealDamageConnectedBuffDescription: Blast Crystals in play will explode on play.
StormChargeBuffDescription: Moves faster and deals damage to all nearby enemies. Keeps charging until an enemy survives the charge.
DormantBuffDescription: Is a Building and cannot attack or move.
OverrideAdventure2ChallengeDescription75: Before you stands none other than the ancient menace known as Mordar the Mad. He is being attacked on all sides by Empyrean and Crystal Elves, but against all reason, it still looks as if he's winning. Perhaps you can turn the tide of the battle?
OverrideAdventure2ChallengeDescription74: As you fight your way deeper into the battlefield, you come across a terrifying being. This dark creature is no mere mindless undead, however. A cruel intelligence lurks behind its dark gaze which is now fixed on you.
OverrideAdventure2ChallengeDescription73: The sounds of battle almost overwhelm you, as a mad melee is fought amongst the dense trees. You find yourself on the wrong side of the battle lines, and the enemy has just noticed you.
OverrideAdventure2ChallengeDescription47: You've barely taken any steps into the battlefield when ravenous Skeletons start pulling themselves out of the ground. These simple cannon fodder of Mordar's army have been overwhelming your allies - Perhaps you can thin their numbers?
OverrideAdventure2ChallengeDescription51: Angry screeches surround you, as an already frightened nest of Frostfeather Owls were spooked by your movements!
OverrideAdventure2ChallengeDescription45: This simple regiment of Empyrean Archers have been driven mad by the sight of Mordar's unearthly creations and are attacking everything they come across. You have no choice but to defend yourself...
OverrideAdventure2ChallengeDescription52: This irate Stoutheart is none too happy about a battle occurring in his favourite logging spot. He's going on a rampage, attacking friends and foes alike - You'll have to subdue him before he turns his anger towards you too!
OverrideAdventure2ChallengeDescription68: Even the very forest around you is turning against you, tangling and entwining at your very legs with prickly, sharp thorns. This has to be the work of Mordar the Mad!
OverrideAdventure2ChallengeDescription36: You seem to have come across some sneaky Scrats logging with their not-so-sneaky machinery, trying to use the confusion to their advantage.\n        “Ack! Ugly flesh-things see us! Pointy-eared trees worth lots of cheese - You no stop us!”
OverrideAdventure2ChallengeDescription35: You stumble upon a Scrat's sniping nest. He's using the chaos of the battle to hunt protected Elven beasts - And he's turned his attention to you!
OverrideAdventure2ChallengeDescription49: This poor Stoutheart seems to have become lost during the battle, and the hordes of undead haven't fared well for his sanity. Snap him out of it!\n        “No, stop it! Get out of my head! You're not real, you're not!”
OverrideAdventure2ChallengeDescription54: The farther into the forests you go, the stronger Mordar's minions appear to be getting. If nothing else, it's a sign you're on the right path, but the relentless undead are obstructing you at every turn.
OverrideAdventure2ChallengeDescription33: You're suddenly bombarded by explosive concoctions from the trees around you - Seems like a group of Scrats are treating this battle like a sport.\n        “Ha-ha! So many targets! Me never have this much fun back home!”
OverrideAdventure2ChallengeDescription46: A shrill shriek pierces both the forest and your ears as ghastly spectres soar through the air, encircling your group.
OverrideAdventure2ChallengeDescription72: A raging beast storms through the crowds, trampling elven and undead alike!
OverrideAdventure2ChallengeDescription59: The sound of heavy wing beats comes from the sky as an enormous dragon lands in the clearing in front of you. It doesn't seem to be part of Mordar's army...
OverrideAdventure2ChallengeDescription10: --Bonus Master, not part of the story--\n        Fergus combines the two things he likes most - Brew and Brawling!
--Bonus Master, not part of the story--\n        Jolo is always looking for cunning ways to get rich, famous, or both!
OverrideAdventure2ChallengeDescription50: The Wolf creature moves to attack you with his pack, but his movements seem strained, like he's struggling against his own actions. Is he being controlled?
NewBpPrimer:
The Battle Pass gets condensed into a Monthly Season Pass
        100 tiers of rewards delivered in 50!
        Premium price down to 1500 rubies
        No Season Tokens
        All cards guaranteed in both Free & Premium
        3 new cards per Season Pass
        1 Season Pass per month
        More rewards & tier changes
        Coming with the new Expansion
PiercingShotBuffDescription: After a delay, release a piercing shot that deals [v:PiercingShot.PIERCING_DAMAGE_MULTIPLIER] times the normal damage to all Units in a straight line.
DealDamageAndGiveFearDescription: Deal [actorskillinfo:TrueDamage,[mec:[r:TrueDamage]]] to the closest enemy Minion in the area.\n\nInflict [actorskillinfo:FearBuff,[mec:[r:FearBuff]]] on the target if it survives.
SmallFireDragonIllusoryDescription: Summons an [actorskillinfo:Illusion,[mec:[r:Illusion]]] of a [actorskillinfo:DragonWhelp,[r:DragonWhelp]]\n\n[actorskillinfo:VoidborneWound,[mec:[r:VoidborneWound]]]: Increase cost by 1 mana and summon [cv:SmallFireDragonIllusory.ExtraSummonAmounts*0] more.
DoompocalypseDescription: [actorskillinfo:MythicBuff,[mec:[r:MythicBuff]]].\nWhen [r:DoompocalypseFirst] attacks a Minion with [v:KillInjuredTargetAndProduceFear.KILL_THRESHOLD]% or less health, [actorskillinfo:DestroyBuff,[mec:[r:DestroyBuff]]] it and inflict [actorskillinfo:FearBuff,[mec:[r:FearBuff]]] on nearby enemy Minions.
DemonAlterDescription: When played, it spreads a Void Soul of an [actorskillinfo:Incubus,[r:Incubus]], [actorskillinfo:Succubus,[r:Succubus]] or [actorskillinfo:ShadowWhelp,[r:ShadowWhelp]] across the arena every 10 seconds (Max. 3).\n\nWhen a friendly Minion consumes a Void Soul, the Minion contained within is summoned by the [r:DemonAlter].
FearBuffDescription: Run away in fear from the source in a straight line.
VoidBrothersDescription:
This card has two sides. Switch sides on play.

Side A - Summon an [actorskillinfo:Assassin,[r:Assassin]] with [mec:[r:RageBuff]].
Side B - Summon a [actorskillinfo:FireImp,[r:FireImp]] with [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]].
BrotherHeroMasterCardDescription: [r:BrotherHeroFirstName] does [v:AbilityAttackMultipleTargets.TARGETS] attacks in an area, each attack targeting a random enemy Minion.
BrotherHeroAttackDescription:
[r:BrotherHeroFirstName] uses his heirloom blade for a slow but powerful attack.

Damage: [av:BrotherHero.Damage] ([dps:BrotherHero] DPS)
Cooldown: [av:BrotherHero.AttackCooldown] seconds
Range: [av:BrotherHero.Range]
PassiveSkillHealFriendlyOnCooldownDescri: [r:BrotherHeroFirstName] [actorskillinfo:HealsKeyword,[mec:[r:HealsKeyword]]] up to [v:PassiveSkillHealFriendlyOnCooldown.HEAL_TARGETS] injured friendly Minions for [v:PassiveSkillHealFriendlyOnCooldown.HEAL_AMOUNT] health.\n\nCooldown: [math:[v:PassiveSkillHealFriendlyOnCooldown.HEAL_COOLDOWN]/1000] seconds.
AbilityMassiveDamageInAreaDescription:
Add a one-use copy of the card [mec:[r:BrotherHeroMasterCard]] to [r:BrotherHeroFirstName]'s deck every [math:[v:AddSearingLightOnTimer.COOLDOWN]/1000] seconds.

[mec:[r:BrotherHeroMasterCard]]
[r:BrotherHeroMasterCardDescription]
AbilityDoubleDamageAndHealingDescription: Double [r:BrotherHeroFirstName]'s Damage, including damage dealt by [mec:[r:AbilityMassiveDamageInArea]]\n\nAlso doubles healing from [mec:[r:PassiveSkillHealFriendlyOnCooldown]] perk and the duration of the effect of the [mec:[r:HolyFireBuff]] perk.
BrotherHeroDescription: [r:BrotherHeroFirstName] is devoted to the light. He wields it to heal his allies and invoke righteous fury on his enemies.
BrotherHeroHint: Hint: Add [r:Empyrean] cards to your deck to empower [r:BrotherHeroFirstName]'s attack, and use [r:BrotherHeroMasterCard] to pick off weak enemies.
DoompocalypseHeroAttackDescription: When attacking a Minion with less than [v:KillInjuredTargetAndProduceFear.KILL_THRESHOLD]% health left, [actorskillinfo:DestroyBuff,[mec:[r:DestroyBuff]]] it and inflict [actorskillinfo:FearBuff,[mec:[r:FearBuff]]] on nearby enemy Minions.\n\n[actorskillinfo:MythicBuff,[mec:[r:MythicBuff]]].
PassiveSkillDealDamageInOwnArenaOnTimerD: Deal [v:PassiveSkillDealDamageInOwnArenaOnTimer.DAMAGE] damage to a random enemy Minion in [r:DoompocalypseFirst]'s arena every [math:[abilityVariable:258]/1000] seconds.
PassiveSkillDealDamageInOwnArenaExtremeD: Mar'Dred Impales ALL Minions and makes the run away in fear!
InjuredHighlandWoodsmanDescription: Starts with half health and [actorskillinfo:AntiFrenzy,[mec:[r:AntiFrenzy]]].\n\n[actorskillinfo:HiglandRevelry,[mec:[r:HiglandRevelry]]]: gain [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]] and give nearby enemy Minions [mec:[r:AntiFrenzy]].
SpeedAdjustAndHealDescription: For the duration of the spell, all Enemies have their speed reduced by [v:SpeedAdjustAndHeal.SPEED_MODIFIER] (Min. 1), while all friendly Minions gain [v:SpeedAdjustAndHeal.SPEED_MODIFIER] speed (Max. 7) and [actorskillinfo:HealKeyword,[mec:[r:HealKeyword]]] [math:[v:SpeedAdjustAndHeal.TOTAL_HEAL_AMOUNT]/[sv:SpeedAdjustAndHeal.Duration]] health per second. Also triggers [actorskillinfo:HiglandRevelry,[mec:[r:HiglandRevelry]]].
QuestingMilitiaKnightDescription: [actorskillinfo:SingleShieldBuff,[mec:[r:SingleShieldBuff]]], [actorskillinfo:BulwarkBuff,[mec:[r:BulwarkBuff]]], [actorskillinfo:ShieldOfLight,[mec:[r:ShieldOfLight]]]\n\nWhenever Avea shields at least one other Minion, gain [actorskillinfo:LegionBuff,[mec:[r:LegionBuff] (1)]].
ShieldOfLightDescription: When taking damage give up to [v:ShieldOfLight.SHIELD_COUNT] nearby allies Shield.
HypnotizeBuffDescription: Attack random friendly units within range, if able.
BattlePassPrimerText: More than 20,000 rubies worth of value for 1,250 rubies - over 90% off!
OverrideAdventure3ChallengeDescription10: With the guidance of High-Mage Leiliel, Valorian makes his way to Jadespark Jungle with little time to spare. This once peaceful land is at war with the demonic Voidborne factions, and a pious rage rises from within the Empyrean warrior.\n        “Vile fiends! I will drive you from this land no matter what it takes!”

The battle to save Jadespark Jungle from the Burning Fist and their Voidborne allies has been long and arduous. Just as hope seemed to be lost, an Empyrean expedition led by Valorian, consisting of his personal guard, arrived to support their elven allies. The faith Milloween put in Leiliel to find help has been proven correct. Now it's time for some arcane payback!

The time has finally come. Nylora's old master, Mar'Dred, is resurfacing in the Jadespark Jungle with the aid of the Burning Fist. Those not of her kind still do not trust her, but she does not need their help. She simply wants to commit the ultimate act of defiance, even if it costs her everything… And just maybe redeem herself in the process.
OverrideAdventure3ChallengeDescription47: The unfortunate soul of a warrior that fell in battle lingers on in this form due to the corruption. It attacks anything on sight mindlessly - Vanquish it to put it to rest.
OverrideAdventure3ChallengeDescription51: A family of owls migrated here from the Highlands, only to get caught in the middle of this battleground. They attack you in fear!
OverrideAdventure3ChallengeDescription44: This hellish portal is being used to summon countless Voidborne enemies to the battlefield - Destroy it and cut off their reinforcements!
TerrorBrutusBossDescription: A rampaging beast charges through the battlefield, attacking all in sight!
OverrideAdventure3ChallengeDescription48: You suddenly come upon a playful Puff looking to have some fun. You try to shoo it away, as this is no place for such an innocent creature to be, but it refuses to let up. You groan and just hope you can resolve this matter quickly.
OverrideAdventure3ChallengeDescription60: You come upon a group of Empyrean soldiers that had aligned themselves with Ardera. Now they are nothing more than Corrupted drones of the Voidborne, cutting down their own kind that they once swore to fight alongside.
OverrideAdventure3ChallengeDescription57: You find a suspicious looking Crossbow Dude separated from the rest of the Empyrean army, searching for something or someone. Is he with the Burning Fist? There's only one way to find out...
OverrideAdventure3ChallengeDescription66: A twisted gurgling monstrosity crawls out from the foliage, mindlessly clambering towards you.
OverrideAdventure3ChallengeDescription49: One of the Stouthearts that arrived with Valorian's expedition has gone mad from the corruption!\n        “I can't let you stop them now! They will save us, all of us!”
OverrideAdventure3ChallengeDescription43: You are ambushed by a Voidborne Assassin!\n        “Our plans are almost complete! I will not let you interfere!”
OverrideAdventure3ChallengeDescription41: The ancient elementals of the land were not long ago valiantly defending the denizens of the jungle. Now, influenced by the Voidborne corruption, they have turned on their allies.
OverrideAdventure3ChallengeDescription46: You can feel the ever-growing corruption in the land around you the deeper you go into the Jungle. You must be getting close to the source by now, you think to yourself, but your keen senses alert you to the fact that something horrifying is approaching fast.\n        Souls upon souls of those that have fallen at the hands of the Voidborne army rush you, wailing out in their sorrow - It's up to you to make sure they can find their peace.
OverrideAdventure3ChallengeDescription71: As you approach the source of the corruption, you stumble upon a breeding ground for the Voidborne's twisted Dragons. Destroying it will make the skies a lot less threatening!
Adventure4Description: Ardera's plans are almost complete. Mar'Dred's arrival is nigh. Face your fears and save Jadespark Jungle.
Adventure4Chapter1Description: It's time to make your counter-attack against the Voidborne demons. It all comes down to this - You win this war, or Jadespark Jungle may never see light again. No pressure.
Adventure4Chapter1VictoryCelebration: You strike the demon with one final blow, putting all of your might and will into it as you let out a powerful scream. The impact of the attack forces him back, before he yells out in both excruciating pain and hatred as he is dragged back into the portal from whence he came, before he can fully enter your world.\n        You almost collapse from the weight of your exhaustion as the corruption slowly starts to dissipate around you, but your allies prop you up. You question whether Jadespark Jungle can ever truly return to the tranquil state it was in before, but you rest assured that regardless of what happens now, you have prevented a great tragedy from befalling the world.\n        --THE END--
BannerManBossAdventure4Valorian: “Our actions will save the world itself! You can't possibly comprehend what is at stake here!”\n        You feel a gut-wrenching disgust at this Empyrean that let himself fall to the Voidborne. You ready your sword to put an end to his madness.
BannerManBossAdventure4Milloween: “Our actions will save the world itself! You can't possibly comprehend what is at stake here!”
BannerManBossAdventure4Nylora: The sight of you sends the corrupted Empyrean into an unfathomable anger.\n        “You! How dare you defy the Master?! I shall put you down in his name like the wretch that you are!”
GaxBossAdventure4Nylora: “Forgive me, Brother. I did not have the strength to end your suffering before. But I will not falter again.”
AssassinBossAdventure4Nylora: You feel a twinge of anger from the Voidborne Assassin as you defend yourself from his blow.\n        “Fallen One, this ends here!”
WizardPuffBossAdventure4Nylora: This harmless Puff wants to play with you, but it just angers you further. How could something retain such innocence at a time like this?! Your anger becomes uncontrollable and you lash out at it.
DoompocalypseBossAdventure4Valorian: You arrive at the center of the corruption, and just in time - The master of the demonic factions is only just starting to materialise. You stand before quite possibly the most menacing and intimidating demon you've ever seen. But you can't back down from this fight - Both your valor and the will of all those you are fighting with, and for, forbid you from it. He observes you and gives an arrogant chuckle.\n        “It would seem at least one of these Empyrean dogs can dare to stand before me. Unfortunate then that it is the last error you shall ever make!”
DoompocalypseBossAdventure4Milloween: You arrive at the center of the corruption, and just in time - The master of the demonic factions is only just starting to materialise. You feel yourself tremble slightly in the presence of this colossal demon, whose eyes seem to pierce your very psyche. But you can't turn back now - Everyone you've ever cared about is relying on you to defeat this vile fiend once and for all. He observes you and gives a snide snicker.\n        “You are but a young child playing with essence she does not understand. How could you possibly hope to harm me? Allow me to show you TRUE power, elf!”
DoompocalypseBossAdventure4Nylora: You arrive at the center of the corruption, and just in time - The master of the demonic factions is only just starting to materialise. The only thing you feel upon the sight of your old Master is the purest essence of rage. You can barely hold back from throwing yourself at him on sight. Mar'Dred witnesses this and lets out a despicable cackle.\n        “Fool! You are nothing more than a rebellious runt. If you so desperately wish to be put out of your misery, then I shall grant you such!”
VoidSerenaBossAdventure4Valorian: “Hah! Was this the best your precious Empyreum could offer? You are too late, cur!”
VoidSerenaBossAdventure4Milloween: “I'll silence you for good this time, Elf!”
VoidSerenaBossAdventure4Nylora: The witch in front of you that once called herself a saviour sneers at you with contempt for your survival. You ready your sword to put her down for good.
PassiveSkillOn5CostEmpyreanResetArmorsAn:
Whenever you play an [r:Empyrean] Minion card, cast [mec:[r:TeleportAndHolyFire]] on it. Whenever you play an [r:Empyrean] Building card, play [mec:[r:CallToArms]] on it. Cooldown: 12 seconds.

[mec:[r:TeleportAndHolyFire]]
[r:TeleportAndHolyFireDescription]

[mec:[r:CallToArms]]
[r:CallToArmsDescription]..
PassiveSkillCastSmiteOnSpellCastDescript: Whenever you cast a Spell, also cast [r:DamageAndHolyFire] at its location.
PassiveSkillSpawnCaelethEveryxEmpyreanUn: Every fourth [r:Empyrean] Minion Card also summons [r:CaelethDawnhammer]
CombustMinionsOnLowHPDescription: Cast Combustion on a friendly Minion whenever their health is below 50%.
GamblersLightningDescription: After you have summoned 40 Friendly Minions, cast a global [r:ChainLightning] that either heals friendly units or damages enemies, or has a 30% chance to cast both. Upon affecting a unit, there is a 30% chance that Gambler's Lightning will fork and cast another Gambler's Lightning. Different forks can affect the same unit. Deals 10% damage and 10% healing to Master towers.
PassiveSkillDoomPocalypsePortalsDescript: Mar'Dred opens 2 Void Portals on either side of his Master Tower, spawning random Voidborne minions every 8 seconds.
PassiveSkillDealDamageInOwnArenaOnTimerA: Casts [r:DealDamageAndGiveFear] every 2 seconds on a random enemy within [r:DoompocalypseFirst]'s arena.
PassiveSkillInstantKillAnyMinionBelow40P: Any enemy minions with less than 40% of their Max Health are instantly killed.
GenerateXPAndManaOverTimeDescription: XP and Mana gains are substantially increased.
PassiveSkillOn5CostMinionResetArmorsAndS: When played, this Minion will reset and activate all [r:ArmorOfLight] abilities.
PassiveSkillSpawnCaelethEveryxEmpyreanUn: When 4 [r:Empyrean] Minions are played, [r:CaelethDawnhammer] will be summoned as well.
PassiveSkillCastSmiteOnSpellCastCardBuff: Will also cast [r:DamageAndHolyFire] at this spell's location.
AreYouSureYourAccountWillBeDeletedText: Are you sure? Your current account will be deleted and replaced by the imported account.
AreYouReallySureYourAccountWillBeDeleted: FINAL WARNING YOU ARE ABOUT TO WIPE THE PROGRESS ON THE CURRENT USER ACCOUNT\n
AreYouSureYourAccountWillBeDeleted: BE ADVISED: You are about to OVERWRITE your progress. Any progress on the current steam account will be lost. This action cannot be undone.
AccountsuccesfullyImportedPleaseRestartY: Account succesfully imported, please restart your game
DiscordDiscontinuationExplanation:
Minion Masters is officially discontinuing Discord support.
        Don't worry though, we are dedicated to a continued support for the community.
        In order to continue to play Minion Masters you will have to migrate your account to Steam.
        Instructions:
        Copy you account code via the button below
        Open the game in Steam and go to the ingame settings settings -> Migrate Discord User
        Input your code in the field
        [r:[v:InputTextsService.Interact]] OK
        [mec:Please be aware that you will overwrite any progress done on the steam profile.]
AccountFailedToImportedPleaseCheckYourCo: Account failed to import, please check your code.
SpellExplodeAndRollAndBlueGolemDescripti: A giant meteor slams the ground, dealing [sv:SpellExplodeAndRollAndBlueGolem.Damage] damage on impact. It rolls forward dealing [math:[sv:SpellExplodeAndRollAndBlueGolem.Damage]/2] damage over [sv:SpellExplodeAndRollAndBlueGolem.Duration] seconds, pushing all enemy Minions in its path, until finally a [actorskillinfo:BlueGolem,[mec:[r:BlueGolem]]] rises from the crater.
DealWhipDamageInAreaDescription: [actorskillinfo:Cohort,[mec:[r:Cohort] (3)]]\n\nCalls upon the spirit of [r:Ahmun] to attack the area twice for 200 damage. (Damage dealt to the opponent Master is reduced to [v:DealWhipDamageInArea.MASTER_DAMAGE_PERCENT]%)
MushroomPuffDescription: [actorskillinfo:BridgeHugger,[r:BridgeHugger]].\n2 seconds after it reaches the bridge, it turns into a [actorskillinfo:BerryBuff,[r:BerryBuff]].
DealDamageOnSacrificeDescription: Add a stack for each [r:Sacrifice]. Mana Cost +1 for each stack.\n\nOn play: Fire 1 poison projectile + 4 for each stack, dealing 3.5 seconds of Poison to the nearest enemy Minion.
SummonSlitherboundAdvancedDescription: Summon [cv:SummonSlitherboundAdvanced.MainSummonAmount] [mec:[actorskillinfo:SlitherLancerSlave,[r:SlitherLancerSlave]]s].\n\nIf you've played a card within the last [cv:SummonSlitherboundAdvanced.Variable] seconds, summon [cv:SummonSlitherboundAdvanced.ExtraSummonAmounts*0] [actorskillinfo:SlitherDarterSlave,[r:SlitherDarterSlave]]s instead.
TinyElectricDragonDescription:
When you play a spell, [r:TinyElectricDragon] pops out of existence for [math:[v:DodgeWhenCastSpell.BLINK_DURATION]/1000] seconds.
On return do [actorskillinfo:ShockingReentry,[mec:[r:ShockingReentry]]].

[actorskillinfo:ZenChiFlow,[mec:[r:ZenChiFlow]]]: do [actorskillinfo:ShockingReentry,[mec:[r:ShockingReentry]]] when played.
ResolveAllPoisonDamageDescription: All nearby Enemy Minions take all [mec:[r:PoisonBuff]] damage immediately.\nCosts 1 Mana.
CardQuestLevelDescription: This card is upgraded when it reaches level [cv:QuestingMilitiaKnight.Variable].
PasiveSkillSummonRagePickUpDescription:
Summon an Ember of Flame Every 30 seconds on a random bridge. When a friendly Minion picks it up, all nearby friendly Minions gain [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]]

[mec:[r:RageBuff]]
[r:RageBuffDescription]
PasiveSkillSUpgradeRagePickUpsDescriptio:
Melee Minions now gain [actorskillinfo:SuperRageBuff,[mec:[r:SuperRageBuff]]] from Embers of Flame.

[mec:[r:SuperRageBuff]]
[r:SuperRageBuffDescription]
RingTheBiggerGongDescription: All poisoned Enemy Minions take remaining poison damage immediately.\n\nGain [v:PassiveSkillSlitherBeastAsMaster.StacksPerKill] [r:PassiveSkillGongTheArmy] stacks per kill.
SlitherBeastSlamAttackDescription: [r:SlitherRammingBeast] forcibly slams its head into buildings.
SlitherBeastPoisonAttackDescription:
[r:SlitherRammingBeast] Spits its potent saliva at its target inflicting [math:[v:PoisonOnBasicAttack.RAMMINGBEAST_POISON_DURATION]/1000] seconds of [mec:[r:PoisonBuff]] to it and all nearby enemy Minions.

[mec:[r:PoisonBuff]
[r:PoisonBuffDescription]]
GiveLycanthropyWhenMoreThanXMaxHPDescrip: Friendly ground Minions with more than 100 max HP gain [actorskillinfo:LycanthropyBuff,[mec:[r:LycanthropyBuff]]].
PocketShieldDescription: Gives all friendly Minions in the area [actorskillinfo:SingleShieldBuff,[mec:[r:SingleShieldBuff]]].
ApepChallengeDescription: You're met with acid drenched fangs and a piercing glare as a slithering figure slides from the shadows. It's time you learned what a god's wrath looks like.\n        ----\n        “ Chainsss will ssuit you! “
CagedProwlerAdventureDescription: The prowlers has been uncaged!  - Stop the beasts!\n\n“Roar!”
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription43: From the void slip these new foes, ready to collect the blood of you and the escaping [r:Slave].\n        ---\n        “Your red, is mine!”
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription46: Your veins feel icy as a curse approaches, attracted to the [r:Slave] that have fallen here.\n        ----\n        “Steel your will or they'll possess you!”
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription31: You've stumbled upon a horde of [r:Scrat]s scouring the place for loot they would deem valuable. One notices you... and your gear.\n        ----\n        “Damn.“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription36: You round a corner only to be met by a vibrating heap of blades and metal with a mad scrat peering down at you from behind the machine.\n        ----\n        ""Vrooom""
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription37: You heard it before you saw it. Digging! The metal monstrosity catches your eye before you catch the [r:Scrat] operator's.\n        ----\n        “Back, man things! The shiny is mine.“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription74: An explosion is heard to the left of you. As the smoke clears a shambling silhouette comes your way. Its eyes glow a deep purple and are filled with sinister intent.\n        ----\n        “Yesss, your souls will give me the boom I've been looking for.“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription38: Something whizzes past your head! You see the glint of a scope in the distance. A sniper.\n        ----\n        “Everybody find cover!“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription44: The hairs on your back stand straight as terror seizes you.  There's only one thing that could induce such fear. The Void is upon us.\n        ----\n        “They'll come in many.“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription33: Oh no! You've caught a [r:Grenadier] oiling its fur with its own explosive toxin. No way you can be allowed to leave in one piece now.\n        ----\n        “Reeee!“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription27: Impossibly, the desert seems to grow cold around you, as you hear the wails of the damned echo across the dunes.\n        ----\n        “What new horror have you awakened?“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription79: The hissing of snakes bounce around in your head. Is this reality, the doing of a spirit...or worse.\n\n“Ssss“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription73: Large eyes have haunted you the entire flight. Finally they reveal their owner to you.\n        ----\n        “I-It's cute. Or is it?“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription78: Making your way to the palace steps that lead into the lower city you're blocked by a slithering taskmaster squad, keen on thwarting your descent.\n        ----\n        “Lets do this!“
PassiveSkillSpawnDivineShieldTotemWithRe:
Spawn [v:PassiveSkillSpawnDivineShieldTotemWithRespawnOnSacrifice.TOTEMCOUNT] [mec:[r:ShieldTotem]] with infinite lifetime that respawn after [v:PassiveSkillSpawnDivineShieldTotemWithRespawnOnSacrifice.SACRIFICESNEEDED] sacrifices after their deaths.


        For every [math:[v:PassiveSkillSpawnDivineShieldTotemWithRespawnOnSacrifice.SLAVESPAWNDELAY]/1000] seconds a [mec:[r:ShieldTotem]] is destroyed summon a [r:Slave].
PassiveSkillSpawnSlavesOnDeathPerMaxHeal: On non-[r:Slave] minion death, summon 1 [mec:[r:Slave]] per [v:PassiveSkillSpawnSlavesOnDeathPerMaxHealth.MAXHEALTHSEGMENTS] max health (min 1).
PassiveSkillChangeSlitheringSummonsMaste: Change the master into a different Slithering Summons Minion every [math:[v:PassiveSkillChangeSlitheringSummonsMasterOverTime.DELAY]/1000] seconds
PassiveSkillSpawnSlitheringsummonsUnitOv: Summon a [r:Lynx], [r:LivingStatue] or [r:Soulstealer] Minion every [math:[v:PassiveSkillSpawnSlitheringsummonsUnitOverTime.DELAY]/1000] seconds
PassiveSkillSpawnMasterMinionWhenChangin: Whenever the Master changes into a new Minion, summon a copy of it in each lane.
PassiveSkillEmpoweredSoulStealerExplosio: On max stacks reached, fire all stacks as global projectiles to random targets for [mec:[v:IncreaseAttackSpeedOnKill.EXPLOSION_DAMAGE] damage]
PassiveSkillSoustealerMasterDoubleMaxSta: Doubles max stacks.\nGains double stacks on kill if a friendly Minion has [mec:[r:RageBuff]]
PassiveSkillSpawnSlaveOnKillDescription: Summon 1 [r:Slave] each time an enemy Minion dies.
PassiveSkillHealOnSacrificeDescription: Heal [v:PassiveSkillHealOnSacrifice.HEALONSACRIFICE] health per [r:Slave] sacrificed by your Minions.
ReduceRandomCardCostByMissingHPPercentag: Reduce a cards cost by the percentage of missing health (min 1 mana reduction)
BarrelBetterDescription: When [Master] gets damaged he summons a [r:MeleeScrat]
PassiveSkillCagedProwlerAsMaster: Can't attack until he emerges from his cage at half health.
PassiveSkillSpawnMasterOnFieldTwiceEvery: Summon a copy of the Master in each lane every [math:[v:PassiveSkillSpawnMasterOnFieldTwiceEveryXSeconds.DELAY]/1000] seconds.
PassiveSkillUncageIfCagedGiveRageAndFren: If caged, uncage and spawn [v:PassiveSkillUncageIfCagedGiveRageAndFrenzyToProwlersIfUncaged.COUNT] [r:Prowler]s, if Uncaged, all friendly [r:Prowler]s gains [mec:[r:RageBuff]] for the rest of the match.
PassiveSkillSpawnScratHordeEveryXSecondi: Summon [cv:ScratHorde.MainSummonAmount] [r:MeleeScrat]s in alternating lanes every [math:[v:PassiveSkillSpawnScratHordeEveryXSecondinDifferentLane.DELAY]/1000] seconds.
PassiveSkillPlayBridgeBuddiesEveryXSecon: Summon a [actorskillinfo:MeleeScrat,[r:MeleeScrat]] on both bridges every [math:[v:PassiveSkillPlayBridgeBuddiesEveryXSeconds.DELAY]/1000] seconds.\n\nIf you already own the bridge, the [r:Scrat] gains [actorskillinfo:BarrelShield,[mec:[r:BarrelShield]]].
BountyExtaticDescription: Gain 1 XP and summon an [mec:[r:ArmoredScrat]] when the opponents Master takes damage.
PassiveSkillPoisonMortarDescription: Inflicts [sv:SpellPoisonMortar.Duration] seconds of [actorskillinfo:PoisonBuff,[mec:[r:PoisonBuff]]] to all enemies in the area every [math:[v:PassiveSkillPoisonMortar.DELAY]/1000] seconds.
PassiveSkillGongTheArmyDescription: Summon [r:Slither] Minions based on stacks from [mec:[r:RingTheBiggerGong]] (1 mana per stack)
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription34: You spot a group of [r:Slave] being terrorized by a [r:WhirlyScrat]. One [r:Scrat] should never have so much power. Stop it!\n        ---\n        “Move weak things!“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription54: The skeleton crashes to the ground under the weight of your strike. Is it dead?\n        ----\n        “Death has yet to find it.“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription32: A cough and the sound of tiny feet rush towards you. You glance over your shoulder but you're too late. It's right on you!\n        ----\n        “Rarrgh!“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription70: The sound of a spring release catches your attention, eye's dart over your shoulder but nothing. Just a...launch pad? Your gut already knows. Eyes motion up to the howling scrat seemingly falling from the sky. The trap has been set.\n        ----\n        ""Reeeaaaahhhhh!""
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription80: You push through what feels like an endless wave of [r:Slave], running away from the exit. What could have put such fear in them that they'd run away from their freedom? Your thoughts are cut short by the crack of a whip.\n        ----\n        “You too shall be bound“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription75: A ghastly glow rounds the corner, a pile of bones mumbling to himself. Is he lost? Insane? Maybe both. It stops dead still, eyes darting to meet yours.\n        ----\n        “Insane or lost - doesn't matter now.“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription10: Defending a group of [r:Slave] from a horde of [r:Scrat]s is a more heroic [r:Scrat] with a cape. You lock eyes causing it to jump into action, mistaking you for more unwanted company.\n        ----\n        “I'll give my life to protect them!“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription26: [r:Slave] go flying through the air, hitting the ground all around you. The culprit is already charging its next barrage. You mustn't let it fire!\n        ----\n        “Stop it!“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription29: A chilling wind whips around you. Its owner can't be far.\n        ----\n        “This cold is as unnatural as what's to come.“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription81: Oh no they released the [r:Prowler]s! They are coming for all escaping [r:Slave], stop the beasts!\n        ---\n        “Roar!”
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription39: You swear you saw a head poking out of that barrel. Slowly walking over you lean in for a better look...\n        ----\n        “BOO!“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription77: You're met wd ith acid drenched fangs ana piercing glare as a slithering figure slides from the shadows. It's time you learned what a god's wrath looks like.\n        ----\n        “Chainsss will ssuit you!“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription82: Your nose knew before your eyes did. Prepare yourself, the horde is upon you!\n        ----\n        “*Crazed laughter*“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription10: The eldest of a great species that once inhabited the western desert. They were hunted to near extinction by the Slither. It and many of its brethren were taken as trophies. It's time for revenge.\n\n[f:Hint: [r:OverrideAdventure4ChallengeTitle1015] is a versatile Master that can be played with most decks. Add more ways to inflict [r:PoisonBuff] to get the most out of [r:OverrideAdventure4ChallengeTitle1015]'s perks.]
Ting, Teng & Tung are three young mischievous Mu-Hou siblings. Renowned acrobats, they are known far and wide in the jungle villages for their great acrobatic performances and trickster ways.

In the Southern Jungles near the border to the Slither Lands, lives a small band of free [r:Slave]. Having escaped their Slither Lord captors, they live in small villages on the edge of the jungle, hiding from Slither Patrols and striking daring raids on their former masters. Their leader is Akáal the Unbroken.

Like all the Brothers and Sisters in the Chapter of Light, Caeleth was accepted when he was still only a child. Having given up his old life and family when joining, his entire existence has been grueling training and preparation for the Ascension ritual. A ritual that binds an aspirant to one of the rare Armors of Light and enfuses him or her with light magic, enhancing them beyond mortal reckoning should they survive.

Milloween is the young and unlikely wielder of the Staff of Eternity, one of the 6 great artifacts of magic. Having been ripped from her otherwise mundane elfish life, and into a world of terrible danger she is looking for a way to prevent the horrible visions of the end of the world that staff has shown her. With few allies that believe her and fewer yet capable of helping her, it is a lonely existence as she travels the world in search of answers.
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription71: You have stumbled on a dragon's nest. Luckily, it's only the smaller dragonkin and not the full grown ones.\n        ---\n        “Step carefully.“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription65: The air splits in front of you, a sorceress stepping from it's void. She's watched battle after battle and couldn't wait any longer for a chance at you.\n        ----\n        “Do not disappoint me.“
OverrideAdventure4ChallengeDescription48: A sense of warm happiness fills you as you approach the strange creature. However the mischievous look in its eyes tells you it wants to play, hopefully not too rough.\n        ---\n        “Such a nice feeling.“
Adventure5Description: The [r:Slave] have rebelled! Could this be the fall of Apep the Serpent God? You must aid the [r:Slave] in escaping Apep's City and evading capture.
Adventure5Chapter1Description: Billows of smoke rise from Apep's palace, the [r:Slave] have begun their rebellion and the city is on high alert! You have arrived just in time to aid the [r:Slave] in their escape, lead them from the City of Apep's Magnificence to the Jade Bay. A near impossible task.
Adventure5Chapter2Description: A loud boom rings out over the turbulent city, arresting the attention of all those nearby. All eyes are locked to the highest point of Apep's pyramid palace, smoke rising from a gaping hole. Silhouetted in the smoke stands the self proclaimed, ”magnificent figure of Apep”, his fury is clear for all to see!
Adventure5Chapter3Title: Out of the pan and into the fire
Adventure5Chapter3Description: You enter the ruins. They stretch for quite a ways, but if you hurry you could make it to the tree line before sun down. As you run you think you can hear a hiss on the wind. The Snake god is gaining on you.
Adventure5Chapter3VictoryCelebration: You've inflicted a grievous wound on Apep, causing the god to flee. His last words sends a shiver down your spine. “ Ifffff you think me ssso terrible, what will you think of those within I wonderrr?! “\n        ---\n        As you stare into the deep shadows of the forest, Apep's last words take on meaning. It all looked so much friendlier from afar. You take a deep breath and steel your emotions, leading the [r:Slave] into the forest and toward their freedom...you hope.
GiveTurncoatToLowestFactionHPOnMinionSpa: On minion summon, give all Minions of the same faction, on the team with the least total health of that faction, [mec:[r:TurncoatBuff]]
GivePoisonToHighestHPMinionEveryXSeconds: Give the Minion with the highest Health [mec:[r:RageBuff]] and [math:[v:GivePoisonToHighestHPMinionEveryXSeconds.POISONSECONDS]/1000] seconds of [mec:[r:PoisonBuff]] every [math:[v:GivePoisonToHighestHPMinionEveryXSeconds.DELAY]/1000] seconds
GiveSpiritOnDeathDescription: On Death give a [mec:[r:SpiritBuff]] to friendly Minions for every [v:GiveSpiritOnDeath.SPIRITHEALTH] max Health
ScrapTechDescription: Whenever you draw an [r:Outlander] Card gain [v:OutlanderAffinityTechManager.TECH_PER_MANA] [r:Scraps] per mana, even if this card is not in your hand.
ClusterGrenadeDescription: Deal damage to enemy Minions in a small area.\n\n[actorskillinfo:ScrapTech,[mec:[r:ScrapTech]]] Explode an extra time for every [v:SpellClusterGrenade.SCRAP_PER_EXTRA_EPLOSSION] [r:Scraps] spent (Max [v:SpellClusterGrenade.MAX_EXTRA_EPLOSSION])
ScrapYardDescription: [actorskillinfo:ScrapTech,[mec:[r:ScrapTech]]]: Summons a random [v:SummonMinionsOnScrapsCollected.MIN_COST]-[v:SummonMinionsOnScrapsCollected.MAX_COST] mana [r:Outlander] ground Minion card every [math:[v:SummonMinionsOnScrapsCollected.TIME_PER_TICK]/1000] seconds.\nSpend [math:[v:SummonMinionsOnScrapsCollected.SpawnThreshold]/[v:SummonMinionsOnScrapsCollected.MIN_COST]] [r:Scraps] per mana of the card.
DroneBuzzerLegendaryDescription: [actorskillinfo:PilotedBuffOutlander,[mec:[r:PilotedBuffOutlander]]].\n\nPay [v:TakeDamageOverTimeIfNoScraps.TAX] [actorskillinfo:ScrapTech,[mec:[r:Scraps]]] per second. If you cannot, the [r:DroneBuzzerLegendaryUnit] instead loses [v:TakeDamageOverTimeIfNoScraps.HEALTH_LOSS_PER_TICK]% health.
TargetedBuffDescription: If in range, Enemy Ranged Minions will attack this unit first and deal +[v:BaseActorImpl.TARGETED_EXTRA_DAMAGE_PERCENT]% damage. Reveals [actorskillinfo:Invisible,[mec:[r:Invisible]]] enemies.
PassiveSkillUpgradeShadowDanceDescriptio: [Master]'s shield is doubled and it drops an [r:ClusterGrenade] when it leaves the battlefield
R3KTDescription: Wielding dual 37-PR Autoblasters, [r:R3KT] poses a threat to any foe standing in its way. Using the secrets of the shadows it will enter the battlefield joined by illusions to take matters into its own hands.\n\n[f:Use [r:ShadowDance] at the right time to keep [r:R3KT] on the field for as long as possible.]
R3KTHint: Fill your deck with cheap cards if you want to flood the field with Shadow Clones, but use cards with cost [v:R3KTIncreaseAttackSpeed.ATTACK_SPEED_UP_THRESHOLD] or more if you want [r:R3KT] to be as strong as possible.
ShadowDanceAbility2Description: Reduce the cooldown of [r:ShadowDance] by [math:[v:ShadowDanceOnTimer.COOLDOWN]/1000-[v:ShadowDanceOnTimer.SHORT_COOLDOWN]/1000] seconds and [r:GunKata] by [math:[v:GunKataOnTimer.COOLDOWN]/1000-[v:GunKataOnTimer.SHORT_COOLDOWN]/1000] seconds.
RadarDescription:
Inflicts closest enemy Minion in range with [actorskillinfo:TargetedBuff,[mec:[r:TargetedBuff]]].

[actorskillinfo:AbilityCard,[r:AbilityCard]] - [mec:[spellinfo:AirStrike,[r:AirStrike]]].

[actorskillinfo:ScrapTech,[mec:[r:ScrapTech]]]: Spend 30 [r:Scraps] to summon 2 [actorskillinfo:BattleDrone,[r:BattleDrones]] to protect this.
AirStrikeDescription: A [r:AirStrike] Fighter deals damage to enemies in a straight line across the field.\nCosts 3 Mana.
BloodConnectionDescription: Inflicts [actorskillinfo:TrueDamage,[r:TrueDamage]] to your Master equal to [v:DamageHeroHalfOnDamage.RETURN_DAMAGE_PERCENT] percent of the damage taken by this Minion - even overkill damage.
TransformBuffDescription: Convert a Unit to another. If it is Mythic, deal damage equal to [v:ActorConstants.MYTHIC_DESTROY_DAMAGE_PERCENT]% of Max Health instead, and only convert it if the damage is enough to kill it.
TrueDamageDescription: Attacks go through any protection, such as [r:FrozenBuff], [r:SingleShieldBuff] or [r:DivineShield].
HealKeywordDescription: Replenish a Minions health. Flying Minion's only gain half health back.
CardBuffJingLongDescription: [r:TinyElectricDragon] gets scared easily around spells, hiding in the space between realms
CardQuestDescription: This card is upgraded when it completes its quest.\n[r:CardQuestAddition]
CardQuestRewardDescription: Gain this upgrade by completing the quest.\n[r:CardQuestAddition]
CardQuestAddition: Each copy of a card must complete the quest individually to gain the reward.
KingPuffBasicAttackDescription:
A slow but powerful attack.

Damage: [av:RoyalPuff.Damage] ([dps:RoyalPuff] DPS)
Cooldown: [av:RoyalPuff.AttackCooldown] seconds
Range: [av:RoyalPuff.Range].
SummonBuffPickUpsOnTimerDescription:
Every [math:[v:PerkCooldownTracker.COOLDOWN]/1000] seconds, receive a Royal Gift that can be picked up by your Minions.
Reduce the cooldown by half the cost of every [v:PerkCooldownTracker.MIN_REDUCTION_COST] - [v:PerkCooldownTracker.MAX_REDUCTION_COST] mana card you play.

[mec:[r:KingPuffPickUpA]]: [r:KingPuffPickUpADescription]

[mec:[r:KingPuffPickUpB]]: [r:KingPuffPickUpBDescription]

[mec:[r:KingPuffPickUpC]]: [r:KingPuffPickUpCDescription]

[mec:[r:KingPuffPickUpD]]: [r:KingPuffPickUpDDescription]

[mec:[r:KingPuffPickUpE]]: [r:KingPuffPickUpEDescription]
KingPuffPickUpADescription: If picked up by a friendly minion give it and up to [math:[v:SummonBuffPickUpsOnTimer.A_BUFF_AMOUNT]-1] nearby friendly Minions [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]].
KingPuffPickUpBDescription: If picked up by a friendly minion give it and up to [math:[v:SummonBuffPickUpsOnTimer.B_BUFF_AMOUNT]-1] nearby friendly ground Minions [actorskillinfo:SingleShieldBuff,[mec:[r:SingleShieldBuff]]].
EmpowerTrickswapDescription:
Summon a [mec:[actorinfo:KnightPuff,[r:KnightPuff]]] for each friendly Minion affected by [r:TrickSwap] (Max [v:SpellTrickSwap.MAX_SPAWNS]).

[mec:[r:KnightPuff]:]
Health: [av:KnightPuff.MaxHealth]
Range: [av:KnightPuff.Range]
Damage: [av:KnightPuff.Damage]([dps:KnightPuff] dps)
[r:SingleShieldBuff].
TrickSwapAbilityDescription:
Add a one-use copy of [mec:[r:TrickSwap]] to your  deck every [math:[v:TrickSwapOnTimer.COOLDOWN]/1000]  seconds.

[mec:[r:TrickSwap]]
[r:TrickSwapDescription]
SkeletonDescription: Brittle creatures, but they are cheaper by the dozen.
MoveScratSpawnerDescription: Move the tunnels and summon [v:SummonScratsAtInterval.SUMMON_AMOUNT] [actorskillinfo:MeleeScrat,[r:Scrats]] at the new position.
NovaScratDescription: Launch [v:FireMissilesInAllDirections.ROCKET_AMOUNT] rockets in a circle. Give self [actorskillinfo:FearBuff,[mec:[r:FearBuff]]] after attack unless you have [actorskillinfo:ScratSwarm,[mec:[r:ScratSwarm]]]
PlaySelfDescription: This card will play itself if you have had enough mana and have not played a card for [math:[v:PlaySelfOnMana.FIRE_DELAY]/1000] seconds
SpellDealDamageOrGiveSoulsDescription: [v:SpellDealDamageOrGiveSouls.SOUL_AMOUNT] souls infest an area, absorbing into Minions dealing [sv:SpellDealDamageOrGiveSouls.Damage] damage each.\n\n[actorskillinfo:AccursedAffinity,[mec:[r:AccursedAffinity]]]: +[v:SpellDealDamageOrGiveSouls.ADDITIONAL_ASCENSION_SOULS] extra souls.
MalfunctioningDroneWalkerDescription: [actorskillinfo:ScrapTech,[mec:[r:ScrapTech]]]: Spend [v:GetDroneEscortIfScraps.SCRAP_COST] [r:Scraps] to summon a [actorskillinfo:BattleDrone,[r:BattleDrone]] to protect [r:MalfunctioningDroneWalker].
SpinningProjectileFromHeroDescription: Throw a spinning [r:SpinningProjectileFromHero] from your Master that bounce off of Units and arena edges until it deals damage [v:SpinningProjectileFromHero.MAX_HITS] times or it expires.
CrystallineSweepDescription: Deal [v:StealthAssassinationAttack.TELEPORT_DAMAGE] damage to enemies in range and [mec:[r:Overload] ([v:StealthAssassinationAttack.OVERLOAD_PER_JUMP])]
CopyCardBuffDescription: This card will remove itself from your deck when you play it
DealDamageIfSpellBuffDescription: If you play this card, [r:EliteSwarmerAntiMagic] will deal [v:DealDamageOnSpellCast.DAMAGE_PER_TARGET] damage to his [v:DealDamageOnSpellCast.TARGETS_PER_TRIGGER] closest enemy Minions
BrawlerDescription: This shadowy beast steps through the nether to catch enemies off-guard.\n\n[actorskillinfo:AbilityCard,[r:AbilityCard]] - [mec:[spellinfo:TailWhipAbility,[r:TailWhipAbility]]].
AbilityCardDescription: On play, add this unit's ability card to your hand. It remains in your hand as long as the unit is alive. It costs 1 more Mana with each consecutive play.
TailWhipAbilityDescription: A'Zog [r:Phase] to a nearby position, damaging enemy Units in the area.\nCosts 1 Mana.
DroneTankBossDescription:
[actorskillinfo:MythicBuff,[mec:[r:MythicBuff]]].
[r:RubyFirstName] drives toward the enemy Master, shooting at enemies with her two [mec:[actorskillinfo:SideCannons,[r:SideCannons]]].

[actorskillinfo:AbilityCard,[r:AbilityCard]] - [mec:[spellinfo:SpellMainCannon,[r:SpellMainCannon]]].
SideCannonsDescription: Each of the two [r:SideCannons] target independently of one another, wreaking havoc to nearby Enemies
SpellMainCannonDescription: [r:Ruby] shoots her main cannon on target location to deal damage to enemies in the area.\nCosts 1 Mana.
SpellMultipleMissilesDescription:
[actorskillinfo:Overload,[mec:[r:Overload] ([cv:SpellMultipleMissiles.Variable])]].
On each draw: add [v:SpellMultipleMissiles.MISSILES_PER_DRAW] [r:SpellMultipleMissileStacks] stack (Max. [v:SpellMultipleMissiles.MAX_STACKS], starts at [v:SpellMultipleMissiles.STARTING_MISSILES]).

Fire an [r:SpellMultipleMissile] at a random target in the area for each [r:SpellMultipleMissileStacks] stack.
CopyOpponentMinionDescription:
On every draw, become a copy of a random non-mythic minion card in an opponent's hand.
If no minions are found, this card can be played to summon a single [actorinfo:PlasmaMarine,[mec:[r:PlasmaMarine]]]

[actorskillinfo:ScrapTech,[mec:[r:ScrapTech]]]: Spend [v:GiveHasteIfScraps.SCRAP_COST] [r:Scraps] to give the summoned Minions [actorskillinfo:FrenzyBuff,[mec:[r:FrenzyBuff]]].
SpellKnockbackAndDamageDescription: Push all enemies in the area away and deal a small amount of damage.
CopyOpponentMinionBuffDescription: This card is a copy of one of your opponents cards, obtained through [r:CopyOpponentMinion].
ManaDebuffDescription: Increase Mana by 1 with every play
SlowEnemiesAndMakeFrozenFieldDescription: Inflict [actorskillinfo:AntiFrenzy,[mec:[r:AntiFrenzy]]] and [actorskillinfo:FrozenBuff,[mec:[r:FrozenBuff]]] to Ground enemies in the area.
FrozenBuffDescription: Minion cannot move or attack and takes 50% less damage and healing from outside sources.
RimefyreBuffDescription: Ground enemies that stay within the [r:RimefyreBuff] for more than [math:[v:DragonFlameSweepAttack.FREEZE_DELAY]/1000] seconds become [actorskillinfo:FrozenBuff,[mec:[r:FrozenBuff]]].\n\n[actorskillinfo:FrozenBuff,[mec:[r:FrozenBuff]]]: [r:FrozenBuffDescription]
PermafrostBuffDescription:
Minion cards in the 2 closest slots to this card gain [actorskillinfo:FrozenBuff,[mec:[r:FrozenBuff]]] when played. Remove [r:Permafrost] stacks equal to the cost of that Card.

You cannot play this card while there are [r:Permafrost] stacks on it.

[actorskillinfo:FrozenBuff,[mec:[r:FrozenBuff]]]: [r:FrozenBuffDescription]
AdventurePartyLeaderDescription: On draw, shuffle a one-use [actorskillinfo:Priestess,[r:Priestess]] and a [actorskillinfo:CrystalMage,[r:CrystalMage]] card into your deck if they are not already in your deck.\n\nOn play, Summon a [actorskillinfo:InjuredHighlandWoodsman,[mec:[r:InjuredHighlandWoodsman]]] and also play all other members of the adventuring party from your hand. Pay [v:AdventurePartyLogic.COST_INCREASE_PER_PARTY_MEMBER] less Mana for each other card played.
IcebreakerDescription:
[actorskillinfo:IcebreakerAbility,[mec:[r:IcebreakerAbility]]].

First attack on a Minion inflicts [actorskillinfo:FrozenBuff,[mec:[r:FrozenBuff]]].
Deals [math:[v:FreezeOnFirstAttackOnMinion.DAMAGE_MULTIPLIER]-100]% increased damage to [mec:Frozen] targets.
SlowEnemiesAndMakeFrozenFieldBuffDescrip:
Create a [r:SlowEnemiesAndMakeFrozenFieldBuff] on the ground that inflicts [actorskillinfo:AntiFrenzy,[mec:[r:AntiFrenzy]]].

Ground enemies that stay inside the [r:SlowEnemiesAndMakeFrozenFieldBuff] for [math:[v:DragonFlameSweepAttack.FREEZE_DELAY]/1000] seconds become [actorskillinfo:FrozenBuff,[mec:[r:FrozenBuff]]].

[mec:[r:AntiFrenzy]]: [r:AntiFrenzyDescription]

[mec:[r:FrozenBuff]]: [r:FrozenBuffDescription]
FrozenAuraBuffDescription:
Inflicts [actorskillinfo:AntiFrenzy,[mec:[r:AntiFrenzy]]] on nearby enemy ground Minions. Enemies that are affected for more than [sv:SlowEnemiesAndMakeFrozenField.Duration] seconds become [actorskillinfo:FrozenBuff,[mec:[r:FrozenBuff]]]. The aura lingers after death.

[mec:[r:AntiFrenzy]]: [r:AntiFrenzyDescription]

[mec:[r:FrozenBuff]]: [r:FrozenBuffDescription]
IceDragonsBreathDescription: Rimargaal flies over the arena spraying his icy breath at everything in his path, damaging and inflicting [actorskillinfo:FrozenBuff,[mec:[r:FrozenBuff]]] to enemy ground units in two large areas.\n\n[f:Chilling!]
BrollAdventureDescription: Broll, the Jovial Giant is well-known throughout the Summit for his diplomatic prowess in negotiating with the other tribes. His secret is ample supply of Frostberry Brew.\n\n[f:Hint: add Minion cards from as many factions as possible to get the most out of Broll's perks.]
BrollPerk1Description: Every 10 seconds, a random Faction is chosen. Whenever you play a Minion card of that faction, it costs 2 mana less and gains Haste
BrollPerk2Description: Add 2 random cards to your deck with mana cost equal to the amount of different Faction cards you have in your deck. Costs 0 mana.
BrollPerk3Description: Add Mountainshaper to your deck. It costs 0.
Adventure6Chapter1Description: Underneath the serene, snow-covered slopes of The World Peak stretches what remains of an ancient dwarven kingdom. Within its once-sacred halls, the great frost dragon [r:IceDragonFirst] has moved in and claimed them as his own, along with their considerable treasures!
Adventure6Chapter1Victory: The fearsome [r:IceDragonFirst] is defeated, and to the victor belong the spoils!
AddAFriendToLobby: Add a friend to the lobby!
LobbyClosedCreateNewLobby: Lobby has been closed, create a new one!
SpawnRandomTrapsDescription: The dungeon is booby-trapped! Every 30 seconds, five traps will spring at random places in the arena.
CoaxTheDiplomancerDescription: "I will consume both your mind and soul!"
CoopBattle: Co-op - Play with friend or guild mate!
DoubleUpDescription: Select a card to duplicate. Reduce its mana by 1.
RimergaalPerk1Description:
Whenever a friendly minion dies, create a frozen field on the ground that inflicts [mec:[r:Frozen]] on enemy minions.

[mec:[r:Frozen]]
[r:FrozenBuffDescription]
RimergaalPerk2Description:
Friendly minions has [mec:[r:TrueDamage]], and whenever [r:IceDragonFirst] takes damage, cast [r:SpeedAdjustAndHeal].

[mec:[r:TrueDamage]]
[r:TrueDamageDescription].

[mec:[r:SpeedAdjustAndHeal]]
[r:SpeedAdjustAndHealDescription]
LegendaryMancerNoRestForTheWickedDescrip: Whenever an enemy under the effect of Hypnotize is killed, summon a copy of it.
LobbyNotSynced: Wait for your co-adventurer to get ready
AdventurePartyBuffDescription: Play the leader of the party to also play this.
PassiveSkillCagedProwlerAsMasterDescript: Cannot attack while caged. Released at half health.
FactionBasedCostReductionAndGainHasteBuf: Reduced Mana and has Haste while this Faction is chosen.
SpellRegrowDescription: On Draw, [actorskillinfo:BerryBuff,[mec:[r:BerryBuff]]] twice.\n\nTarget friendly Minion absorbs all your [r:BerryBuff]s. The Minion is healed for [v:SpellRegrow.HEAL] health for each [r:BerryBuff], then [actorskillinfo:StunBuff,[mec:[r:StunBuff]]] all nearby enemy Minions.
RitualStatueDescription: When performing a Sacrifice while this is a building, this becomes a Minion, gains [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]] and heals for 250 health.
FanaticSlaveDescription: Deals 50% increased damage to Minions that are Poisoned or Stunned.\n\nVessel - [r:FanaticSlaveFirst] counts as a [r:Slave] when performing a [r:Sacrifice] (without killing [r:FanaticSlaveFirst]).
FengTheEnlightenedDescription: When played, gain a [actorskillinfo:FengBuffs,[mec:[r:FengBuffs]]] for each card of a different faction in your hand.\n\n[f:Feng has traveled the world in search of a worthy opponent to best him in battle. So far, he has yet to meet his match.]
PilotedBuffDescription:
Summons a Minion on death. The Minion type depends on the faction.

[mec:[r:Scrat]]
DPS: [math:[av:MeleeScrat.Damage]/[av:MeleeScrat.AttackCooldown]]
Health: [av:MeleeScrat.MaxHealth]
PowerUpAbilityDescription:
Reset [r:ScratZapTank]'s attack. It permanently shoots an extra bolt of lightning when attacking.

Discard this card when it has been played 3 times or if [r:ScratZapTank] dies.
Costs 1 Mana.
ShowdownArenaDescription: Ages ago, this arena was home to an intergalactic game show that forced contestants to battle hordes of brutal foes for superstardom.
Adventure7Chapter1Description: In the Scratlands, the king is determined by whomever has the biggest gun. Zipp, the smartest and most reckless [r:Scrat] has built such a weapon using stolen [r:Outlander] technology and therefore poses a threat to everyone (including himself).
SpawnRandomMineOrTurretInArenaDescriptio: Summons random [r:Scrat] defenses in the arena every 20 seconds. Owner is the one in who's arena they were summoned.
RubyAdventureDescription: N3W PR1M3 D1R3CT1V3: C0D3 //47163471337// - 3XT3RM1N4T3 ALL L1F3F0RMS 0N S1GHT. 3NGAG3 W1TH 0V3RWH3LM1NG F0RC3.\n\n[f:Hint: Add cards with low mana cost to your deck to get the most out of [r:PassiveSkillEscortOnMinionSpawn].]
PassiveSkillAssignMainCannonToFourthCard:
Permanently replaces a card in your hand with [mec:[r:SpellMainCannon]].

[mec:[r:SpellMainCannon]]
Fire the [r:SpellMainCannon]. It costs 1 mana less for every 5 Mana you spend.
PassiveSkillEscortOnMinionSpawnDescripti:
Minion cards you play are escorted by a [mec:[r:BattleDrone]].

[mec:[r:BattleDrone]]
Health: [av:BattleDrone.MaxHealth]
Damage per sec: [dps:BattleDrone]
Rage2RelicDescription:
When a friendly Minion gains [r:RageBuff], give it [mec:[r:SuperRaged]] instead.

[mec:[r:SuperRaged]]
[r:SuperRageBuffDescription]
TimeyWimeyRelicDescription: Recast any spell you cast after 20 seconds.
StarshipTroopersRelicDescription:
Whenever you spend [v:SpawnMarineOnTechSpend.SCRAPSPERMARINE] [r:ScrapTech], summon a [mec:[r:PlasmaMarine]] at a random location.

[mec:[r:PlasmaMarine]]
Health: [av:PlasmaMarine.MaxHealth]
Damage per sec: [dps:PlasmaMarine]
BigAndSmallRelicDescription: When you play a 6-mana card, play a random 1 or 2-mana Minion from your deck.
StalwartRelicDescription: Increase Health of your Minions by +30%
LeilielsColdShoulderRelicDescription:
Whenever you play a ranged Minion card, cast [mec:[r:CrystalVortex]] in front of it.

[mec:[r:CrystalVortex]]
[r:CrystalVortexDescription]
PassiveSkillPlayPowerUpAbilityCardDescri: Zipp Powers! He can hit an extra target and summons more Scrat Machines.
PassiveSkillFireMissilesUntilThereAreNoE: Fire missiles at all enemy Minions in the arena until there are no more left.
MissileTankBossDescription: It mustn't get to the Scrat King! We will use our boom-machines to turn all land into Scrat land!
Adventure7Chapter1VictoryDescription: You dispatched the so-called Scrat King. His KaBOOMing days are over, and so is his reign.
ScratHordeBossDescription: A horde of Scrats flocks around you! There is no way to escape!
ValorianAdventureHeroDescription: [r:BrotherHero] is the commander of the Chapel of Light and is duty-bound to cleanse the Empyreum of the [r:Voidborne] threat with his Brothers of Light.\n\n[f:Hint: Add [r:Empyrean] cards to your deck as well as spells to take full advantage of Valorian's perks.]
GraspingThornsBossDescription: You come across a giant thicket of nasty looking vines. Who knows what might hide in there...
JailerNaomiDescription: Who goes there? You are now property of the Empyreum!
ScratLauncherBossDescription: You spot a crazed-looking Scrat atop a rickety tower. ""INTRUDEEEEERS!"" it yells while launching itself from the tower towards you.
OverrideFourthCardWithMainCannonDescript: Fire the Main Cannon! Reduce cost by 1 for every 5 mana you spend on cards.
SummonBuffsForOtherCArdsDescription: Feng gains a buff for each card of different factions in your hand.
MagneticBombsDescription: Rolls from your Master Tower, gathering speed the farther they roll and attach themselves to the nearest Minion and explodes after a delay. Only one bomb can be attached to each Minion at any time.\n\nDeals half damage to Master towers.
OutlanderTankDescription: [actorskillinfo:PilotedBuffOutlander,[mec:[r:PilotedBuffOutlander]]].[f:\n\nThe barrel is completely proportional to the rest of it, tank you very much!]
AltarOfPurificationDescription: Every [v:GlobalArmorOfFire.COOLDOWN_SECONDS] seconds, the next time a friendly Minion within range is damaged, set [actorskillinfo:HolyFireBuff,[mec:[r:HolyFireBuff]]] to the ground underneath it.
KorrrGothDescription:
Starts as [spellinfo:SealofKorrrgoth,[mec:[r:SealofKorrrgoth]]] in your deck.

[actorskillinfo:KorrrgothsHammerBuff,[mec:[r:KorrrgothsHammerBuff]]], [actorskillinfo:MythicBuff,[mec:[r:MythicBuff]]].
If [r:KorrrgothFirst]'s attack kills a Minion, [actorskillinfo:ResummonBuff,[mec:[r:ResummonBuff]]].
SealofKorrrgothDescription:
[actorskillinfo:ResummonBuff,[mec:[r:ResummonBuff]]] all [r:Voidborne] cards in your hand.

When you have played this card twice, replace it with [r:Korrrgoth].

[mec:[r:ResummonBuff]]
[r:ResummonBuffDescription]
KorrrgothsHammerBuffDescription: [r:KorrrgothFirst] casts his mighty hammer that deals damage on impact, then deals damage and knocks back all Minions as he drags his hammer back.
ResummonBuffDescription: Replace a [r:Voidborne] card in your hand with a random [r:Voidborne] card that costs 1 more Mana until played (keeps its current cost).
CrossbowImpDescription: When a nearby friendly Minion dies, gain [actorskillinfo:FearBuff,[mec:[r:FearBuff]]].\n\n[f:Imp screams are notorious for inducing terror and panic... in their own hearts.]
CityWatchDescription: Summon a [actorinfo:Legionair,[r:Legionair]] and 2 [actorskillinfo:CrossbowDude,[r:CrossbowDudes]].\n\n[actorskillinfo:EmpyreanArmy,[mec:[r:EmpyreanArmy]]]: Increase Mana cost by [v:EmpyreanArmyCostIncrease2.INCREASE] and gain [actorskillinfo:LegionBuff,[mec:[r:LegionBuff] (3)]].
ProwlerJumpDescription: Jumps at an enemy from a distance, dealing double damage.
FengBuffsDescription:
[mec:[r:Accursed]]: gain [r:SpiritBuff]
[mec:[r:CrystalElf]]: gain [r:ManaSurgeBuff]
[mec:[r:Empyrean]]: gain [r:BulwarkBuff]
[mec:[r:Outlander]]: Escorted by a [r:BattleDrone]
[mec:[r:Scrat]]: Summon 3 [r:Scrats]
[mec:[r:Slither]]: Inflicts 3.5 seconds of [r:Poison] on attack
[mec:[r:Highlander]]: Inflicts [r:AntiFrenzy] on attack
[mec:[r:Voidborne]]: gain [r:Rage]
[mec:[r:ZenChi]]: gain [r:GiantGrowth]

MastersOfMisadventureMayhemDescription: Draft an ""Adventure"" Master at the start of the Mayhem.
RelicsOfOldMayhemDescription: Draft 2 ""Adventure"" Relics at the start of the Mayhem that gives you powerful bonuses.
AdventureBossesMayhemDescription: You play as a random ""Adventure"" boss every match.
FactionWarsMayhemDescription: You gain +20% faster Mana if your entire deck is of the same Faction when starting the match.
JinxedMayhemDescription: Every 5 seconds, a random Minion on both teams get a random Jinx: ([mec:[r:GorRakkSacrifice]], [mec:[r:SpawnOfFury]], [mec:[r:TeleportAndHolyFire]] or [mec:[r:LycanthropyBuff]]).
HologramsMayhemDescription: Each time you play a Minion, summon an Illusory copy of it in the opposite lane.
StartFrozenCardBuffDescription: Starts with Frozen when played. Removes [r:PermaFrostDebuff] from [r:IceDragonFirst] equal to this card's mana cost.
ResummonCardPersistentDataDescription: Card replaced with a random [r:Voidborne] card.

IdsWelcomeBody:
Welcome to the Minion Masters Mobile Alpha!

        Minion Masters is a fast-paced deck-building strategy game where your goal is to outsmart your opponents.

        This is an early version of the game with lots of features incoming.

        Thank you for testing, and don't forget to have fun and fill out the survey, as it will help us a lot in making Minion Masters Mobile the best it can be!

IllusionDescription: Looks like a real version of the Minion to the opponent. It has little health and reduced damage - but it explodes when killed to deal damage to nearby enemy Minions
FireImpFireKeywordDescription: Using his incredible pyromantic powers, the [r:FireImp] deals heavy damage to all enemy ground Units in the area.
WitchWolfBeamKeywordDescription: Channeling the powers of the Moon, Bahra deals heavy damage to all enemy Units in the area
NetherStrikeDescription: When [r:MalsharFirst] kills an enemy Minion, turn Mal'Shar and a random friendly [r:Voidborne] Minion [mec:[r:Invisible]] and [mec:[r:Phase]] them in a random direction.\n\n[mec:[r:Invisible]]: [r:InvisibleDescription]
CallToArmsSpawnDetailsDescription: Heal target friendly Building for 15% of its max health, summon 1 [actorinfo:Warrior,[r:Warrior]] and 2 [actorinfo:CrossbowDude,[r:CrossbowDude]] to protect it.
WhipAttackKeywordDescription: [r:HeraldAhmun] deals massive damage to enemies in a narrow but long area
SpiritfireDescription: Cover the ground in a straight line
EliteSwarmerAntiMagicDescription: The first [v:DealDamageOnSpellCast.AMOUNT_OF_TRIGGERS] times a spell is played by any player, deal [v:DealDamageOnSpellCast.DAMAGE_PER_TARGET] damage to the closest [v:DealDamageOnSpellCast.TARGETS_PER_TRIGGER] enemy Units within range.

EarthElementalPebbleCardDescription: [actorskillinfo:Myriad,[mec:[r:Myriad]([cv:EarthElementalPebbleCard.Variable])]].\n\nDies after attacking and plants a new [r:Pebble] after 5 seconds where it attacked
MyriadDescription: On draw, add the specified number of single-use copies of this card to your deck.
HighlandBearDescription: [actorskillinfo:ThickHide,[mec:[r:ThickHide]]].\nDue to the harsh environments, the bears from the Highlands have developed a different kind of resistance.
LegendaryHighlandBearDescription: [actorskillinfo:TauntBuff,[mec:[r:TauntBuff]]], [actorskillinfo:ThickHide,[mec:[r:ThickHide]]].\n\nWhen at 50% health for the first time, [r:LegendaryHighlandBearFirst] roars, deals damage to all nearby enemies, gains [actorskillinfo:SuperRageBuff,[mec:[r:SuperRageBuff]]] and [actorskillinfo:FrenzyBuff,[mec:[r:FrenzyBuff]]].
RocketScratDescription: [actorskillinfo:BarrelShield,[mec:[r:BarrelShield]]].\n\nLaunches itself at nearby enemies, damaging both enemies and itself.
DiplomancerDescription: First attack to each enemy inflicts [actorskillinfo:HypnotizeBuff,[mec:[r:HypnotizeBuff]]] for [math:[v:HypnotizeOnAttack.HYPNOTIZE_DURATION]/1000] seconds.
ThickHideDescription: Reduce Minion and Spell damage taken by [v:ReduceIncomingDamage.DAMAGE_REDUCTION] (min. [v:ReduceIncomingDamage.MINIMUM_DAMAGE])

CrakgulDoomcleaverAdventureBossDescripti: Commander of the Gor'Rakk Legions, Crakgul is known worlds over for his savagery and cruelty.\n\n[f:Hint: Play Minion cards with high damage to trigger Overkill as often as possible.]
