RimergaalPerk3Description: [r:IceDragonFirst] enters the field and gains [r:RageBuff] and [r:FrenzyBuff]. You win if you either defeat [r:IceDragonFirst] or [r:IceDragonFirst]'s tower. [r:IceDragonFirst] keeps her current health.
Campaign1Fight2Description: Use Searing Light on high value targets such as Scrat Tank or Stun Lancers to disrupt Diona's strategy.
Campaign1Fight3Description: Ratbo is good at swarming, but your Shieldguard of Light handles it well! Remember to inspect your cards, and tap and hold to the info button for Keyword explanations.
Campaign2Fight4Description: Cards are more powerful together! Save your mana if there's nothing specific you need to handle right now. But any mana above 10 is wasted!
Campaign2Fight5Description: Your Rampant Growth spawns mushrooms on DRAW that can empower Blue Golem, make sure to pick them up! Or you can save them for healing your Minions on offense!
Campaign2Fight1Description: Grab the bridges with cheap cards like Bridge buddies. When you have Arcane Golem save up your mana and play it behind Blue Golem for an awesome push!
Campaign1Description: Learn more about Valorian and general game mechanics as you fight some real Masters!
Campaign1Victory: You've mastered [r:BrotherHeroFirstName]. Your journey has just begun, remember to use your newly rewarded cards in improving your deck!
Campaign2Description: Let's play Milloween - a Master whose companion Arcane Golem gains power from your spells!\nOnce Mastered, you'll get the [r:ArcaneMageDarkFury] as a reward!
Campaign2Victory: Congratulations on defeating the Lich Queen [r:WitchQueen] and Mastering [r:ArcaneMage]. Your skills will surely bring you to victory in many battles!

BloodImpBossDescription: ""You are all lambs to the slaughter!""\n<Kijiki starts chanting ominously>
GuardianBossDescription: The Guardian bristles with magical energy. Its intention is clear, there is no way around.
PassiveSkillRandomCardCostLessAfterOverk: When a Minion you control kill an enemy Minion with more than 75 excess damage, a random card in hand costs 1 less mana until played. ([math:[v:PassiveSkillRandomCardCostLessAfterOverkill.MIN_DELAY]/1000] seconds cooldown)
PassiveSkillGiveNearestEnemyFearIfPlayed: When you play a card affected by Overkill, give the nearest enemy Minion [actorskillinfo:FearBuff,[mec:[r:FearBuff]]]
PassiveSkillDealDamageToAllMinionsAndGiv: Deal 666 damage to ALL units and give them [actorskillinfo:FearBuff,[mec:[r:FearBuff]]]. Trigger Overkill 6 times.
PassiveSkillHealHealthAndAbsorbAllFriend: Heal 1000 health and absorb 75% of all damage taken by ALL friendly minions for 30 secs
Adventure8Description: Welcome to The Showdown! The game show that brings you the bloodiest and cruelist acts of violence in all the realms! One contender, Nine challenges. Will they emerge victorious, or will their blood color the arena floor?
Adventure8Chapter1VictoryDescription: You have bested The Showdown! The cries of your fallen foes will echo through these halls for eternity!
DealDamageOnStunnedAndFrozenMinionsDescr:
Deal 50 True Damage per second to enemies that are Stunned or Frozen.

[mec:[r:TrueDamage]]
[r:TrueDamageDescription].
SpawnKnightPuffOnMinionBuffedDescription:
Whenever a friendly Minion gains a Positive Effect, summon a Knight Puff by Master Tower. (3 sec cooldown).

[mec:[r:KnightPuff]]
DPS: [dps:KnightPuff]
Health: [av:KnightPuff.MaxHealth]
TheCityWatchRelicDescription: When you play a Building and you already own 2 Buildings, shuffle 1 [r:Legionair] into your deck for every 2 cards in your starting deck (15 seconds cooldown). The [r:Legionair] is played automatically on draw.
ScratsScratsRelicDescription: Each time you play a Minion card, summon a [r:MeleeScrat] with [mec:[r:FrenzyBuff]].
TempersFlaringRelicDescription:
Melee Minions have [mec:[r:RageBuff]], if they gain rage from a different source, they gain [mec:[r:SuperRageBuff]] instead.

[mec:[r:RageBuff]]
[r:RageBuffDescription]

[mec:[r:SuperRageBuff]]
[r:SuperRageBuffDescription].
GainFasterManaForEveryTwoPercentDamagePl: Gain +1% faster Mana for every 2% of health your Master have lost.
SlitherBeastAdventureDescription: The eldest of a great species that once inhabited the western desert. They were hunted to near extinction by the Slither. It and many of its brethren were taken as trophies. It's time for revenge.\n\n[f:Hint: Elder Beast is a versatile Master that can be played with most decks. Add more ways to inflict [r:PoisonBuff] to get the most out of Elder Beast's perks.]

3xContenderInfoText: Reach Contender in three games modes
FailedToLoadAdventureProgressDescription: Damn.. We failed to load your Adventures progress. To keep your progress you won't be able to play Adventures until it is resolved. Please contact support.
LetsPlayCampaignTip: Let's Play Campaign, where you learn to\nmaster different Masters!
CampaignInfoTip: Each campaign focuses on a Master and a hand-crafted deck, with great rewards!
CampaignEnemyPerksTip: And make sure to read the enemies' perks with [r:[v:InputTextsService.Inspect]]!
ManaChaserDescription: [actorskillinfo:StealthBuff,[mec:[r:StealthBuff]]]\n\nOn play, if you have 6+ Mana, summon 3 [actorinfo:ManaChaser,[r:ManaChasers]] and gain [actorskillinfo:Overload,[mec:[r:Overload] (3)]] instead.
CantChangeHeroWhileInQueue: Can't Change Hero While in Queue
MayhemRetireConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to forfeit the Mayhem run?
DeleteAccountDescription: You are about to delete your Minion Masters account. This action cannot be undone and we just wanted to make sure you still want to proceed. If you press '[r:Delete]' we will delete your account according to our privacy policy and close the app.
AccountDeletedDescription: Thank you for playing in the first place. If you ever want to come back and play the game a new account will be created.
CursedAuraBuffDescription: Nearby enemy ground Minions lose 3% of their max health every second. The aura even persists after he is gone!
NowAdd0Id: Add the newly crafted to your deck!
NowAdd0IdDesktop: [r:[v:InputTextsService.Interact]] to add the newly crafted card to your deck!
CraftingApplySearchNewCardText: We've searched for your newly crafted card. Lets add it to your deck!
LetsClaimGloryLevelTipText: Increasing glory unlocks great rewards! Lets claim our first Glory tier!
UseTokenGoToCollectionTip: You just got a Legendary card! Lets add it to your deck!
EnterBattlePassTip: You've just unlocked the Season Pass! Go check it out!
AreYouSureToBuyBattlePass: Are you sure you want to purchase the Season Pass?
SwitchModesReminderTapModeSelect: You can freely switch between Game Modes ([r:[v:InputTextsService.Interact]] on Mode Select)
SwitchModesReminderClickContinue: There are more modes to unlock - keep playing to unlock them
StartAdventureClickBattleMode: You unlocked a new mode! Let's try an Adventure!
StartAdventureClickBattleButton: In Adventures, you'll face bosses of harder and harder difficulty, but you'll be able to make your deck stronger between each fight!
StartDraftClickBattleMode: You unlocked a new mode! Let's try a Draft!
StartDraftClickBattleButton: In Draft, you build a deck of random cards
GoToRankedTip: You are close to reaching the next League! Check it out!
RankedHaveALookAroundTip: Play Ranked mode more to unlock rewards each season! Keep playing to reach Stone League!
MechSuitMiniBossAdventureDescription: Vuk, the enigmatic engineer is the smartest Scrat in his tribe, or perhaps just the one foolish enough to put on a mech suit designed by Scrats.\n\n[f:Hint: Use [r:HookOnTargetedEnemy] to get rid of weak enemies and bring plenty melee Minions to get the most out of [r:FireRocketsOnRandomEnemiesCloseToFriendlyUnits].]
HookOnTargetedEnemyDescription:
A card in player's hand becomes [mec:[r:HookOnTargetedEnemy].

[mec:[r:HookOnTargetedEnemy]]
[r:MechsuitMiniBossFirst] drags an enemy Minion to his Master Tower. Costs 3 Mana.
Costs 1 mana less every 5 seconds.
FireRocketsOnRandomEnemiesCloseToFriendl: Fires rockets enemies within 2 range of a friendly Unit every 10 seconds for [math:[v:FireRocketsIfPilotedInStarterDeck.ROCKET_COUNT]*[v:FireRocketsIfPilotedInStarterDeck.ROCKET_DAMAGE]] damage.
Cast5SpellsOutOfAPoolEvery20SecondsDescr: Cast 5 Crystal Elf Spells with random targets every 20 seconds.
CrystalMageBossAdventureDescription: "Step no further into this sacred grove! My magic will destroy your mind itself!"
RemoveOpponentCardsOnPlayUntill4CardsLef: Whenever opponent casts a card, destroy it. (Cannot be played again this match).\nOpponent can't have less than 5 cards in deck.
Adventure9Description: The ancient homeland of the Elves are home to Arcane Crystals. A rare commodity that yields unfathomable and unpredictable power. It is too dangerous to be left in the hands of Lord-Sentinnel Thelec and his army of Crystal Elf soldiers, who is fiercely protecting the crystals.
ChanceToCastAllCardsTwiceDescription: 10% chance of casting cards twice. If you have less than 50% health, that chance is doubled.
Adventure9Chapter1VictoryDescription: You have dispatched Thelec and his army. The world is safe from his reign.
Campaign1Fight1Description: Mordar's deck is filled with undead minions who can resurect, be careful about leaving them on your side.
Campaign2Fight2Description: Try to get Rampage on both golems after playing them, but save mana for healing them in the enemy arena.
Campaign2Fight3Description: Be careful against air units. Don't waste your ranged and other air units on something and get caught without a counter!
Campaign3Description: Learn how to play [r:Ratbo], the legendary scrat commander that uses swarms of scrats and machinery to overwhelm his opponents.\nOnce complete you'll unlock [r:Ratbo] as a playable Master and the [r:ZombieTerminatorRatbo] Skin
Campaign4Description: Learn how to master ranged minions as [r:Stormbringer] and take down his rival Volco.\nCompleting this campaign will award you the [r:WingedStormbringerRed].
Campaign5Description: Learn how to play as the trickster [r:KingPuff] and embark on a quest to defeat the evil Devil King Puff.\nCompleting this campaign will unlock [r:KingPuff] as a playable master and the [r:SirKingPuff] skin
Campaign6Description: Learn how to bring back the dead as [r:Mordar] the mad.\nDefeating all masters will unlock [r:Mordar] as a playable Master and award you the [r:SoulCollectorMordar] Skin.
Campaign7Description: Bring your biggest guns and master [r:Settsu] to unlock her as a playable Master and gain the [r:InfestedSettsu] Skin.
Campaign8Description: Master the Lich Queen [r:WitchQueen] herself, and take on the toughest challenge yet.\nCompleting this campaign will unlock [r:WitchQueen] as a playable Master and award you her [r:DarkFurySkin] [r:WitchQueen] skin.
Campaign3Fight1Description: You can place multi-Minion cards on the middle line so they split and take both bridges. Remember to read your cards with the special Scrat Swarm ability.
Campaign3Fight2Description: Your newly acquired Rocket Scrat is great at crowd control, but keep in mind Minions take a moment to summon before they can act!
Campaign3Fight3Description: Apep's deck focuses on defense and control. Break through his defences using your [r:MissileTank] and [r:ScratTank] for high damage.
Campaign3Fight4Description: Be careful when Ravager gets Perk 1, it summons a 1-time special Minion with tons of health! And it returns at perk 3!
Campaign3Fight5Description: Mordar's deck is themed around the undead and resurrection. Use your Scratillery and Zeppelin Bomber to quickly take out his units.
Campaign4Fight1Description: Use your Crossbow Dudes and Crystal Archers to take out Apep's units.
Campaign4Fight2Description: Use your Mana Chasers to keep your mana supply up and take Ravager's beast-like minions out from a distance.
Campaign4Fight3Description: Use your Crystal Arcanist to tank the damage with your Lady Infrey protected behind it.
Campaign4Fight4Description: King Puff uses a lot of scrat minions to overwhelm you, use your Chain Lightning and Crystal Arcanist to overcome him.
Campaign4Fight5Description: Use your Guardian and Crystal Construct to protect your other minions from Volco's fiery attacks.
Campaign5Fight1Description: Use your Sun Burn card to effectivly clear out R3-KT's ranged and flying units.
Campaign5Fight2Description: The Mana Puff card you received from R3-KT can help you gain a mana advantage, allowing you to play more units and keep pressure on Stormbringer.
Campaign5Fight3Description: Using the Blind Date card you received from Stormbringer can provide you with a random minion that could turn the tide of the battle against Settsu.
Campaign5Fight5Description: Use the newly aquired Propeller Horde card to swarm your enemy.
Campaign5Fight4Description: The Lone Wolf is a great counter to Valorian's high value minions.
Campaign6Fight1Description: Use [r:DealDamageAndGiveFear] effectively to deal damage to a single enemy and send it running!
Campaign6Fight2Description: [r:Succubus] is a formidable ranged Minion that teleports away from danger when damaged.
Campaign6Fight3Description: Use your invisible [r:ShadowWhelp] to deal massive damage to powerful enemies.
Campaign6Fight4Description: Use your ranged units and newly aquired [r:Reboomer] to deal with Diona's hard-hitting ground units.
Campaign6Fight5Description: Use Rendrath the Deathless to deal with Valorian's shielded units.
Campaign7Fight1Description: Your Annihilator can deal with Ravagers horde minions, while your Windwalker can jump over the gap to cross into the enemy side.
Campaign7Fight2Description: Try using Shock Rock to deal with the enemy’s Crossbow Guild.
Campaign7Fight3Description: The Ravenous Swarmers cards can be useful in quickly taking out minions such as the Mana Puff and Crystal arcanist.
Campaign7Fight4Description: The Cursebearer is useful in taking out big minions like the Divine Warrior.
Campaign7Fight5Description: The newly aquired Rammer focuses only on buildings, use it effectivly to take out the Ghost Turret or enemy tower.
Campaign8Fight1Description: Use your minions to overwhelm Valorian and use Unholy Ground to control the battlefield.
Campaign8Fight2Description: You can use your Corpse explosion to deal a large amount of damage on multiple minions, try to get Settsu to group her minions together.
Campaign8Fight3Description: Jing Long is a flying unit that deals AoE, use this to defeat Mordar's horde of skeletons.
Campaign8Fight4Description: Use your newly aquired Restless dead to overwhelm R3-KT's ranged units.
Campaign8Fight5Description: Use your Toll of the dead card to summon Undying Skeletons.
PlayerLeftMatchDescription: Your teammate is no longer in the match, please return to the menu.
GameEndedUnexpectedlyDescription: Game Ended Unexpectedly, please return to menu.
PromotingIsNotPowerNotice: - Promoting doesn't increase the power of the card -
CardPromotionAvailable: Collect more card copies to promote to next tier.
CardPromotionLockedTier: You need to complete the previous tier to be able to promote the selected tier.
CardPromotionUnclaimedTier: You can claim your rewards for this tier now.
CardPromotionCompletedTier: You have already claimed the rewards for completing this tier.
AvailableByDefault: Occasionally obtainable through future Season Passes and in the shop
ConnectionProtocolErrorDescription: The game is currently down due to scheduled server maintenance. We will be back again shortly!\n\nSorry for the inconvenience. Please go to our Discord channel for more information.
SpellDancerDescription: [actorskillinfo:ManaSurgeBuff,[mec:[r:ManaSurgeBuff]]], Has 4 [actorskillinfo:ArcaneSpheres,[mec:[r:ArcaneSpheres]]].\n\nOn play, if you have 6+ mana, fire [v:StartWithArcaneringBallsAbility.BARRAGE_MISSILES] [actorskillinfo:ArcaneSpark,[mec:[r:ArcaneSparks]]] at random enemies in the area and gain [actorskillinfo:Overload,[mec:[r:Overload] ([v:StartWithArcaneringBallsAbility.OVERLOAD])]].
NetterScratDescription: Shoot a net that inflicts [actorskillinfo:GroundedBuff,[mec:[r:GroundedBuff]]] on all enemies in an area.
BearvalancheDescription: Spectral bears charge forward and damages ground units, reduce movement speed by 3.
LichKnightDescription: When an enemy ground Minion dies nearby store its essence. When no enemies are near consume all essence stored and raise a [actorskillinfo:Skeleton,[r:Skeleton]] with [actorskillinfo:RushBuff,[mec:[r:RushBuff]]] at the location the enemies died.
LichKnightLegendaryDescription: Inflicts [actorskillinfo:LichCurseBuff,[mec:[r:LichCurseBuff]]] that returns slain enemies to fight for you.
MechsuitMiniBossDescription: [actorskillinfo:FlamethrowerBuff,[mec:[r:FlamethrowerBuff]]], [actorskillinfo:GrapplingClawBuff,[mec:[r:GrapplingClawBuff]]], [actorskillinfo:PilotedBuff,[mec:[r:PilotedBuff]]].\n\nOn play, if you have at least [v:FireRocketsIfPilotedInStarterDeck.PILOTED_REQUIRED] [r:PilotedBuff] cards in your deck, [actorskillinfo:BombardBuff,[mec:[r:BombardBuff]]] nearby enemies.
GrapplingClawBuffDescription: Pull a nearby ground enemy to [r:MechsuitMiniBossFirst]. If the enemy is immovable, [r:MechsuitMiniBossFirst] is pulled to them instead.\n\nDoesn't affect Master Tower.
LichCurseBuffDescription:
Affected Minion is [mec:[r:CursedBuff]] and when killed the Minion comes alive under your control after a delay.
It has -50% max health and damage and is [mec:[r:CursedBuff]].

[mec:[r:CursedBuff]]
[r:CursedBuffDescription]
BombardBuffDescription: Bombard nearby enemies with shoulder rockets.
FlamethrowerBuffDescription: Deals damage in a cone in front of [r:MechsuitMiniBossFirst].
GroundedBuffDescription: Enemies lose flying and are immobilized.
ArcaneSparkDescription: A small but deadly projectile, traveling at the speed of magic!
ArcaneSpheresDescription: Magical spheres swirl around the Minion and deal damage to the first enemy they touch.
TutorialPerksTipDesktop: These are your Perks. Earn enough XP and you'll unlock them!\n\n(HOVER to view TOOLTIPS)
LoginQueueUnknownPosition: You have been added to the login queue. Your position will be updated shortly.\nPlease wait...
LoginQueueWithPosition: You have been added to the login queue.\\nYou are at position [0].
ColdSnapDescription: Minions are Frozen for an extra 6 seconds, and Slow decreases movement and attack speed by an extra 20%.
TheSwarmDescription:
For every 3 minions you control that dies, summon a [r:Swarmer] by your Master Tower.

[mec:[r:Swarmer]]

FueledByAngerDescription: Whenever a minion you control gains [r:Rage], it also gain [r:Spirit], [r:GiantGrowth] or [r:FrenzyBuff] at random.
ShockingGraspDescription:
Whenever you Stun an enemy Minion, cast [mec:[r:GraspingThorns]] on it. (5 second Cooldown).

[mec:[r:GraspingThorns]]
Slows enemies to [v:SlowAndDealDamageOverTime.REDUCE_SPEED_TO] speed and deals [sv:SpellSlowAndDealDamageInArea.Damage] damage in an area.
KingPuffPickUpEDescription: Add a random one-use 2-mana spell to your hand.
CrystalCommanderBossAdventureDescription: "By decree of the Crystal Court, I have sentenced you to die!"
IncubusBossDescription: "In the void, no one can hear you scream!"
RatboPirateDescription: Hide your cheese if you see the red-chequered balloons of The Flying Brunchman! [f:\n\nHint: Fill your deck with cards that summon multiple Minions and use More Dakka! to take out big enemies.]
TutorialPlayFirstPerkTip: Use it on this enemy minion that he just played!
NoSuchLobbyDescription: The lobby you are trying to reach is unavailable
NoUserSelectedDescription: Reconnect and select a user to proceed.
UserChangedWhileSuspendedDescription: Please reconnect to login as your new user.
WearebuildinganewkindofMMOgameYoucanclai: We are building a new kind of PvPvE extraction Looter game, where you'll even see some familiar faces. You can claim your Beta Key here and join us on Discord to participate in Playtest sessions.
TeenMushroomDescription: On Draw, [actorskillinfo:BerryBuff,[mec:[r:BerryBuff]]].\n\nWhen [r:TeenMushroom] enters the opponent's arena, it splits into two copies of itself.
MamaMushroomDescription: When this receives a new [actorskillinfo:PositiveEffect,[mec:[r:PositiveEffect]]], this splits into two copies of itself with [v:SplitOnBuffRepeating.SPLIT_PERCENTAGE]% damage and max health.
LadybringerDescription: Armed with the support of the Shi-Hou and his dashing good looks, he's ready to fight... For what's right.
MaxAmountExeededRefundReward: Max amount already owned. Refund reward for shards or gold.
OwlCasterDescription: Lifts targeted enemy Minion into the air with a cyclone and attacks it.\n\nThe Minion gains flying but cannot attack or move while in the Cyclone.
ContinueCampaignOrPvpClickBattleMode: It's time to fight real players!
Campaign3Victory: You did it, you did it! You've mastered [r:Ratbo] and gained precious loot for your Scrat champion!
Campaign4Victory: Congratulations on mastering [r:Stormbringer]! You've been rewarded with new cards and the [r:WoodElf_DarkFury] skin.
Campaign5Victory: You've defeated your evil counterpart and mastered playing as [r:KingPuff]. Congratulations!
Campaign6Victory: You've mastered the undead necromancer [r:Mordar] and gained powerful cards containing unholy knowledge, use them wisely.
Campaign7Victory: Congratulations, You've won, but at what cost... You've unlocked Settsu's Infested skin and mastered her deck.
Campaign8Victory: Congratulations, You've mastered the legendary Lich Queen and unlocked her [r:DarkFurySkin] skin.
RuneShaperDescription: [r:RuneShaperFirst] is a master of the Runewyrd, an ancient magic unique to the [r:Highlander]. Runeshapers carve runes into stone, imbuing it with the power of wind, frost and their ancestral legends.
RuneshaperBasicAttackDescription:
[r:RuneShaperFirst] hurls a massive stone.

[av:RuneShaper.Damage] ([dps:RuneShaper] DPS)
Cooldown: [av:RuneShaper.AttackCooldown] seconds
Range: [av:RuneShaper.Range]
RuneshaperPerk1Description:
Add a one-use [r:RuneStone] card to the top of your deck every [math:[v:RuneStoneOnTimer.COOLDOWN]/1000] seconds. It gets a new [mec:Runic Carving] each time it's played.

[mec:[r:WindStone]:]
+6 Range and deals 200 damage.

[mec:[r:FrostStone]:]
Gets [mec:[r:TauntBuff]] and a 300 Health shield that inflicts Frozen on nearby enemy ground Minions when depleted.

[mec:[r:AncestryStone]:]
Summons 2 [r:Ancestor] Minions.
[r:AncestorDescription]

[r:RunestoneDescription]
FrostCardBuffDescription: Gets [mec:[r:TauntBuff]] and a 300 health frost shield. It inflicts Frozen on nearby enemy ground minions when depleted.
RuneStoneSpellDescription: Toss a [r:RuneStone] that deals damage in an area and creates a building. Gets a new Runic Power each time it's played.
RuneshaperPerk2Description:
When you play [r:Runestone], the next Ground Minion card you play gets a [r:Runic Power] of the same type.

[mec:[r:WindCardBuff]:]
The next attack deals +[v:WindRuneAttack.EXTRA_DAMAGE] of damage in an area.

[mec:[r:FrostCardBuff]:]
Gets [mec:[r:TauntBuff]] and a shield equal to its health. Max [v:GiveShieldAndFreezeOnShieldBreak.SHIELD]. It inflicts Frozen on nearby ground Minions when depleted.

[mec:[r:AncestryCardBuff]:]
Summon [v:Summon2Ancestors.COUNT] Ancestor Minions.
[r:AncestorDescription]
RuneshaperPerk3Description:
Reduce [r:RuneshaperPerk1] Cooldown by 5 seconds.

The next time you would get a [r:RuneStone], gain a [mec:[r:Wyrdstone]] instead.

[mec:[r:Wyrdstone]]
[r:WyrdstoneDescription]
WyrdstoneDescription: Toss a Wyrdstone, endowed with all three Rune Carvings. Gives the next Minion you play all three Runic Empowerments.
PurpleDukeHunterRatboDescription: Yes, there is nobility among the [r:Scrats], a scratility if you will. [f:\n\nHint: Fill your deck with cards that summon multiple Minions and use More Dakka! to take out big enemies.]
RescueHighlandBearDescription:
[actorskillinfo:ThickHide,[mec:[r:ThickHide]]]

When a nearby friendly Minion reaches 50% health for the first time, [mec:[r:RescueHighlandBear]] gives it a barrel of Frostberry Wine, giving it [actorskillinfo:FrozenBuff,[mec:[r:FrozenBuff]]] and [actorskillinfo:HealKeyword,[mec:[r:HealKeyword]s]] it.
If it's a [r:Highlander], it gains [actorskillinfo:HiglandRevelry,[mec:[r:HiglandRevelry]]].

[mec:[r:RescueHighlandBear]] carries 2 barrels which it can give to allies, but also has 1 barrel reserved for itself.
EmpoweredAttackBuffDescription: The next attack deals more damage.
CommanderDescription: [actorskillinfo:LegionBuff,[mec:[r:LegionBuff] (3)]].\n\nThe 10 next Legionnaires you would summon are promoted to [actorskillinfo:CenturionBuff,[mec:[r:CenturionBuff]]].
StormSteedDescription: When no enemies are near, [r:StormSteed] begins to gallop.\n\nWhile galloping, it deals extra damage and knocks enemies back.
BlastCrystalBuffDescription: If there is more than one [r:BlastCrystalBuff] in play, they explode.
FreshMeatDescription: Targeted enemy ground Minion gains [actorskillinfo:TauntBuff,[mec:[r:TauntBuff]]].\n\nSummon [actorskillinfo:Swarmer,[r:Swarmers]] with [actorskillinfo:RushBuff,[mec:[r:RushBuff]]] around the Minion.
DenverDescription: Throws enemies into the air. They damage other enemies if they land on them.\n\n[actorskillinfo:MythicBuff,[mec:[r:MythicBuff]]].
SpaceMarineDescription: Shoots a powerful blast with his trusty E22X Shotgun Blaster.\n\n[actorskillinfo:AbilityCard,[r:AbilityCard]] - [mec:[spellinfo:SpellSpaceMarineEntry,[r:SpellSpaceMarineEntry]]]
SpellSpaceMarineEntryDescription: [r:SpaceMarineFirst] jumps to a nearby position.\n\nCosts 1 Mana.
EmergencyReservesDescription:
Summon either of the following:
- [v:SpellSummonRandomEmergencyReserves.AMOUNT_OF_MARINES]x [actorinfo:PlasmaMarine,[r:PlasmaMarines]]
- [v:SpellSummonRandomEmergencyReserves.AMOUNT_OF_BUZZERS]x [actorinfo:DroneBuzzers,[r:DroneBuzzers]]
- [v:SpellSummonRandomEmergencyReserves.AMOUNT_OF_TANKS]x [actorinfo:OutlanderTank,[r:OutlanderTank]]

Cards in an opponent's hand costs 1 less Mana until played (discount cannot be avoided).
DiametrodonDescription: On play, [actorskillinfo:SpitPoisonBuff,[mec:[r:SpitPoisonBuff]]] on a nearby Enemy Minion.
AppDataDisclosureDescription: Here at BetaDwarf we value your privacy and are commited to protecting you personal information. This disclosure outlines the types of data we collect, how we use it and your rights regarding this information. This disclosure applies to all users of the Minion Masters App. If you play the game on a different platform, please refer to the respective data and usage disclosure for that platform. Data we collect Account ID Data Type: Account ID Usage: To provide you with an account and ID in our system, and to facilitate cross-platform play User Progress, Items, and Rank Data type: Game critical data Usage: To save and manage your progress, items, and rank within the game. User In-game Friends Data type: Account ID Usage: To allow you to connect and interact with friends in the game. App Activity Data Type: Application Actions Usage: To improve the game and enhance your user experience. Crash Logs Data Type: Error Log Messages Usage: To collect anonymous data for monitoring and improving the stability of the app. How we use your data: We use the collected data to provide you with a seamless gaming experience, improve app functionality, and ensure stability and the security of the app. Data Sharing and Third Parties We do not sell or share your data with third parties for marketing purposes. However, we may share anonymized data with analytics to improve app functionality. User Rights and Choices You have the right to access, modify, or delete your data at any time. Data Security We employ industry-standard security measures to protext your data from unauthorized access, alteration, and disclosure. Updates to This Disclosure We may update this disclosure from time to time. Any changes will be communicated through in-app notifications. Contact Information For any questions or concerns about this data collection disclosure, please contact us at support@Betadwarf.com
VoidClericDescription: [actorskillinfo:AbilityCard,[r:AbilityCard]] - [mec:[spellinfo:NetherReach,[r:NetherReach]]].\n\nIf [r:VoidClericFirst]'s attack kills a Minion, reduce the Mana cost of [r:NetherReach] by 1.

If played behind [r:VoidClericFirst]: Summon [v:NetherReachAbility.CROSSBOW_IMP_COUNT] [mec:[r:CrossbowImp]]

WitchQueenMechaDescription: In a post-scarcity utopia what is left but bending others to your will? It's all about realizing the best version of your inner Queen. Tyranny is so last millenium however, and way too tedious; the fastest way to billions of mindless followers is the life of an influencer! #DatDespotLife #QueenBee
SharsRakkRavagerDescription: Deep in the Shars'Rakk Realms of Madness the [r:SharsRakkRavager] reigns. Even the other Shars'Rakk Princes give his lands a wide berth, such is his fearsome reputation for torture and mayhem.
PermaFrostDebuffDescription: While this card has Perma Frost, Minion cards you play gains Frozen - Remove stacks equal to the cost of those Cards. You cannot play this card until there are no more [r:PermafrostBuff] stacks on it.
SacrificeCountBuffDescription: This card will sarcifice [r:Slave]s to trigger additional effects

SBI1R3KTDescription: A celebration of the Sinobii Battleground Invitational 1 winner, SeT!
PromotingCardsTipText: Promote the card to use it, easy!
BannermanBossDescription: Before you stand the most uncoordinated army you've ever seen, lead by a belligerent commander. ""Get them! for the Empyreum!"" he shouts.
SlitheringSummonsBossDescription: Your way is blocked by a slithering taskmaster squad, keen on thwarting your descent.\n\n“Lets do this!“
XBoxCrossNetworkWarning: In multiplayer games, players can come from other platforms
VulkanAPIDisclaimer: Using Vulkan might cause crashes on certain devices. Use OpenGLES if you experience instability
AdventureCompleteWithAllMastersToUnlock: Complete with ALL Masters on hard mode to unlock.
RammerMultiSideCardBuffDescription: Summon a [r:Rammer] and an illusion of a [r:Cleaver]
CleaverMultiSideCardBuffDescription: Summon a [r:Cleaver] and an illusion of a [r:Rammer]
SpaceMarineAbilityDescription: [r:SpaceMarineFirst] jumps to a nearby position.\n\nCosts 1 Mana.
ChestOpeningFailedButRewardsClaimed: Opening the chest failed. Fret not, your reward has been claimed.
EmpoweredFrostRuneDescription: Minion gets [mec:[r:TauntBuff]] and a frost shield equal to its health (max [v:GiveShieldAndFreezeOnShieldBreak.SHIELD])
SpitPoisonBuffDescription: Deals damage and poisons an enemy.
SteamPurchaseInProgressOverlayMessage: A purchase is in progress. Open the Steam Overlay to cancel or complete the purchase before proceeding.
InvalidXboxProductIdDescription: Could not find the request xbox product id.
ScheduledMaintenanceDescription: Servers are down for maintenance, please visit our blog or Discord channel for more information.
UsernameAlreadyTaken: That username is already taken. Please try again.
DlcClaimFailedTitle: An error occured while claiming a DLC
DlcClaimFailedDescription: An error occured while trying to claim one or more of your DLCs. Please restart the game to try again. If the problem persists please contact support. Sorry for the inconvenience.
FailedBatchOpeningTokensTitle: Failed opening a batch of tokens. Please try again.
SpinsOutOfSyncDescription: Tokens out of sync, please login again.
DoubleClickToPlayCardEnabled: Double Click To Play Card Enabled
QuestNotFoundTitle: Quest not found. Please try again later
dRuneDescriptioneDescription: First attack deals [v:WindRuneAttack.EXTRA_DAMAGE] extra damage in an area and knocks enemies back
AboutToChangeYourNameTag: You are about to change your name tag.\n\nAre you sure?
CommunicationBlockedDescription: You or the remote user have blocked communications. Operation can not continue.
NecromancerMordarSkinDescription: [r:NecromancerMordarSkin] was willing to pay any price for power. Even taking on the appearance of a rad 80's metal band guitarist.
GenerateAccountLinkCodeDescription: Generate a code for use on the platform you want to link with this account. Nothing will be altered on the account where you generate a code, and no link will take place until you input and use the code on another platform.
UseAccountLinkCodeDescription: Input a code generated from an account you want to copy progress from and link this platform account to. When you input and confirm the use of a code, your progress and content from the account where the code was generated will be copied to this account, and from then on you can progress on either platform and have it reflected on both.
GenerateAccountLinkCodeWarningDesc: BEWARE: The code you generate will be usable for X minutes. If you do not redeem it within the time limit, you can generate a new one here.
UseAccountLinkCodeWarningDesc: WARNING: When you input and confirm the use of a code, all progress and purchased content on this account will be irreversibly lost. Make sure you only input and confirm a code on the platform where you are comfortable losing progress and content.
AccountLinkConfirmationDesc: Are you sure you want to overwrite the currently active account on this device?
AccountLinkConfirmationWarningDesc: WARNING: When you confirm this link, all progress and purchased content on the currently active account will be irreversibly lost.
PGSPurchasingPurchasingUnavailableDescri: Making purchases through Google Play Games Service is currently unavailable.
PGSPurchasingNoProductsAvailableDescript: Google Play Games Service has found no products available for purchase.
PGSPurchasingAppNotKnownDescription: Google Play Games Service has failed to identify that the requested purchase is coming from Minion Masters.
PGSPurchasingExistingPurchasePendingDesc: Google Play Games Service has an existing purchase pending, preventing new purchases to be processed.
PGSPurchasingProductUnavailableDescripti: Google Play Games Service could not find the product requested for purchase.
PGSPurchasingSignatureInvalidDescription: Google Play Games Service failed to retrieve a valid signature for purcahse authorization.
PGSPurchasingUserCancelledDescription: The purchase process was aborted by the user before being completed by Google Play Games Service.
PGSPurchasingPaymentDeclinedDescription: Google Play Games Service failed to process the payment because the payment was declined.
PGSPurchasingDuplicateTransactionDescrip: Google Play Games Service has blocked the purchace because it appears to be a duplicate of an existing purchase process.
PGSPurchasingUnknownDescription: Google Play Games Service failed to process the purchase for an unknown reason.
PGSPlatformAuthenticationFailedDescripti: You must be logged in to Google Play in order to proceed.
PGSPlatformAuthenticationTimeoutDescript: Google Play failed to provide login credentials before the login attempt timed out. If this issue persists, please contact support@betadwarf.com.
PGSFailedToAcknowledgePurchaseDescriptio: Google Play Games Service failed to acknowledge purchase.
FailedtoContactPGSDescription: Google Play is unavailable. Either the service is temporarily experiencing problems or there is some connection problem. If this issue persists, please contact support@betadwarf.com.
AccountLinkingTokenDoesNotExistDescripti: The code you tried to use does not exist. Make sure that you have input your account linking code correctly.
AccountLinkingTokenExpiredDescription: It has been too long since the account linking code was generated and it has now expired.
AccountLinkingSelfLinkTitle: Can't link an account with itself
AccountLinkingSelfLinkDescription: The code you used was generated by the account you are trying to link with.
AccountLinkingTokenSourceAlreadyAccountL: The code you used was generated by an account that is already linked with an account.
LobbyHostNotReadyDescription: The lobby host is not yet ready. Please wait.
LegionBuffDescription: Add a [actorskillinfo:Legionair,[r:Legionair]] to your deck that will be summoned when drawn.
BulwarkBuffDescription: Reduce damage taken by ranged attacks by 35%
AccountLinkingSamePlatformTitle: Account is linking twice to same platform
AccountLinkingSamePlatformDescription: The account that generated the token is already linked to an account on the same platform as the account that generatedz trying to use the token.
NewsLetterSubscriptionFailedDescription: An error occured during subscription to the newsletter.\nTry again later.
CrusaderVolcoDescription: Upon pledging his undying rage to the Path of the Sun, [r:Volco] joined the Eastern Crusades becoming known and feared as The Purifying Flame. All would burn before him, and only the righteous would remain.
FreeToExploreTip: Nice! Remember to add your new card to your deck, then show the other Masters who's boss!
VampiricBuffDescription: Heal for 20% of killed enemies' max health (max 100 health per attack).
VampireFamiliarDescription: Haunts a nearby friendly Minion. Haunted Minion gain [actorskillinfo:VampiricBuff,[mec:[r:VampiricBuff]]] and casts [mec:[spellinfo:FreezeAllNearbyEnemyMinions,[r:FreezeAllNearbyEnemyMinions]]]. When haunted Minion dies, [r:VampireFamiliar] reappears.\n\nStuns Masters for 5 seconds.
ScratatDescription:
[actorskillinfo:MythicBuff,[mec:[r:MythicBuff]]], [actorskillinfo:PilotedBuff,[mec:[r:PilotedBuff] (1)]]

If played after gaining Perk 2: Costs [mec:+2 Mana].
Health +[v:SetWeaponsBasedOnPerkLevel.EXTRA_HP_PERK_2], [actorskillinfo:PilotedBuff,[mec:[r:PilotedBuff] (+2)]], gains an extra attack.

If played after gaining Perk 3: Costs [mec:+4 Mana].
Health: +[v:SetWeaponsBasedOnPerkLevel.EXTRA_HP_PERK_3], [actorskillinfo:PilotedBuff,[mec:[r:PilotedBuff] (+4)]], gains an extra attack and shoots [actorskillinfo:ScratatArtillery,[mec:[r:ScratatArtillery]]] out of its back.
KamikazeppelinDescription: A [actorskillinfo:Kamikazeppelin,[mec:[r:Kamikazeppelin]]] flies towards and crashes into targeted area dropping bombs along the way.\n\n[actorskillinfo:PilotedBuff,[mec:[r:PilotedBuff]]].
ArcaneNullifierDescription: Remove all positive effects on Minions in an area, then deal [sv:ArcaneNullifier.Damage] damage to all enemies in the area. If a positive effect was removed deal an additional [v:CleanseEnemiesAndDealDamage.EXTRA_DAMAGE] damage.
ChapelOfLightDescription: The seat of power for the Empyreum and their holy army; the Brothers of Light.
MatchResultDesyncDescription: Match desync detected. Match result is inconclusive and will not be counted as a loss.\n\nPress ok to return to menu.
IceVampiricBuffDescription: Heal for 30% of killed enemies' max health (max 100 health per attack).
SneakyBuffDescription: [mec:[r:Invisible]]. Stays visible after having been revealed.\n\n[mec:[r:Invisible]]: [r:InvisibleDescription]
ScratatArtilleryDescription: A scrat with a missile strapped to its back launches itself at a random ground enemy in front of it dealing damage in a large area.
InvisibleDescription: Invisible to and untargetable by enemies. Becomes visible when attacking or taking damage.
IcebreakerAbilityDescription: Damage is not reduced by the [actorskillinfo:FrozenBuff,[mec:[r:FrozenBuff]]] effect.\n\n[mec:[r:FrozenBuff]]: [r:FrozenBuffDescription]
ArcSlashAbilityDescription: Instead of attacking, [r:RobotNinja] moves forward in an instant, dealing heavy damage to all ground enemies in its path.
CrossDeckWildcardsAreDisabledInPremadesB: Cross deck wildcards are disabled in premades battles
No cards can be multiple times in a single deck, or in both decks at the same time in premades battles.
PremadesNonUniqueCardsTitle: Duplicate cards are not allowed in Premade
PremadesNonUniqueCardsDescription: Premade decks cannot contain any wildcards or cards which are also present in your teammate's deck.
MonkDragonDescription: [mec:Karmic Shield]: Every 6 seconds Karmic gains a Karma Shield which prevents all damage the next time he would take damage and deals 100% of the damage prevented to the attacker.
AnkaheshDescription:
[actorskillinfo:ThickHide,[mec:[r:ThickHide]]].

Inflicts [math:[v:PoisonAndSpiderlingsOnBasicAttack.POISON_DURATION]/1000] seconds of [actorskillinfo:PoisonBuff,[mec:[r:PoisonBuff]]] and [actorskillinfo:PoisonAndSpiderlingsOnBasicAttack,[mec:[r:PoisonAndSpiderlingsOnBasicAttack]]] on attack.

Attack deals bonus damage equal to the remaining [actorskillinfo:PoisonBuff,[mec:[r:PoisonBuff]]] damage on the target.

[actorskillinfo:SacrificeBuff,[mec:[r:SacrificeBuff]]]: All your Slitherbound die, each bursting into 3 [actorskillinfo:Spiderlings,[mec:[r:Spiderlings]]].
PoisonAndAOEOnBasicAttackDescription: Attacks deal remaining poison damage on the target to all nearby enemies, then inflict [actorskillinfo:PoisonBuff,[mec:[r:PoisonBuff]]] for [math:[v:PoisonAndAOEOnBasicAttack.POISON_DURATION]/1000] seconds.
IndomitableDescription: Cannot be stunned, frozen, slowed, grounded, or displaced.
BearzerkerDescription: Every [math:[v:TripleDamageEveryXSeconds.COOLDOWN]/1000] seconds, gain [actorskillinfo:EmpoweredAttackBuff,[mec:[r:EmpoweredAttackBuff]]].\n\nAt 50% health [r:Bearzerker] roars, removes all [actorskillinfo:StunBuff,[mec:[r:StunBuff]]], [actorskillinfo:FrozenBuff,[mec:[r:FrozenBuff]]], and [actorskillinfo:FearBuff,[mec:[r:FearBuff]]] from itself, and inflicts [actorskillinfo:FearBuff,[mec:[r:FearBuff]]] on all nearby enemies. Gains [actorskillinfo:FrenzyBuff,[mec:[r:FrenzyBuff]]] and resets [actorskillinfo:EmpoweredAttackBuff,[mec:[r:EmpoweredAttackBuff]]].
TheBlackPotionDescription: Every [math:[v:ActivateWerewolfRufflesOnEnemyUnitDeath.RUFFLES_COOLDOWN]/1000] seconds, Ruffles will run to an enemy Minion killed in your arena or on a bridge to dig up a potion. Once Picked up, Ruffles turns into a [actorskillinfo:Werewolf,[mec:[r:Werewolf]]].\n\n[mec:[r:Werewolf]]: [r:WerewolfDescription]
SqueakAttackDescription:
Scrats summoned by [r:Ratbo]'s perks spawn [actorskillinfo:Burrowed,[mec:[r:Burrowed]]].
Only affects scrats summoned by [r:Ratbo]'s own triggers of his perks.

[mec:[r:Burrowed]]: [r:BurrowedDescription]
[math:[v:PassiveSkillStealthSummonRatOnSummon.COOLDOWN]/1000] seconds cooldown.
BurrowedDescription: Burrowed minions are untargetable. They unburrow when they are in melee range of an enemy.\nThe first attack after becoming unburrowed deals [v:PassiveSkillStealthSummonRatOnSummon.DAMAGE_INCREASE] extra damage.
MassIllusionDescription: Add a one-use [mec:[r:MassIllusion]] card to your hand every [math:[v:AddMassIllusionOnTimer.COOLDOWN]/1000] seconds.\n\n[mec:[r:MassIllusion]]: [r:MassIllusionCardDescription]
MassIllusionCardDescription: Create an illusion of up to 8 ground minions you control in your arena closest to the Master. Every minion affected is then either teleported to the opposite lane or left in its place with the illusion spawning in the other location.
OverpowerDescription: When you play a Melee Minion card that costs [v:PassiveSkillGetEmpoweredAttackOnHighCostMelee.MIN_COST] or more mana, one Minion summoned gets [mec:Empowered Attack].\n\n[mec:Empowered Attack]: The first attack against a Minion deals [v:EmpoweredAttackVSMinions.DAMAGE_INCREASE] extra damage.
MimicMagicDescription: Whenever an unbuffed Minion you control deals damage to another Minion, copy one of their Buffs. [math:[v:TransferBuffsOnDamage.COOLDOWN]/1000] second cooldown.
TombOfTheDeathlessDescription: Enemy Minions that die are resurrected under your control after 5 seconds. They have 50% less maximum health and damage and are [mec:[r:CursedBuff]]. Resurrected minions deal 20% of their health as damage to [r:TombOfTheDeathless].\n\n[mec:[r:CursedBuff]]: [r:CursedBuffDescription]
TombOfTheDeathlessPerkDescription: Add a one-use [mec:[r:TombOfTheDeathless]] card to your deck every [math:[v:TombstoneOfTheDeathlessOnTimer.COOLDOWN]/1000] seconds.\n\n[mec:[r:TombOfTheDeathless]]: [r:TombOfTheDeathlessDescription]
EndlessRagePerkDescription: Add a one-use [mec:[r:EndlessRage]] card to your deck.\n\n[mec:[r:EndlessRage]]: [r:EndlessRageDescription]
EndlessRageDescription: Gain 7 mana over 10 seconds. Spawn both Embers of Flame. Embers are not consumed while [mec:[r:EndlessRage]] is active.
RitesOfTheDeadDescription:
Add a random one-use page from [mec:[r:WitchQueenPerk1]] to the top of your deck every [math:[v:RitesOfTheDead.COOLDOWN]/1000] seconds. 

[mec:[r:WitchQueenBookEffect1]]: [r:WitchQueenBookEffect1DescriptionPerk1]

[mec:[r:WitchQueenBookEffect3]]: [r:WitchQueenBookEffect3DescriptionPerk1]

[mec:[r:WitchQueenBookEffect2]]: [r:WitchQueenBookEffect2DescriptionPerk1]

[mec:[r:WitchQueenBookEffect4]]: [r:WitchQueenBookEffect4DescriptionPerk1]
CloudCoverPerkDescription: Add a one-use [mec:[r:CloudCover]] card to your deck every [math:[v:CloudCoverOnTimer.COOLDOWN]/1000] seconds.\n\n[mec:[r:CloudCover]]: [r:CloudCoverDescription]
CloudCoverDescription:
Lift a friendly non-Mythic ground Minion on a cloud, giving it [mec:Flying] and preventing it from moving for [sv:SpellMakeflyingAndGiveMarksmanShip.Duration] seconds, granting it [mec:Empowered Attack], a [actorskillinfo:SingleShieldBuff,[mec:[r:SingleShieldBuff]]], and giving it [mec:[r:MarksmanshipBuff]] for the duration.

[mec:Empowered Attack]: The first attack against a Minion deals [v:SpellMakeflyingAndGiveMarksmanShip.DAMAGE_INCREASE] extra damage.
[mec:[r:MarksmanshipBuff]]: [r:MarksmanshipBuffDescription]
AirSupportPerkDescription: After using [mec:Perk 1] gain a one-use [mec:[r:AirStrike]] ability card. This card will be discarded when [r:Settsu] returns to the tower.\n\n[mec:[r:AirStrike]]: [r:AirSupportDescription]
RunicAttunementDescription:
Gain [mec:[r:Runestone]s] depending on mana spent.
[r:RunestoneDescription]

Each time you spend [v:RuneStoneOnManaSpent.MINION_MANA_SPEND_DELTA] mana on [yellow:Minion] cards, gain a [mec:[r:WindStone]] [r:Runestone] card.
[mec:[r:WindStone]]: +6 Range and deals 200 damage.

Each time you spend [v:RuneStoneOnManaSpent.SPELL_MANA_SPEND_DELTA] mana on [yellow:Spell] cards, gain a [mec:[r:AncestryStone]] [r:Runestone] card.
[mec:[r:AncestryStone]]: Summons 2 [r:Ancestor] Minions.
[r:AncestorDescription]

Each time you spend [v:RuneStoneOnManaSpent.BUILDING_MANA_SPEND_DELTA] mana on [yellow:Building] cards, gain a [mec:[r:FrostStone]] [r:Runestone] card.
[mec:[r:FrostStone]]: Gets [mec:[r:TauntBuff]] and a 300 Health shield that inflicts Frozen on nearby enemy ground Minions when depleted.
XanianSpellbookPerkDescription: Add a one-use [mec:[r:XanianSpellbook]] card to your deck every [math:[v:AddXanianSpellbook.COOLDOWN]/1000] seconds.\n\n[mec:[r:XanianSpellbook]]: [r:XanianSpellbookDescription]
XanianSpellbookDescription: Reveal 4 random Spells. Cast one and discard the rest. It costs 2 less Mana.
AirSupportDescription: Summon a [actorinfo:BattleDrone,[r:BattleDrone]] to protect [r:Settsu]. After a short interval a [r:AirStrike] Fighter deals damage to enemies in a straight line across the field.
FervorPerkDescription: Add a one-use [mec:[r:FerventWarrior]] card to the top of your deck every [math:[v:FerventWarriorOnTimer.COOLDOWN]/1000] seconds.\n\n[mec:[r:FerventWarrior]]: [r:FerventWarriorDescription]
ProfileServerConnectionLostDuringMatchDe: Disconnected from profile server. Match result has been processed correctly.
PoisonAndSpiderlingsOnBasicAttackDescrip: When the affected target dies spawn a [actorinfo:Spiderling,[r:Spiderling]]. Spawn an additional [actorinfo:Spiderling,[r:Spiderling]] for every 100 [actorskillinfo:PoisonBuff,[mec:[r:PoisonBuff]]] damage taken by the target.
PapyrusOfTheBlackObeliskPerkDescription:
Every [math:[v:AddPapyrusOfTheBlackObliskbookOnTimer.COOLDOWN]/1000] seconds add the one-use [r:PapyrusOfTheBlackObelisk] card to the top of your deck.

[mec:[r:PapyrusOfTheBlackObeliskCard]]:
[r:PapyrusOfTheBlackObeliskCardDescription]
PapyrusOfTheBlackObeliskCardDescription:
This papyrus replaces your hand with 4 random minions selected from your opponent's deck. Each of the 4 options get one of the following effects:

[mec:[r:EssenceOfTheCrawlingChaos]]
[r:EssenceOfTheCrawlingChaosDescription]

[mec:[r:BorneOnTheBlackWind]]
[r:BorneOnTheBlackWindDescription]

[mec:[r:TributeToTheBlackPharaoh]]
[r:TributeToTheBlackPharaohDescription]

[mec:[r:TormentOfTheDwellerInDarkness]]
[r:TormentOfTheDwellerInDarknessDescription]
EssenceOfTheCrawlingChaosDescription: One Minion summoned gains [actorskillinfo:SpiritBuff,[mec:[r:SpiritBuff]]].\n[actorskillinfo:SacrificeBuff,[mec:[r:SacrificeBuff]] (2)]: Minions Summoned gain [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]].
TributeToTheBlackPharaohDescription: Costs 2 less mana. Minions summoned gain [actorskillinfo:TauntBuff,[mec:[r:TauntBuff]]] and [actorskillinfo:TargetedBuff,[mec:[r:TargetedBuff]]].
TormentOfTheDwellerInDarkness: Torment of the Dweller in Darkness
TormentOfTheDwellerInDarknessDescription: Costs 3 less mana. Minions summoned gain [actorskillinfo:AntiFrenzy,[mec:[r:AntiFrenzy]]] and [actorskillinfo:PoisonBuff,[mec:[r:PoisonBuff]]] equal to half their maximum health.
GunKataCardDescription: [r:R3KT] enters the field with [actorskillinfo:FrenzyBuff,[mec:[r:FrenzyBuff]]] and a rechargeable Shield with [v:RegeneratingShield.SHIELD_AMOUNT] health.
OnslaughtCodexCardDescription: This codex replaces your hand with 4 random 5+ mana non-mythic melee minion cards. Each cost [v:OnslaughtCodexCard.COST_REDUCTION] less mana and gain [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]].
OnslaughtCodexPerkDescription: Add a one-use copy of Onslaught Codex to your deck every [math:[v:AddOnslaughtCodexOnTimer.COOLDOWN]/1000] seconds.\n\n[mec:[r:OnslaughtCodex]]: [r:OnslaughtCodexCardDescription]
HolyFirePerkDescription:
Add a one-use [mec:[r:HolyFireBuff]] card to your hand every [math:[v:AddHolyFireOnTimer.COOLDOWN]/1000] seconds.

[mec:[r:HolyFireBuff]]: [r:HolyFireBuffDescription]
Costs 1 mana.
TheRevenantDescription:
When summoned the highest maximum health enemy ground minion with at least [v:TargetHighestHealthEnemyIfInRange.HEALTH_THRESHOLD] max health will be [mec:Marked for Death]. The marked minion and [r:TheRevenant] will [actorskillinfo:TauntBuff,[mec:taunt]] each other.

The first attack against every minion will inflict [actorskillinfo:FearBuff,[mec:[r:FearBuff]]]. If the target is [mec:Marked for Death] the attack will root the target as well.

If [r:TheRevenant] kills the unit that is [mec:Marked for Death] it gains [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]], [actorskillinfo:FrenzyBuff,[mec:[r:FrenzyBuff]]] and heals for [v:TargetHighestHealthEnemyIfInRange.HEAL_AMOUNT].
